tika-abh07t:977_0: Pinayati kāyacittaṃ tappeti, vaḍḍhetīti vā pīti, sā sampiyāyanalakkhaṇā, ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:977_1: kallato gahaṇalakkhaṇāti vuttaṃ hoti, sampayuttadhamme sukhayatīti sukhaṃ, taṃ iṭṭhānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:977_2: subhojanarasassādako rājā viya. Tattha ārammaṇappaṭilābhe pītiyā viseso pākaṭo kantārakhinnassa
tika-abh07t:977_3: vanantodakadassane viya, yathāladdhassa anubhavane sukhassa viseso pākaṭo yathādiṭṭhaudakassa
tika-abh07t:977_4: pānādīsu viyāti. Nānārammaṇavikkhepābhāvena ekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ aggaṃ imassāti ekaggaṃ,
tika-abh07t:977_5: cittaṃ, tassa bhāvo ekaggatā, samādhi. So avikkhepalakkhaṇo. Tassa hi vasena sasampayuttaṃ
tika-abh07t:978_0: Paṭhamañca desanākkamato ceva uppattikkamato ca ādibhūtattā taṃ jhānañca ārammaṇūpanijjhānato,
tika-abh07t:978_1: paccanīkajhāpanato cāti paṭhamajjhānaṃ, vitakkādipañcakaṃ. Jhānaṅgasamudāye yeva
tika-abh07t:978_2: hi jhānavohāro nemiādiaṅgasamudāye rathavohāro viya, tathā hi vuttaṃ vibhaṅge “jhānanti
tika-abh07t:978_3: vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā”ti. Paṭhamajjhānena sampayuttaṃ kusalacittaṃ
tika-abh07t:979_0: Kasmā pana aññesu phassādīsu sampayuttadhammesu vijjamānesu imeyeva pañca jhānaṅgavasena
tika-abh07t:979_2: ca. Vitakko hi ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropeti. Vicāro anuppabandheti, pīti cassa pīnanaṃ,
tika-abh07t:979_3: sukhañca upabrūhanaṃ karoti, atha naṃ sasampayuttadhammaṃ etehi abhiniropanānuppabandhanapīnanaupabrūhanehi
tika-abh07t:979_4: anuggahitā ekaggatā samādhānakiccena attānaṃ anuvattāpentī ekattārammaṇe samaṃ, sammā
tika-abh07t:979_5: ca ādhiyati. Indriyasamatāvasena samaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ dūrībhāvena līnuddhaccābhāvena
tika-abh07t:979_6: sammā ca ṭhapetīti evamete sameva upanijjhānakiccaṃ āveṇikaṃ. Kāmacchandādipaṭipakkhabhāve
tika-abh07t:979_7: pana samādhi kāmacchandassa paṭipakkho rāgappaṇidhiyā ujupaccanīkabhāvato. Kāmacchandavasena
tika-abh07t:979_8: hi nānārammaṇehi palobhitassa paribbhamantassa cittassa samādhānaṃ ekaggatāya hoti.
tika-abh07t:979_9: Pīti byāpādassa pāmojjasabhāvattā. Vitakko thinamiddhassa yoniso saṅkappanavasena
tika-abh07t:979_11: Vicāro vicikicchāya ārammaṇe anumajjanavasena paññāpatirūpasabhāvattā. Evaṃ upanijjhānakiccavantatāya,
tika-abh07t:979_12: kāmacchandādīnaṃ ujupaṭipakkhabhāvato ca imeyeva pañca jhānaṅgabhāvena vavatthitāti. Yathāhu –
tika-abh07t:982: Upekkhā panetta santavuttisabhāvattā sukheva antogadhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāhu –
tika-abh07t:984_0: Pahānaṅgādivasena panassa viseso upari āvi bhavissati, tathā arūpāvacaralokuttaresupi
tika-abh07t:984_1: labbhamānakaviseso. Athettha kāmāvacarakusalesu viya saṅkhārabhedo kasmā na gahito.
tika-abh07t:984_2: Idampi hi kevalaṃ samathānuyogavasena paṭiladdhaṃ sasaṅkhārikaṃ, maggādhigamavasena
tika-abh07t:984_3: paṭiladdhaṃ asaṅkhārikanti sakkā vattunti? Nayidamevaṃ maggādhigamavasenasattito
tika-abh07t:984_4: paṭiladdhassāpi aparabhāge parikammavaseneva uppajjanato, tasmā sabbassapi jhānassa
tika-abh07t:984_6: adhikārena ca vinā kevalaṃ parikammābhisaṅkhāreneva anuppajjanato “sasaṅkhārika”ntipi
tika-abh07t:984_7: na sakkā vattunti. Atha vā pubbābhisaṅkhāravaseneva uppajjamānassa na kadāci asaṅkhārikabhāvo
tika-abh07t:984_8: sambhavatīti “asaṅkhārika”nti ca byabhicārābhāvato “sasaṅkhārika”nti ca na vuttanti.
tika-abh07t:985_1: paṭipadācatukkena yojetvā desitattā cattāro navakā, parittaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ, parittaṃ
tika-abh07t:985_2: appamāṇārammaṇaṃ, appamāṇaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ, appamāṇaṃ appamāṇārammaṇanti ārammaṇacatukkena
tika-abh07t:985_3: yojitattā cattāro navakā, “dukkhappaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ parittaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t:985_5: soḷasa navakāti pañcavīsati navakāti evamādibhedaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh07t:986_0: 22. Jhānavisesena nibbattitavipāko ekantato taṃtaṃjhānasadisovāti vipākaṃ jhānasadisameva
tika-abh07t:986_1: vibhattaṃ. Imameva hi atthaṃ dīpetuṃ bhagavatā vipākaniddesepi kusalaṃ uddisitvāva
tika-abh07t:987_0: 25. Rūpāvacaramānasaṃ jhānabhedena pañcahi catūhi tīhi dvīhi puna dvīhi jhānaṅgehi
tika-abh07t:987_1: sampayogabhedena pañcadhā pañcaṅgikaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ duvaṅgikaṃ puna duvaṅgikanti
tika-abh07t:987_2: pañcavidhaṃ hoti avisesena, puna taṃ puññapākakiriyānaṃ paccekaṃ pañcannaṃ pañcannaṃ
tika-abh07t:990_0: 26. Idāni arūpāvacaraṃ ārammaṇabhedena catudhā vibhajitvā dassento āha “ākāsānañcāyatanā”tiādi.
tika-abh07t:990_1: Tattha uppādādiantarahitatāya nāssa antoti anantaṃ, ākāsañca taṃ anantañcāti ākāsānantaṃ,
tika-abh07t:990_3: paranipātavasena “ākāsānanta”nti vuttaṃ. Ākāsānantameva ākāsānañcaṃ sakatthe bhāvapaccayavasena.
tika-abh07t:990_4: Ākāsānañcameva āyatanaṃ sasampayuttadhammassa jhānassa adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena devānaṃ devāyatanaṃ
tika-abh07t:990_5: viyāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ. Tasmiṃ appanāppattaṃ paṭhamāruppajjhānampi idha “ākāsānañcāyatana”nti
tika-abh07t:990_6: vuttaṃ yathā pathavīkasiṇārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ “pathavīkasiṇa”nti. Atha vā ākāsānañcaṃ
tika-abh07t:990_7: āyatanaṃ assāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, jhānaṃ, tena sampayuttaṃ kusalacittaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanakusalacittaṃ.
tika-abh07t:991_0: Viññāṇameva anantaṃ viññāṇānantaṃ, paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ. Tañhi uppādādiantavantampi
tika-abh07t:991_1: anantākāse pavattanato attānaṃ ārabbha pavattāya bhāvanāya uppādādiantaṃ aggahetvā
tika-abh07t:991_2: anantato pharaṇavasena pavattanato ca “ananta”nti vuccati. Viññāṇānantameva viññāṇañcaṃ
tika-abh07t:991_3: ākārassa rassattaṃ, na-kārassa lopañca katvā. Dutiyāruppaviññāṇena vā añcitabbaṃ
tika-abh07t:991_4: pāpuṇitabbanti viññāṇañcaṃ, tadeva āyatanaṃ dutiyāruppassa adhiṭṭhānattāti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ. Sesaṃ purimasamaṃ.
tika-abh07t:992_0: Nāssa paṭhamāruppassa kiñcanaṃ appamattakaṃ antamaso bhaṅgamattampi avasiṭṭhaṃ atthīti
tika-abh07t:992_1: akiñcanaṃ, tassa bhāvo ākiñcaññaṃ, paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvo. Tadeva āyatanantyādi purimasadisaṃ.
tika-abh07t:993_0: Oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvato, sukhumāya ca saññāya atthitāya nevassa sasampayuttadhammassa
tika-abh07t:993_1: saññā atthi, nāpi asaññaṃ avijjamānasaññanti nevasaññānāsaññaṃ, catutthāruppajjhānaṃ.
tika-abh07t:993_2: Dīghaṃ katvā pana “nevasaññānāsañña”nti vuttaṃ. Nevasaññānāsaññameva āyatanaṃ manāyatanadhammāyatanapariyāpannattāti
tika-abh07t:993_3: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ. Atha vā saññāva vipassanāya gocarabhāvaṃ gantvā nibbedajananasaṅkhātassa
tika-abh07t:993_4: paṭusaññākiccassa abhāvato nevasaññā ca uṇhodake tejodhātu viya saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvena
tika-abh07t:993_5: vijjamānattā na asaññāti nevasaññānāsaññā, sā eva āyatanaṃ imassa sasampayuttadhammassa
tika-abh07t:993_6: jhānassa nissayādibhāvatoti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ. Saññāvasena cettha jhānūpalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:993_7: nidassanamattaṃ. Vedanādayopi hi tasmiṃ jhāne nevavedanānāvedanādikāyevāti. Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanena
tika-abh07t:993_8: sampayuttaṃ kusalacittaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakusalacittaṃ. Pi-saddena cettha ārammaṇappaṭipadāmissakanayavasena
tika-abh07t:993_9: soḷasakkhattukadesanaṃ, aññampi ca pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayabhedaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh07t:994_1: ākāsādicatunnaṃ gocarānaṃ pabhedena āruppamānasaṃ catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tañhi yathākkamaṃ
tika-abh07t:994_2: pañcamajjhānārammaṇaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ atikkamma tadugghāṭena laddhaṃ ākāsamālambitvā
tika-abh07t:994_3: tampi atikkamma tattha pavattaṃ viññāṇamālambitvā tampi atikkamma tadabhāvabhūtaṃ
tika-abh07t:994_4: akiñcanabhāvamālambitvā tampi atikkamma tattha pavattaṃ tatiyāruppaviññāṇamālambitvā
tika-abh07t:994_5: pavattati, na pana rūpāvacarakusalaṃ viya purimapurimaaṅgātikkamavasena purimapurimassāpi
tika-abh07t:1000_0: 31. Idāni lokuttarakusalaṃ catumaggayogato, phalañca tadanurūpappavattiyā catudhā
tika-abh07t:1000_1: vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “sotāpattimaggacitta”ntyādi vuttaṃ. Nibbānaṃ patisavanato upagamanato,
tika-abh07t:1000_2: nibbānamahāsamuddaninnatāya sotasadisattā vā “soto”ti vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo,
tika-abh07t:1000_3: tassa āpatti ādito pajjanaṃ pāpuṇanaṃ paṭhamasamannāgamo sotāpatti ā-upasaggassa
tika-abh07t:1000_4: ādikammani pavattanato. Nibbānaṃ maggeti, nibbānatthikehi vā maggīyati, kilese mārento
tika-abh07t:1000_5: gacchatīti vā maggo, tena sampayuttaṃ cittaṃ maggacittaṃ, sotāpattiyā laddhaṃ maggacittaṃ
tika-abh07t:1000_6: sotāpattimaggacittaṃ. Atha vā ariyamaggasotassa ādito pajjanaṃ etassāti sotāpatti,
tika-abh07t:1000_7: puggalo, tassa maggo sotāpattimaggo, tena sampayuttaṃ cittaṃ sotāpattimaggacittaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1001_0: Sakiṃ ekavāraṃ paṭisandhivasena imaṃ manussalokaṃ āgacchatīti sakadāgāmī, idha patvā
tika-abh07t:1001_1: idha parinibbāyī, tattha patvā tattha parinibbāyī, idha patvā tattha parinibbāyī,
tika-abh07t:1001_2: tattha patvā idha parinibbāyī, idha patvā tattha nibbattitvā idha parinibbāyīti pañcasu
tika-abh07t:1001_3: sakadāgāmīsu pañcamako idhādhippeto. So hi ito gantvā puna sakiṃ idha āgacchatīti.
tika-abh07t:1001_4: Tassa maggo sakadāgāmimaggo. Kiñcāpi maggasamaṅgino tathāgamanāsambhavato phalaṭṭhoyeva
tika-abh07t:1001_5: sakadāgāmī nāma, tassa pana kāraṇabhūto purimuppanno maggo maggantarāvacchedanatthaṃ
tika-abh07t:1001_6: phalaṭṭhena visesetvā vuccati “sakadāgāmimaggo”ti. Evaṃ anāgāmimaggoti. Sakadāgāmimaggena
tika-abh07t:1002_0: Paṭisandhivasena imaṃ kāmadhātuṃ na āgacchatīti anāgāmī, tassa maggo anāgāmimaggo,
tika-abh07t:1002_1: tena sampayuttaṃ cittaṃ anāgāmimaggacittaṃ. Aggadakkhiṇeyyabhāvena pūjāvisesaṃ arahatīti
tika-abh07t:1002_2: arahā, atha vā kilesasaṅkhātā arayo, saṃsāracakkassa vā arā kilesā hatā anenāti arahā,
tika-abh07t:1002_3: pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvato vā arahā, aṭṭhamako ariyapuggalo, tassa bhāvo arahattaṃ, catutthaphalassetaṃ
tika-abh07t:1002_4: adhivacanaṃ, tassa āgamanabhūto maggo arahattamaggo, tena sampayuttaṃ cittaṃ arahattamaggacittaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1003_0: Pi-saddena ekekassa maggassa nayasahassavasena catunnaṃ catusahassabhedaṃ saccavibhaṅge
tika-abh07t:1003_1: āgataṃ saṭṭhisahassabhedaṃ nayaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena anekavidhattampi saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh07t:1003_2: Tatthāyaṃ nayasahassamattaparidīpanā, kathaṃ? Sotāpattimaggo tāva jhānanāmena paṭipadābhedaṃ
tika-abh07t:1003_3: anāmasitvā kevalaṃ suññato appaṇihitoti dvidhā vibhatto, puna paṭipadācatukkena yojetvā
tika-abh07t:1003_4: paccekaṃ catudhā vibhattoti evaṃ jhānanāmena dasadhā vibhatto. Tathā
tika-abh07t:1003_6: paccekaṃ dasadasākārehi vibhatto tathā tathā bujjhanakānaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena. Tasmā
tika-abh07t:1003_7: jhānavasena dasamaggādīnaṃ ekūnavīsatiyā vasena dasa dasāti vīsatiyā ṭhānesu dve
tika-abh07t:1003_8: nayasatāni honti. Puna tāni catūhi adhipatīhi yojetvā paccekaṃ catudhā vibhattānīti
tika-abh07t:1003_9: evaṃ adhipatīhi amissetvā dve satāni, missetvā aṭṭha satānīti sotāpattimagge nayasahassaṃ
tika-abh07t:1004: 32. Sotāpattiyā laddhaṃ, sotāpattissa vā phalacittaṃ vipākabhūtaṃ cittaṃ sotāpattiphalacittaṃ. Arahattañca taṃ phalacittañcāti arahattaphalacittaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1005_4: sampayogabhedena catumaggasaṅkhātaṃ lokuttarakusalaṃ catudhā hoti, vipākaṃ pana tasseva
tika-abh07t:1005_5: kusalassa phalattā tadanurūpato tathā catudhāti evaṃ anuttaraṃ attano uttaritarābhāvena
tika-abh07t:1005_6: anuttarasaṅkhātaṃ lokuttaraṃ cittaṃ aṭṭhadhā matanti yojanā.
tika-abh07t:1006_0: Kiriyānuttarassa pana asambhavato dvādasavidhatā na vuttā. Kasmā pana tassa asambhavoti?
tika-abh07t:1006_1: Maggassa ekacittakkhaṇikattā. Yadi hi maggacittaṃ punappunaṃ uppajjeyya, taduppattiyā
tika-abh07t:1006_2: kiriyabhāvo sakkā vattuṃ. Taṃ pana kilesasamucchedakavaseneva upalabhitabbato ekavārappavatteneva
tika-abh07t:1006_3: ca tena asanisampātena viya taruādīnaṃ samūlaviddhaṃsanassa taṃtaṃkilesānaṃ accantaṃ
tika-abh07t:1006_4: appavattiyā sādhitattā puna uppajjamānepi kātabbābhāvato diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthañca
tika-abh07t:1006_5: phalasamāpattiyā eva nibbānārammaṇavasena pavattanato na kadāci sekkhānaṃ asekkhānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1006_6: vā uppajjati. Tasmā natthi sabbathāpi lokuttarakiriyacittanti.
tika-abh07t:1010_0: 36. Evaṃ jātivasena saṅgahaṃ dassetvā puna bhūmivasena dassetuṃ “catupaññāsadhā kāme”tyādi
tika-abh07t:1010_1: vuttaṃ. Kāme bhave cittāni catupaññāsadhā īraye, rūpe bhave pannarasa īraye, āruppe
tika-abh07t:1010_2: bhave dvādasa īraye, anuttare pana navavidhe dhammasamudāye cittāni aṭṭhadhā īraye,
tika-abh07t:1010_3: katheyyātyattho. Ettha ca kāmataṇhādivisayabhāvena kāmabhavādipariyāpannāni cittāni
tika-abh07t:1010_4: sakasakabhūmito aññattha pavattamānānipi kāmabhavādīsu cittānīti vuttāni, yathā manussitthiyā
tika-abh07t:1010_7: sākhā”tyādīsu viya anuttare cittānīti vuttāni. Atha vā “kāme, rūpe”ti ca uttarapadalopaniddeso.
tika-abh07t:1010_8: Arūpe bhavāni āruppāni. Natthi etesaṃ uttaraṃ cittanti anuttarānīti upayogabahuvacanavasena
tika-abh07t:1010_9: kāme kāmāvacarāni cittāni catupaññāsadhā īraye, rūpe rūpāvacarāni cittāni pannarasa
tika-abh07t:1010_10: īraye, āruppe āruppāni cittāni dvādasa īraye. Anuttare lokuttarāni cittāni aṭṭhadhā
tika-abh07t:1011_1: katvā mānasaṃ cittaṃ vicakkhaṇā visesena atthacakkhaṇasabhāvā paṇḍitā vibhajanti.
tika-abh07t:1011_2: Atha vā ekavīsasataṃ ekuttaravīsādhikaṃ sataṃ vibhajanti.
tika-abh07t:1014_2: hi aññataravasena taṃtaṃjhānasadisattā vitakkādiaṅgapātubhāvena cattāropi maggā paṭhamajjhānādivohāraṃ
tika-abh07t:1014_3: labhantā paccekaṃ pañcadhā vibhajanti. Tenāha “jhānaṅgayogabhedenā”tyādi, tattha
tika-abh07t:1014_4: paṭhamajjhānādīsu yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato tato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasantassa
tika-abh07t:1014_5: vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā pavattā, taṃ pādakajjhānaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya padaṭṭhānabhāvato.
tika-abh07t:1014_6: Yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ sammasantassa sā pavattā, taṃ sammasitajjhānaṃ. “Aho vata me paṭhamajjhānasadiso
tika-abh07t:1014_7: maggo pañcaṅgiko, dutiyajjhānādīsu vā aññatarasadiso caturaṅgādibhedo maggo bhaveyyā”ti
tika-abh07t:1015_0: Tattha yena paṭhamajjhānādīsu aññataraṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre
tika-abh07t:1015_1: sammasitvā maggo uppādito hoti, tassa so maggo paṭhamajjhānādīsu taṃtaṃpādakajjhānasadiso
tika-abh07t:1015_2: hoti. Sace pana vipassanāpādakaṃ kiñci jhānaṃ natthi, kevalaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu aññataraṃ
tika-abh07t:1015_3: jhānaṃ sammasitvā maggo uppādito hoti, tassa so sammasitajjhānasadiso hoti. Yadā
tika-abh07t:1015_4: pana yaṃ kiñci jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya aññataraṃ sammasitvā maggo uppādito
tika-abh07t:1015_5: hoti, tadā puggalajjhāsayavasena dvīsu aññatarasadiso hoti. Sace pana puggalassa
tika-abh07t:1015_6: tathāvidho ajjhāsayo natthi, heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato vuṭṭhāya uparūparijhānadhamme
tika-abh07t:1015_7: sammasitvā uppāditamaggo pādakajjhānaṃ anapekkhitvā sammasitajjhānasadiso hoti. Uparūparijhānato
tika-abh07t:1015_8: pana vuṭṭhāya heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānadhamme sammasitvā uppāditamaggo sammasitajjhānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1015_9: anapekkhitvā pādakajjhānasadiso hoti. Heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato hi uparūparijhānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1015_10: balavataranti. Vedanāniyamo pana sabbatthāpi vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāniyamena hoti.
tika-abh07t:1015_11: Tathā sukkhavipassakassa sakalajjhānaṅganiyamo. Tassa hi pādakajjhānādīnaṃ abhāvena
tika-abh07t:1015_12: tesaṃ vasena niyamābhāvato vipassanāniyamena pañcaṅgikova maggo hotīti. Apica samāpattilābhinopi
tika-abh07t:1015_13: jhānaṃ pādakaṃ akatvā pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā uppāditamaggopi vipassanāniyameneva
tika-abh07t:1015_14: pañcaṅgikova hotīti ayamettha aṭṭhakathādito uddhaṭo vinicchayasāro. Theravādadassanādivasappavatto
tika-abh07t:1015_15: pana papañco aṭṭhakathādīsu vuttanayena veditabbo. Yathā cettha, evaṃ sabbatthāpi
tika-abh07t:1015_16: vitthāranayo tattha tattha vuttanayena gahetabbo. Ganthabhīrukajanānuggahatthaṃ panettha
tika-abh07t:1016_2: Āruppañcāpi upekkhekaggatāyogena aṅgasamatāya pañcamajjhāne gayhati, pañcamajjhānavohāraṃ
tika-abh07t:1016_3: labhatītyattho. Atha vā rūpāvacaraṃ cittaṃ anuttarañca paṭhamādijhānabhede “paṭhamajjhānakusalacittaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1016_4: paṭhamajjhānasotāpattimaggacittantyādinā yathā gayhati, tathā āruppañcāpi pañcame
tika-abh07t:1016_5: jhāne gayhatīti yojanā. Ācariyassāpi hi ayameva yojanā adhippetāti dissati nāmarūpaparicchede
tika-abh07t:1019_0: Tasmāti yasmā rūpāvacaraṃ viya anuttarampi paṭhamādijhānabhede gayhati, āruppañcāpi
tika-abh07t:1019_1: pañcame gayhati, yasmā vā jhānaṅgayogabhedena ekekaṃ pañcadhā katvā anuttaraṃ cittaṃ
tika-abh07t:1019_2: cattālīsavidhanti vuccati, rūpāvacaralokuttarāni viya ca paṭhamādijhānabhede, tathā
tika-abh07t:1019_3: āruppañcāpi pañcame gayhati, tasmā paṭhamādikamekekaṃ jhānaṃ lokiyaṃ tividhaṃ, lokuttaraṃ
tika-abh07t:1019_4: aṭṭhavidhanti ekādasavidhaṃ. Ante tu jhānaṃ tevīsatividhaṃ tividharūpāvacaradvādasavidhaarūpāvacaraaṭṭhalokuttaravasenātyattho.
tika-abh07t:1020: 43. Pādakajjhānādivasena gaṇanavuḍḍhi kusalavipākesveva sambhavatīti tesameva gaṇanaṃ ekavīsasatagaṇanāya aṅgabhāvena dassento āha “sattatiṃsā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t:1025_1: vibhajitvā idāni cetasikavibhāgassa anuppattattā paṭhamaṃ tāva catubbidhasampayogalakkhaṇasandassanavasena
tika-abh07t:1025_2: cetasikalakkhaṇaṃ ṭhapetvā, tadanantaraṃ aññasamānaakusalasobhanavasena tīhi rāsīhi
tika-abh07t:1025_3: cetasikadhamme uddisitvā, tesaṃ soḷasahākārehi sampayogaṃ, tettiṃsavidhena saṅgahañca
tika-abh07t:1025_4: dassetuṃ “ekuppādanirodhā cā”tyādi āraddhaṃ. Cittena saha ekato uppādo ca nirodho
tika-abh07t:1025_5: ca yesaṃ te ekuppādanirodhā. Ekaṃ ālambaṇañca vatthu ca yesaṃ te ekālambaṇavatthukā.
tika-abh07t:1025_6: Evaṃ catūhi lakkhaṇehi cetoyuttā cittena sampayuttā dvipaññāsa lakkhaṇā dhāraṇato
tika-abh07t:1025_7: dhammā niyatayogino, aniyatayogino ca cetasikā matā.
tika-abh07t:1026_0: Tattha yadi ekuppādamatteneva cetoyuttāti adhippetā, tadā cittena saha uppajjamānānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1026_1: rūpadhammānampi cetoyuttatā āpajjeyyāti ekanirodhaggahaṇaṃ. Evampi cittānuparivattino
tika-abh07t:1026_2: viññattidvayassa pasaṅgo nasakkā nivāretuṃ, tathā “ekato uppādo vā nirodho vā etesanti
tika-abh07t:1026_3: ekuppādanirodhā”ti parikappentassa puretaramuppajjitvā cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirujjhamānānampi
tika-abh07t:1026_4: rūpadhammānanti ekālambaṇaggahaṇaṃ. Ye evaṃ tividhalakkhaṇā, te niyamato ekavatthuyevātidassanatthaṃ
tika-abh07t:1029_0: 2. Kathanti sarūpasampayogākārānaṃ kathetukamyatāpucchā. Phusatīti phasso, svāyaṃ
tika-abh07t:1029_1: phusanalakkhaṇo. Ayañhi arūpadhammopi samāno ārammaṇe phusanākāreneva pavattati,
tika-abh07t:1029_2: sā cassa phusanākārappavatti ambilakhādakādīnaṃ passantassa parassa kheḷuppādādi
tika-abh07t:1029_3: viya daṭṭhabbā. Vedayati ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavatīti vedanā, sā vedayitalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh07t:1029_4: Ārammaṇarasānubhavanañhi patvā sesasampayuttadhammā ekadesamatteneva rasaṃ anubhavanti,
tika-abh07t:1029_5: ekaṃsato pana issaravatāya vedanāva anubhavati. Tathā hesā “subhojanarasānubhavanakarājā
tika-abh07t:1029_6: viyā”ti vuttā. Sukhādivasena panassā bhedaṃ sayameva vakkhati. Nīlādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:1029_7: sañjānāti saññaṃ katvā jānātīti saññā, sā sañjānanalakkhaṇā. Sā hi uppajjamānā dāruādīsu
tika-abh07t:1029_8: vaḍḍhakiādīnaṃ saññāṇakaraṇaṃ viya pacchā sañjānanassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ ākāraṃ gahetvā
tika-abh07t:1029_9: uppajjati. Nimittakārikāya tāvetaṃ yujjati, nimittena sañjānantiyā pana kathanti?
tika-abh07t:1029_10: Sāpi puna aparāya saññāya sañjānanassa nimittaṃ ākāraṃ gahetvā uppajjatīti na ettha koci asambhavo.
tika-abh07t:1030_0: Ceteti attanā sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe abhisandahati, saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇe vā byāpāramāpajjatīti
tika-abh07t:1030_1: cetanā. Tathā hi ayameva abhisaṅkharaṇe padhānattā vibhaṅge suttantabhājaniye saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ
tika-abh07t:1030_3: niddiṭṭhā. Sā cetayitalakkhaṇā, jeṭṭhasissamahāvaḍḍhakiādayo viya sakiccaparakiccasādhikāti
tika-abh07t:1031_0: Jīvanti tena sampayuttadhammāti jīvitaṃ, tadeva sahajātānupālane ādhipaccayogena
tika-abh07t:1031_1: indriyanti jīvitindriyaṃ, taṃ anupālanalakkhaṇaṃ uppalādianupālakaṃ udakaṃ viya.
tika-abh07t:1031_2: Karaṇaṃ kāro, manasmiṃ kāro manasikāro, so cetaso ārammaṇe samannāhāralakkhaṇo. Vitakko
tika-abh07t:1031_3: hi sahajātadhammānaṃ ārammaṇe abhiniropanasabhāvattā te tattha pakkhipanto viya hoti,
tika-abh07t:1031_4: cetanā attanā ārammaṇaggahaṇena yathāruḷhe dhammepi tattha tattha niyojentī balanāyako
tika-abh07t:1031_5: viya hoti, manasikāro te ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ payojanato ājānīyānaṃ payojanakasārathi
tika-abh07t:1031_6: viyāti ayametesaṃ viseso. Dhammānañhi taṃ taṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvato paṭivijjhitvā
tika-abh07t:1031_7: bhagavatā te te dhammā vibhattāti bhagavati saddhāya “evaṃ visesā ime dhammā”ti okappetvā
tika-abh07t:1031_8: uggahaṇaparipucchādivasena tesaṃ sabhāvasamadhigamāya yogo karaṇīyo, na pana tattha
tika-abh07t:1031_9: tattha vippaṭipajjantehi sammoho āpajjitabboti ayamettha ācariyānaṃ anusāsanī. Sabbesampi
tika-abh07t:1031_10: ekūnanavuticittānaṃ sādhāraṇā niyamato tesu uppajjanatoti sabbacittasādhāraṇā nāma.
tika-abh07t:1032_0: 3. Adhimuccanaṃ adhimokkho, so sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇo, ārammaṇe niccalabhāvena indakhīlo
tika-abh07t:1032_1: viya daṭṭhabbo. Vīrānaṃ bhāvo, kammaṃ, vidhinā īrayitabbaṃ pavattetabbanti vā vīriyaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1032_2: ussāho, so sahajātānaṃ upatthambhanalakkhaṇo. Vīriyavasena hi tesaṃ olīnavuttitā
tika-abh07t:1032_3: na hoti. Evañca katvā imassa vitakkādīhi viseso supākaṭo hoti. Chandanaṃ chando,
tika-abh07t:1032_4: ārammaṇena atthikatā, so kattukāmatālakkhaṇo. Tathā hesa “ārammaṇaggahaṇe cetaso
tika-abh07t:1032_5: hatthappasāraṇaṃ viyā”ti vuccati. Dānavatthuvissajjanavasena pavattakālepi cesa vissajjitabbena
tika-abh07t:1032_6: tena atthikova khipitabbausūnaṃ gahaṇe atthiko issāso viya. Sobhanesu taditaresu
tika-abh07t:1033: 4. Sobhanāpekkhāya itare, itarāpekkhāya sobhanā ca aññe nāma, tesaṃ samānā na uddhaccasaddhādayo viya akusalādisabhāvāyevāti aññasamānā.
tika-abh07t:1036_0: 5. Evaṃ tāva sabbacittasādhāraṇavasena, pakiṇṇakavasena ca sobhanetarasabhāve terasa
tika-abh07t:1036_1: dhamme uddisitvā idāni heṭṭhā cittavibhāge niddiṭṭhānukkamena akusaladhammapariyāpanne
tika-abh07t:1036_2: paṭhamaṃ, tato sobhanadhammapariyāpanne ca dassetuṃ “moho”tyādi vuttaṃ. Ahetukā pana
tika-abh07t:1036_3: āveṇikadhammā natthīti na te visuṃ vuttā. Ārammaṇe muyhatīti moho, aññāṇaṃ, so ārammaṇasabhāvacchādanalakkhaṇo.
tika-abh07t:1036_5: Na hirīyati na lajjatīti ahiriko, puggalo, dhammasamūho vā. Ahirikassa bhāvo ahirikkaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1036_6: tadeva ahirikaṃ. Na ottappatīti anottappaṃ. Tattha gūthato gāmasūkaro viya kāyaduccaritādito
tika-abh07t:1036_7: ajigucchanalakkhaṇaṃ ahirikaṃ, aggito salabho viya tato anuttāsalakkhaṇaṃ anottappaṃ. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-abh07t:1038: Na bhāyati anottappī, salabho viya pāvakā”ti.
tika-abh07t:1039_0: Uddhatassa bhāvo uddhaccaṃ, taṃ cittassa avūpasamalakkhaṇaṃ pāsāṇābhighātasamuddhatabhasmaṃ
tika-abh07t:1039_1: viya. Lubbhatīti lobho, so ārammaṇe abhisaṅgalakkhaṇo makkaṭālepo viya. Cittassa
tika-abh07t:1039_2: ālambitukāmatāmattaṃ chando, lobho tattha abhigijjhananti ayametesaṃ viseso. “Idameva
tika-abh07t:1039_3: saccaṃ, moghamañña”nti micchābhinivesalakkhaṇā diṭṭhi. Ñāṇañhi ārammaṇaṃ yathāsabhāvato
tika-abh07t:1039_4: jānāti, diṭṭhi yathāsabhāvaṃ vijahitvā ayāthāvato gaṇhātīti ayametesaṃ viseso. “Seyyohamasmī”tyādinā
tika-abh07t:1039_5: maññatīti māno, so uṇṇatilakkhaṇo. Tathā hesa “ketukamyatāpaccupaṭṭhāno”ti vutto.
tika-abh07t:1039_6: Dussatīti doso, so caṇḍikkalakkhaṇo pahaṭāsīviso viya, issatīti issā, sā parasampattiusūyanalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh07t:1039_7: Maccharassa bhāvo macchariyaṃ, “mā idaṃ acchariyaṃ aññesaṃ hotu, mayhameva hotū”ti
tika-abh07t:1039_8: pavattaṃ vā macchariyaṃ, taṃ attasampattinigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ. Kucchitaṃ katanti kukataṃ.
tika-abh07t:1039_9: Katākataduccaritasucaritaṃ. Akatampi hi kukata”nti voharanti “yaṃ mayā akataṃ. Taṃ
tika-abh07t:1039_10: kukata”nti. Idha pana katākataṃ ārabbha uppanno vippaṭisāracittuppādo kukataṃ, tassa
tika-abh07t:1039_13: asattivighāto vā, tattha thinaṃ cittassa akammaññatālakkhaṇaṃ, middhaṃ vedanādikkhandhattayassāti
tika-abh07t:1039_14: ayametesaṃ viseso. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ “tattha katamaṃ thinaṃ? Yā cittassa akallatā
tika-abh07t:1039_15: akammaññatā. Tattha katamaṃ middhaṃ? Yā kāyassa akallatā akammaññatā”tyādinā imesaṃ
tika-abh07t:1039_16: niddeso pavatto. Nanu ca “kāyassā”ti vacanato rūpakāyassapi akammaññatā middhanti
tika-abh07t:1039_17: tassa rūpabhāvopi āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati, tattha tattha ācariyehi ānītakāraṇavasenevassa
tika-abh07t:1039_18: paṭikkhittattā. Tathā hi middhavādimatappaṭikkhepanatthaṃ tesaṃ vādanikkhepapubbakaṃ
tika-abh07t:1039_19: aṭṭhakathādīsu bahudhā vitthārenti ācariyā. Ayaṃ panettha saṅgaho –
tika-abh07t:1049: Iti ce natthi taṃ tattha, avisesena pāṭhato.
tika-abh07t:1050: “Sakkā hi anumātuṃ yaṃ, middhaṃ rūpanti cintitaṃ;
tika-abh07t:1058_0: 6. Saddahatīti saddhā, buddhādīsu pasādo, sā sampayuttadhammānaṃ pasādanalakkhaṇā
tika-abh07t:1058_1: udakappasādakamaṇi viya. Saraṇaṃ sati, asammoso, sā sampayuttadhammānaṃ sāraṇalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh07t:1058_2: Hirīyati kāyaduccaritādīhi jigucchatīti hirī, sā pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā. Ottappatīti
tika-abh07t:1058_3: ottappaṃ, taṃ pāpato uttāsalakkhaṇaṃ. Attagāravavasena pāpato jigucchanato kulavadhū
tika-abh07t:1058_4: viya hirī, paragāravavasena pāpato uttāsanato vesiyā viya ottappaṃ. Lobhappaṭipakkho
tika-abh07t:1058_5: alobho, so ārammaṇe cittassa alaggatālakkhaṇo muttabhikkhu viya. Dosappaṭipakkho
tika-abh07t:1058_6: adoso, so acaṇḍikkalakkhaṇo anukūlamitto viya. Tesu dhammesu majjhattatā tatramajjhattatā,
tika-abh07t:1058_7: sā cittacetasikānaṃ ajjhupekkhanalakkhaṇā samappavattānaṃ assānaṃ ajjhupekkhako sārathi viya.
tika-abh07t:1059_0: Kāyassa passambhanaṃ kāyappassaddhi. Cittassa passambhanaṃ cittappassaddhi. Ubhopi
tika-abh07t:1059_1: cetā kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā. Kāyassa lahubhāvo kāyalahutā. Tathā cittalahutā.
tika-abh07t:1059_2: Tā kāyacittagarubhāvavūpasamalakkhaṇā. Kāyassa mudubhāvo kāyamudutā. Tathā cittamudutā.
tika-abh07t:1059_3: Tā kāyacittathaddhabhāvavūpasamalakkhaṇā. Kammani sādhu kammaññaṃ, tassa bhāvo kammaññatā,
tika-abh07t:1059_4: kāyassa kammaññatā kāyakammaññatā. Tathā cittakammaññatā. Tā kāyacittaakammaññabhāvavūpasamalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh07t:1059_5: Paguṇassa bhāvo pāguññaṃ, tadeva pāguññatā, kāyassa pāguññatā kāyapāguññatā. Tathā
tika-abh07t:1059_6: cittapāguññatā. Tā kāyacittānaṃ gelaññavūpasamalakkhaṇā. Kāyassa ujukabhāvo kāyujukatā.
tika-abh07t:1059_7: Tathā cittujukatā. Tā kāyacittānaṃ ajjavalakkhaṇā. Yathākkamaṃ panetā kāyacittānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1059_9: gahaṇaṃ. Yasmā cete dve dve dhammāva ekato hutvā yathāsakaṃ paṭipakkhadhamme hananti,
tika-abh07t:1059_10: tasmā idheva duvidhatā vuttā, na samādhiādīsu. Apica cittappassaddhiādīhi cittasseva
tika-abh07t:1059_11: passaddhādibhāvo hoti, kāyappassaddhiādīhi pana rūpakāyassapi taṃsamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpapharaṇavasenāti
tika-abh07t:1059_12: tadatthasandassanatthañcettha duvidhatā vuttā. Sobhanānaṃ sabbesampi sādhāraṇā niyamena
tika-abh07t:1060_0: 7. Sammā vadanti etāyāti sammāvācā, vacīduccaritavirati. Sā catubbidhā musāvādā veramaṇi,
tika-abh07t:1060_1: pisuṇavācā veramaṇi, pharusavācā veramaṇi, samphappalāpā veramaṇīti. Kammameva kammanto
tika-abh07t:1060_2: suttantavanantādayo viya. Sammā pavatto kammanto sammākammanto, kāyaduccaritavirati.
tika-abh07t:1060_3: Sā tividhā pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, adinnādānā veramaṇi, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇīti.
tika-abh07t:1060_4: Sammā ājīvanti etenāti sammāājīvo, micchājīvavirati. So pana ājīvahetukakāyavacīduccaritato
tika-abh07t:1060_5: viramaṇavasena sattavidho, kuhanalapanādimicchājīvaviramaṇavasena bahuvidho vā. Tividhāpi
tika-abh07t:1060_6: panetā paccekaṃ sampattasamādānasamucchedavirativasena tividhā viratiyo nāma yathāvuttaduccaritehi viramaṇato.
tika-abh07t:1061_0: 8. Karoti paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakhedaṃ janeti, kirati vā vikkhipati paradukkhaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1061_1: kiṇāti vā taṃ hiṃsati, kiriyati vā dukkhitesu pasāriyatīti karuṇā, sā paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā.
tika-abh07t:1061_2: Tāya hi paradukkhaṃ apanīyatu vā, mā vā, tadākāreneva sā pavattati. Modanti etāyāti
tika-abh07t:1061_3: muditā, sā parasampattianumodanalakkhaṇā, appamāṇasattārammaṇattā appamāṇā, tā eva
tika-abh07t:1061_4: appamaññā. Nanu ca “catasso appamaññā”ti vakkhati, kasmā panettha dveyeva vuttāti?
tika-abh07t:1061_5: Adosatatramajjhattatāhi mettupekkhānaṃ gahitattā. Adosoyeva hi sattesu hitajjhāsayavasappavatto
tika-abh07t:1061_6: mettā nāma. Tatramajjhattatāyeva tesu paṭighānunayavūpasamappavattā upekkhā nāma. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-abh07t:1063: Upekkhā gahitā yasmā, tasmā na gahitā ubho”ti. ;
tika-abh07t:1064_0: Pakārena jānāti aniccādivasena avabujjhatīti paññā, sā eva yathāsabhāvāvabodhane
tika-abh07t:1064_1: ādhipaccayogato indriyanti paññindriyaṃ. Atha saññāviññāṇapaññānaṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇanti?
tika-abh07t:1064_2: Saññā tāva nīlādivasena sañjānanamattaṃ karoti, lakkhaṇappaṭivedhaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-abh07t:1064_3: Viññāṇaṃ lakkhaṇappaṭivedhampi sādheti, ussakkitvā pana maggaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-abh07t:1064_4: Paññā pana tividhampi karoti, bālagāmikaheraññikānaṃ kahāpaṇāvabodhanamettha nidassananti.
tika-abh07t:1064_5: Ñāṇavippayuttasaññāya cettha ākāraggahaṇavasena uppajjanakāle viññāṇaṃ abbohārikaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1064_6: sesakāle balavaṃ. Ñāṇasampayuttā pana ubhopi tadanugatikā honti. Sabbathāpi pañcavīsatīti sambandho.
tika-abh07t:1068_0: 10. Cittena saha aviyuttā cittāviyuttā, cetasikāti vuttaṃ hoti. Uppajjatīti uppādo,
tika-abh07t:1068_1: cittameva uppādo cittuppādo. Aññattha pana sasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ cittuppādoti vuccati
tika-abh07t:1068_2: “uppajjati cittaṃ etenāti uppādo, dhammasamūho, cittañca taṃ uppādo cāti cittuppādo”ti
tika-abh07t:1068_3: katvā. Samāhāradvandepi hi pulliṅgaṃ katthaci saddavidū icchanti. Tesaṃ cittāviyuttānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1068_4: cittuppādesu paccekaṃ sampayogo ito paraṃ yathāyogaṃ pavuccatīti sambandho.
tika-abh07t:1070_0: 13. Sabhāvena avitakkattā dvipañcaviññāṇāni vajjitāni etehi, tehi vā etāni vajjitānīti
tika-abh07t:1070_1: dvipañcaviññāṇavajjitāni, catucattālīsa kāmāvacaracittāni. Tesu ceva ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānacittesu
tika-abh07t:1070_2: ca vitakko jāyati sesānaṃ bhāvanābalena avitakkattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh07t:1071: 14. Tesu ceva pañcapaññāsasavitakkacittesu, ekādasasu dutiyajjhānacittesu cāti chasaṭṭhicittesu vicāro jāyati.
tika-abh07t:1072: 15. Dvipañcaviññāṇehi, vicikicchāsahagatena cāti ekādasahi vajjitesu aṭṭhasattaticittesu adhimokkho jāyati.
tika-abh07t:1073: 16. Pañcadvārāvajjanena, dvipañcaviññāṇehi, sampaṭicchanadvayena, santīraṇattayena cāti soḷasahi vajjitesu tesattatiyā cittesu vīriyaṃ jāyati.
tika-abh07t:1074: 17. Domanassasahagatehidvīhi, upekkhāsahagatehi pañcapaññāsacittehi, kāyaviññāṇadvayena, ekādasahi catutthajjhānehi cāti sattaticittehi vajjitesu ekapaññāsacittesu pīti jāyati.
tika-abh07t:1075: 18. Ahetukehi aṭṭhārasahi, momūhehi dvīhi cāti vīsatiyā cittehi vajjitesu ekūnasattaticittesu chando jāyati.
tika-abh07t:1076_0: 19. Te panāti pakiṇṇakavivajjitā taṃsahagatā ca. Yathākkamanti vitakkādichapakiṇṇakavajjitataṃsahitakamānurūpato.
tika-abh07t:1079_1: hi koci pāṇātipātādīsu paṭipajjati, so sabbopi mohena tattha anādīnavadassāvī ahirikena
tika-abh07t:1079_2: tato ajigucchanto, anottappena anottappanto, uddhaccena avūpasanto ca hoti, tasmā
tika-abh07t:1080_1: avadhāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sakkāyādīsu hi abhinivisantassa tattha mamāyanasambhavato
tika-abh07t:1080_2: diṭṭhi lobhasahagatacittesveva labbhati. Mānopi ahaṃmānavasena pavattanato diṭṭhisadisova
tika-abh07t:1080_3: pavattatīti diṭṭhiyā saha ekacittuppādena pavattati kesarasīho viya aparena tathāvidhena
tika-abh07t:1080_4: saha ekaguhāyaṃ, na cāpi dosamūlādīsu uppajjati attasinehasannissayabhāvena ekantalobhapadaṭṭhānattāti
tika-abh07t:1081_0: 24. Tathā parasampattiṃ usūyantassa, attasampattiyā ca parehi sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ anicchantassa,
tika-abh07t:1081_1: katākataduccaritasucarite anusocantassa ca tattha tattha paṭihananavaseneva pavattanato
tika-abh07t:1082: 25. Akammaññatāpakatikassa tathā sabhāvatikkhesu asaṅkhārikesu pavattanāyogato thinamiddhaṃ sasaṅkhārikesveva labbhati.
tika-abh07t:1083_0: 27. Sabbāpuññesveva cattāro cetasikā gatā, lobhamūleyeva yathāsambhavaṃ tayo gatā,
tika-abh07t:1083_1: dosamūlesveva dvīsu cattāro gatā, tathā sasaṅkhāreyeva dvayanti yojanā. Vicikicchā
tika-abh07t:1083_2: vicikicchācitte cāti ca-saddo avadhāraṇe. Vicikicchā vicikicchācitteyevāti sambandho.
tika-abh07t:1086_0: 29. Lokuttaracittesu pādakajjhānādivasena kadāci sammāsaṅkappaviraho siyā, na pana
tika-abh07t:1086_1: viratīnaṃ abhāvo maggassa kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ samucchedavasena, phalassa ca tadanukūlavasena
tika-abh07t:1086_2: pavattanatoti vuttaṃ “viratiyo panā”tyādi. Sabbathāpīti sabbehipi taṃtaṃduccaritadurājīvānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1086_3: vidhamanavasappavattehi ākārehi. Na hi etāsaṃ lokiyesu viya lokuttaresupi musāvādādīnaṃ
tika-abh07t:1086_4: visuṃ visuṃ pahānavasena pavatti hoti sabbesameva duccaritadurājīvānaṃ tena tena
tika-abh07t:1086_5: maggena kesañci sabbaso, kesañci apāyagamanīyādiavatthāya pahānavasena ekakkhaṇe
tika-abh07t:1086_6: samucchindanato. Nanu cāyamattho “ekatovā”ti imināva siddhoti? Taṃ na, tissannaṃ
tika-abh07t:1086_8: adīpitattā. Keci pana imamatthaṃ asallakkhetvāva “‘sabbathāpī’ti idaṃ atiritta”nti
tika-abh07t:1086_9: vadanti, tattha tesaṃ aññāṇameva kāraṇaṃ. “Niyatā”ti imināpi lokiyesu viya kadāci
tika-abh07t:1086_10: sambhavaṃ nivāreti. Tathā hetā lokiyesu yevāpanakavasena desitā, idha pana sarūpeneva.
tika-abh07t:1086_11: Kāmāvacarakusalesvevāti avadhāraṇena kāmāvacaravipākakiriyesu mahaggatesu ca sambhavaṃ
tika-abh07t:1086_12: nivāreti. Tathā ceva upari vakkhati. Kadācīti musāvādādiekekaduccaritehi paṭiviramaṇakāle.
tika-abh07t:1086_13: Kadāci uppajjantāpi na ekato uppajjanti vītikkamitabbavatthusaṅkhātānaṃ attano ārammaṇānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1087_0: 30. Appanāppattānaṃ appamaññānaṃ na kadāci somanassarahitā pavatti atthīti “pañcama…pe…
tika-abh07t:1087_1: cittesu cā”ti vuttaṃ. Vinīvaraṇāditāya mahattaṃ gatāni, mahantehi vā jhāyīhi gatāni
tika-abh07t:1087_2: pattānīti mahaggatāni. Nānā hutvāti bhinnārammaṇattā attano ārammaṇabhūtānaṃ dukkhitasukhitasattānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1087_3: āpāthagamanāpekkhatāya visuṃ visuṃ hutvā. Etthāti imesu kāmāvacarakusalacittesu,
tika-abh07t:1087_5: parikammaṃ hoti, yathā taṃ paguṇaganthaṃ sajjhāyantassa kadāci aññavihitassapi sajjhāyanaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1087_6: yathā ca paguṇavipassanāya saṅkhāre sammasantassa kadāci paricayabalena ñāṇavippayuttacittehipi
tika-abh07t:1087_7: sammasananti upekkhāsahagatakāmāvacaresu karuṇāmuditānaṃ asambhavavādo kecivādo kato.
tika-abh07t:1087_8: Appanāvīthiyaṃ pana tāsaṃ ekantato somanassasahagatesveva sambhavo daṭṭhabbo bhinnajātikassa
tika-abh07t:1088: 32. Tayo soḷasacittesūti sammāvācādayo tayo dhammā aṭṭhalokuttarakāmāvacarakusalavasena soḷasacittesu jāyanti.
tika-abh07t:1089_0: 33. Evaṃ niyatāniyatasampayogavasena vuttesu aniyatadhamme ekato dassetvā sesānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1089_2: nānā kadāci jāyanti, māno ca kadāci “seyyohamasmī”tyādivasappavattiyaṃ jāyati. Thinamiddhaṃ
tika-abh07t:1089_3: tathā kadāci akammaññatāvasappavattiyaṃ saha aññamaññaṃ avippayogivasena jāyatīti
tika-abh07t:1089_4: yojanā. Atha vā māno cāti ettha ca-saddaṃ “sahā”ti etthāpi yojetvā thinamiddhaṃ tathā
tika-abh07t:1089_5: kadāci saha ca sasaṅkhārikapaṭighe, diṭṭhigatavippayuttasasaṅkhārikesu ca issāmacchariyakukkuccehi,
tika-abh07t:1089_6: mānena ca saddhiṃ, kadāci taditarasasaṅkhārikacittasampayogakāle, taṃsampayogakālepi
tika-abh07t:1089_7: vā nānā ca jāyatīti yojanā daṭṭhabbā. Apare pana ācariyā “māno ca thinamiddhañca
tika-abh07t:1089_8: tathā kadāci nānā kadāci saha ca jāyatī”ti ettakameva yojesuṃ.
tika-abh07t:1090_0: 34. Sesāti yathāvuttehi ekādasahi aniyatehi itare ekacattālīsa. Keci pana “yathāvuttehi
tika-abh07t:1090_1: aniyatayevāpanakehi sesā niyatayevāpanakā”ti vaṇṇenti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ, idha
tika-abh07t:1090_2: yevāpanakanāmena kesañci anuddhaṭattā. Kevalañhettha niyatāniyatavasena cittuppādesu
tika-abh07t:1090_3: yathārahaṃ labbhamānacetasikamattasandassanaṃ ācariyena kataṃ, na yevāpanakanāmena keci uddhaṭāti.
tika-abh07t:1091_0: Evaṃ tāva “phassādīsu ayaṃ dhammo ettakesu cittesu upalabbhatī”ti cittaparicchedavasena
tika-abh07t:1091_1: sampayogaṃ dassetvā idāni “imasmiṃ cittuppāde ettakā cetasikā”ti cetasikarāsiparicchedavasena
tika-abh07t:1096_0: 36. Paṭhamajjhāne niyuttāni cittāni, taṃ vā etesaṃ atthīti paṭhamajjhānikacittāni.
tika-abh07t:1096_2: “Tathā”ti iminā aññasamānā, appamaññāvajjitā sobhanacetasikā ca saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti
tika-abh07t:1096_4: sahagatā. Pañcakajjhānavasenāti vitakkavicāre visuṃ visuṃ atikkamitvā bhāventassa
tika-abh07t:1096_5: nātitikkhañāṇassa vasena desitassa jhānapañcakassa vasena. Te pana ekato atikkamitvā
tika-abh07t:1096_6: bhāventassa tikkhañāṇassa vasena desitacatukkajjhānavasena dutiyajjhānikesu vitakkavicāravajjitānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1096_7: sambhavato catudhā eva saṅgaho hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh07t:1099_1: kevalaṃ cittasamādhānamattena mahaggatajjhānāni pavattanti, na pana kāyavacīkammānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1099_3: vuttaṃ “virativajjitā”ti. Paccekamevāti visuṃ visuṃyeva. Pannarasasūti rūpāvacaravasena
tika-abh07t:1099_4: tīsu, āruppavasena dvādasasūti pannarasasu. Appamaññāyo na labbhantīti ettha kāraṇaṃ vuttameva.
tika-abh07t:1102_0: 40. Paccekamevāti ekekāyeva. Appamaññānaṃ hi sattārammaṇattā, viratīnañca vītakkamitabbavatthuvisayattā
tika-abh07t:1102_1: natthi tāsaṃ ekacittuppāde sambhavoti lokiyaviratīnaṃ ekantakusalasabhāvattā natthi
tika-abh07t:1102_2: abyākatesu sambhavoti vuttaṃ “virativajjitā”ti. Tenāha “pañca sikkhāpadā kusalāyevā”ti.
tika-abh07t:1102_3: Itarathā saddhāsatiādayo viya “siyā kusalā, siyā abyākatā”ti vadeyya. Phalassa pana
tika-abh07t:1102_4: maggapaṭibimbabhūtattā, duccaritadurājīvānaṃ paṭippassambhanato ca na lokuttaraviratīnaṃ
tika-abh07t:1102_5: ekantakusalatā yuttāti tāsaṃ tattha aggahaṇaṃ. Kāmāvacaravipākānampi ekantaparittārammaṇattā,
tika-abh07t:1103_0: Nanu ca paññattādiārammaṇampi kāmāvacarakusalaṃ hotīti tassa vipākenapi kusalasadisārammaṇena
tika-abh07t:1103_1: bhavitabbaṃ yathā taṃ mahaggatalokuttaravipākehīti? Nayidamevaṃ, kāmataṇhādhīnassa
tika-abh07t:1103_2: phalabhūtattā. Yathā hi dāsiyā putto mātarā icchitaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto sāmikeneva icchiticchitaṃ
tika-abh07t:1103_3: karoti, evaṃ kāmataṇhāyattatāya dāsisadisassa kāmāvacarakammassa vipākabhūtaṃ cittaṃ
tika-abh07t:1103_4: tena gahitārammaṇaṃ aggahetvā kāmataṇhārammaṇameva gaṇhātīti. Dvādasadhāti kusalavipākakiriyabhedesu
tika-abh07t:1103_5: paccekaṃ cattāro cattāro dukāti katvā tīsu dvādasadhā.
tika-abh07t:1104_0: 42. Idāni imesu paṭhamajjhānikādīhi dutiyajjhānikādīnaṃ bhedakaradhamme dassetuṃ
tika-abh07t:1104_1: “anuttare jhānadhammā”tyādi vuttaṃ. Anuttare citte vitakkavicārapītisukhavasena jhānadhammā
tika-abh07t:1104_2: visesakā bhedakā. Majjhime mahaggate appamaññā, jhānadhammā ca. Parittesu kāmāvacaresu
tika-abh07t:1104_3: viratī, ñāṇapītī ca appamaññā ca visesakā, tattha viratī kusalehi vipākakiriyānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1104_4: visesakā, appamaññā kusalakiriyehi vipākānaṃ, ñāṇapītī pana tīsu paṭhamayugaḷādīhi
tika-abh07t:1107: 44. Dutiye asaṅkhāriketi diṭṭhivippayutte asaṅkhārike lobhamānena tatheva aññasamānā, akusalasādhāraṇā ca ekūnavīsati dhammāti sambandho.
tika-abh07t:1110: 47. Issāmacchariyakukkuccāni panettha paccekameva yojetabbāni bhinnārammaṇattāyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh07t:1111: 50. Adhimokkhassa nicchayākārappavattito dveḷhakasabhāve vicikicchācitte sambhavo natthīti “adhimokkhavirahitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1112_1: vīsa pañcame asaṅkhārike, ekavīsa paṭhamadutiyasasaṅkhārikesu, vīsati tatiyacatutthasasaṅkhārikesu,
tika-abh07t:1112_2: dvāvīsa pañcame sasaṅkhārike, pannarasa momūhadvayeti evaṃ akusale sattadhā ṭhitāti yojanā.
tika-abh07t:1113_0: 52. Sādhāraṇāti akusalānaṃ sabbesameva sādhāraṇabhūtā cattāro samānā ca chandapītiadhimokkhavajjitā
tika-abh07t:1113_1: aññasamānā apare dasāti ete cuddasa dhammā sabbākusalayoginoti pavuccantīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t:1117: 56. Manoviññāṇadhātuyā viya visiṭṭhamananakiccāyogato mananamattā dhātūti manodhātu. Ahetukapaṭisandhiyugaḷeti upekkhāsantīraṇadvaye.
tika-abh07t:1118_1: pañcasu, satta dvipañcaviññāṇesūti aṭṭhārasāhetukesu cittuppādesu saṅgaho catubbidho hotīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t:1119: 59. Tettiṃsavidhasaṅgahoti anuttare pañca, tathā mahaggate, kāmāvacarasobhane dvādasa, akusale satta, ahetuke cattāroti tettiṃsavidhasaṅgaho.
tika-abh07t:1120_0: 60. Itthaṃ yathāvuttanayena cittāviyuttānaṃ cetasikānaṃ cittaparicchedavasena vuttaṃ
tika-abh07t:1120_1: sampayogañca cetasikarāsiparicchedavasena vuttaṃ saṅgahañca ñatvā yathāyogaṃ cittena
tika-abh07t:1120_2: samaṃ bhedaṃ uddise “sabbacittasādhāraṇā tāva satta ekūnanavuticittesu uppajjanato
tika-abh07t:1120_3: paccekaṃ ekūnanavutividhā, pakiṇṇakesu vitakko pañcapaññāsacittesu uppajjanato pañcapaññāsavidho”tyādinā katheyyāti attho.
tika-abh07t:1125_1: ca pakiṇṇakasaṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ “sampayuttā yathāyoga”ntyādi āraddhaṃ. Yathāyogaṃ sampayuttā
tika-abh07t:1125_2: cittacetasikā dhammā sabhāvato attano attano sabhāvavasena ekūnanavutividhampi cittaṃ
tika-abh07t:1126_0: 2. Idāni tesaṃ dhammānaṃ yathārahaṃ vedanā…pe… vatthuto saṅgaho nāma vedanāsaṅgahādināmako
tika-abh07t:1126_2: na katthaci taṃvirahena nīyate upanīyate, āharīyatītyattho.
tika-abh07t:1128_0: 3. Tatthāti tesu chasu saṅgahesu. Sukhādivedanānaṃ, taṃsahagatacittuppādānañca vibhāgavasena
tika-abh07t:1128_1: saṅgaho vedanāsaṅgaho. Dukkhato, sukhato ca aññā adukkhamasukhā ma-kārāgamavasena.
tika-abh07t:1128_2: Nanu ca “dvemā, bhikkhave, vedanā sukhā dukkhā”ti vacanato dve eva vedanāti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1128_3: taṃ pana anavajjapakkhikaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ sukhavedanāyaṃ, sāvajjapakkhikañca dukkhavedanāyaṃ
tika-abh07t:1128_4: saṅgahetvā vuttaṃ. Yampi katthaci sutte “yaṃ kiñci vedayitamidamettha dukkhassā”ti
tika-abh07t:1128_5: vacanaṃ, taṃ saṅkhāradukkhatāya sabbavedanānaṃ dukkhasabhāvattā vuttaṃ. Yathāha –
tika-abh07t:1128_6: “saṅkhārāniccataṃ, ānanda, mayā sandhāya bhāsitaṃ saṅkhāravipariṇāmatañca yaṃ kiñcivedayitamidamettha
tika-abh07t:1128_7: dukkhassā”ti. Tasmā tissoyeva vedanāti daṭṭhabbā. Tenāha bhagavā – “tisso imā, bhikkhave,
tika-abh07t:1128_8: vedanā sukhā dukkhā adukkhamasukhā cā”ti. Evaṃ tividhāpi panetā indriyadesanāyaṃ
tika-abh07t:1128_10: desitāti taṃvasenapettha vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “sukhaṃ dukkha”ntyādi vuttaṃ. Kāyikamānasikasātāsātabhedato
tika-abh07t:1128_11: hi sukhaṃ dukkhañca paccekaṃ dvidhā vibhajitvā “sukhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ
tika-abh07t:1128_12: domanassindriya”nti desitā, upekkhā pana bhedābhāvato upekkhindriyanti ekadhāva.
tika-abh07t:1128_13: Yathā hi sukhadukkhāni aññathā kāyassa anuggahamupaghātañca karonti, aññathā manaso,
tika-abh07t:1128_14: nevaṃ upekkhā, tasmā sā ekadhāva desitā, tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-abh07t:1131_1: dukkhaṃ. Sabhāvato, parikappato vā iṭṭhānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ somanassaṃ. Tathā aniṭṭhānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:1133: 7. Sesānīti sukhadukkhasomanassadomanassasahagatehi avasesāni akusalato cha, ahetukato cuddasa, kāmāvacarasobhanato dvādasa, pañcamajjhānikāni tevīsāti sabbānipi pañcapaññāsa.
tika-abh07t:1136_0: 10. Lobhādihetūnaṃ vibhāgavasena, taṃsampayuttavasena ca saṅgaho hetusaṅgaho. Hetavo
tika-abh07t:1136_1: nāma chabbidhā bhavantīti sambandho. Hetubhāvo pana nesaṃ sampayuttānaṃ suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanasaṅkhāto
tika-abh07t:1136_2: mūlabhāvo. Laddhahetupaccayā hi dhammā viruḷhamūlā viya pādapā thirā honti, na ahetukā
tika-abh07t:1136_3: viya jalatale sevālasadisā. Evañca katvā ete mūlasadisatāya “mūlānī”ti ca vuccanti.
tika-abh07t:1136_4: Apare pana “kusalādīnaṃ kusalādibhāvasādhanaṃ hetubhāvo”ti vadanti, evaṃ sati hetūnaṃ
tika-abh07t:1136_5: attano kusalādibhāvasādhano añño hetu maggitabbo siyā. Atha sesasampayuttahetupaṭibaddho
tika-abh07t:1136_6: tesaṃ kusalādibhāvo, evampi momūhacittasampayuttassa hetuno akusalabhāvo appaṭibaddho
tika-abh07t:1136_7: siyā. Atha tassa sabhāvato akusalabhāvopi siyā, evaṃ sati sesahetūnampi sabhāvatova
tika-abh07t:1136_8: kusalādibhāvoti tesaṃ viya sampayuttadhammānampi so hetupaṭibaddho na siyā. Yadi
tika-abh07t:1136_9: ca hetupaṭibaddho kusalādibhāvo, tadā ahetukānaṃ abyākatabhāvo na siyāti alamatinippīḷanena.
tika-abh07t:1136_11: “yoniso, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā
tika-abh07t:1136_12: ca kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī”tyādi, abyākatānaṃ pana abyākatabhāvo niranusayasantānappaṭibaddho
tika-abh07t:1137: 16. Idāni hetūnaṃ jātibhedaṃ dassetuṃ “lobho doso cā”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1140_0: 18. Paṭisandhādīnaṃ kiccānaṃ vibhāgavasena, taṃkiccavantānañca paricchedavasena saṅgaho
tika-abh07t:1140_1: kiccasaṅgaho. Bhavato bhavassa paṭisandhānaṃ paṭisandhikiccaṃ. Avicchedappavattihetubhāvena
tika-abh07t:1140_2: bhavassa aṅgabhāvo bhavaṅgakiccaṃ. Āvajjanakiccādīni heṭṭhā vuttavacanatthānusārena
tika-abh07t:1140_3: yathārahaṃ yojetabbāni. Ārammaṇe taṃtaṃkiccasādhanavasena anekakkhattuṃ, ekakkhattuṃ
tika-abh07t:1140_4: vā javamānassa viya pavatti javanakiccaṃ. Taṃtaṃjavanaggahitārammaṇassa ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:1141_0: 19. Imāni pana kiccāni ṭhānavasena pākaṭāni hontīti taṃ dāni pabhedato dassetuṃ “paṭisandhī”tyādi
tika-abh07t:1141_1: vuttaṃ, tattha paṭisandhiyā ṭhānaṃ paṭisandhiṭhānaṃ. Kāmaṃ paṭisandhivinimuttaṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1141_2: nāma natthi, sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ pana “silāputtakassa sarīra”ntyādīsu viya abhedepi
tika-abh07t:1141_3: bhedaparikappanāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi. Dassanādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1142_0: Tattha cutibhavaṅgānaṃ antarā paṭisandhiṭhānaṃ. Paṭisandhiāvajjanānaṃ, javanāvajjanānaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1142_2: antarā bhavaṅgaṭhānaṃ. Bhavaṅgapañcaviññāṇānaṃ, bhavaṅgajavanānañca antarā āvajjanaṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1143_1: Evañca katvā paṭṭhāne “upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati
tika-abh07t:1143_2: na hetupaccayā”ti evamāgatassa upekkhāsahagatapadassa vibhaṅge “ahetukaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ
tika-abh07t:1143_3: ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe
tika-abh07t:1143_4: upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho”ti
tika-abh07t:1143_6: pana “ahetukaṃ pītisahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭiccatayo khandhā…pe… dve khandhā. Ahetukaṃ
tika-abh07t:1143_7: sukhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā …pe… eko khandho”ti pavattivaseneva
tika-abh07t:1143_8: uddhaṭo, na pana “ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe”tyādinā paṭisandhivasena, tasmā yathādhammasāsane
tika-abh07t:1143_9: avacanampi abhāvameva dīpetīti na tassa paṭisandhivasena pavatti atthi. Yattha pana
tika-abh07t:1143_10: labbhamānassapi kassaci avacanaṃ, tattha kāraṇaṃ upari āvi bhavissati.
tika-abh07t:1144_0: 25. Manodvārāvajjanassa parittārammaṇe dvattikkhattuṃ pavattamānassapi natthi javanakiccaṃ
tika-abh07t:1144_2: vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā”ti. Itarathā “javanaṃ hutvā”ti vattabbaṃ
tika-abh07t:1144_4: akusalāni, cattāri lokuttaraphalacittāni, aṭṭhārasa tebhūmakakiriyacittāni. Ekacittakkhaṇikampi
tika-abh07t:1144_5: hi lokuttaramaggādikaṃ taṃsabhāvavantatāya javanakiccaṃ nāma, yathā ekekagocaravisayampi
tika-abh07t:1144_6: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sakalavisayāvabodhanasāmatthiyayogato na kadāci taṃnāmaṃ vijahatīti.
tika-abh07t:1145: 27. Evaṃ kiccabhedena vuttāneva yathāsakaṃ labbhamānakiccagaṇanavasena sampiṇḍetvā dassetuṃ “tesu panā”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1146_0: 33. Paṭisandhādayo cittuppādā nāmakiccabhedena paṭisandhādīnaṃ nāmānaṃ, kiccānañca
tika-abh07t:1146_1: bhedena, atha vā paṭisandhādayo nāma tannāmakā cittuppādā paṭisandhādīnaṃ kiccānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1146_2: bhedena cuddasa, ṭhānabhedena paṭisandhādīnaṃyeva ṭhānānaṃ bhedena dasadhā pakāsitāti
tika-abh07t:1146_4: yathākkamaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhi, tathā dve ca nava ca aṭṭha ca dve cāti niddiseti sambandho.
tika-abh07t:1149: 35. Dvārānaṃ, dvārappavattacittānañca paricchedavasena saṅgaho dvārasaṅgaho. Āvajjanādīnaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ pavattimukhabhāvato dvārāni viyāti dvārāni.
tika-abh07t:1151: 37. Āvajjanādīnaṃ manānaṃ, manoyeva vā dvāranti manodvāraṃ. Bhavaṅganti āvajjanānantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-abh07t:1153_0: 39. Tatthāti tesu cakkhādidvāresu cakkhudvāre chacattālīsa cittāni yathārahamuppajjantīti
tika-abh07t:1153_1: sambandho. Pañcadvārāvajjanamekaṃ, cakkhuviññāṇādīni ubhayavipākavasena satta, voṭṭhabbanamekaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1153_3: ca aggahitaggahaṇena aṭṭhevāti chacattālīsa. Yathārahanti iṭṭhādiārammaṇe yonisoayonisomanasikāraniranusayasantānādīnaṃ
tika-abh07t:1153_5: kāmāvacarānevāti yojanā. Sabbathāpi catupaññāsa cittānīti vā sambandho. Sabbathāpi
tika-abh07t:1154: 41. Cakkhādidvāresu appavattanato, manodvārasaṅkhātabhavaṅgato ārammaṇantaraggahaṇavasena appavattito ca paṭisandhādivasena pavattāni ekūnavīsati dvāravimuttāni.
tika-abh07t:1155: 42. Dvipañcaviññāṇāni sakasakadvāre, chabbīsati mahaggatalokuttarajavanāni manodvāreyeva uppajjanato chattiṃsa cittāni yathārahaṃ sakasakadvārānurūpaṃ ekadvārikacittāni.
tika-abh07t:1156: 45. Pañcadvāresu santīraṇatadārammaṇavasena, manodvāre ca tadārammaṇavasena pavattanato chadvārikāni ceva paṭisandhādivasappavattiyā dvāravimuttāni ca.
tika-abh07t:1157_0: 47. Pañcadvārikāni ca chadvārikāni ca pañcachadvārikāni. Chadvārikāni ca tāni kadāci
tika-abh07t:1157_1: dvāravimuttāni cāti chadvārikavimuttāni. Atha vā chadvārikāni ca chadvārikavimuttāni
tika-abh07t:1160_0: 48. Ārammaṇānaṃ sarūpato, vibhāgato, taṃvisayacittato ca saṅgaho ālambaṇasaṅgaho.
tika-abh07t:1160_1: Vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ rūpayati hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti rūpaṃ, tadeva dubbalapurisena
tika-abh07t:1160_2: daṇḍādi viya cittacetasikehi ālambīyati, tāni vā āgantvā ettha ramantīti ārammaṇanti
tika-abh07t:1160_3: rūpārammaṇaṃ. Saddīyatīti saddo, soyeva ārammaṇanti saddārammaṇaṃ. Gandhayati attano
tika-abh07t:1160_4: vatthuṃ sūceti “idamettha atthī”ti pesuññaṃ karontaṃ viya hotīti gandho, soyeva ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:1160_5: gandhārammaṇaṃ. Rasanti taṃ sattā assādentīti raso, soyeva ārammaṇaṃ rasārammaṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1160_6: Phusīyatīti phoṭṭhabbaṃ, tadeva ārammaṇaṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ. Dhammoyeva ārammaṇaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1161: 49. Tatthāti tesu rūpādiārammaṇesu, rūpamevāti vaṇṇāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ rūpameva. Saddādayoti saddāyatanādisaṅkhātā saddādayo, āpodhātuvajjitabhūtattayasaṅkhātaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca.
tika-abh07t:1164_0: 52. Chabbidhampīti rūpādivasena chabbidhampi. Vināsābhāvato atītādikālavasena navattabbattā
tika-abh07t:1164_1: nibbānaṃ, paññatti ca kālavimuttaṃ nāma. Yathārahanti kāmāvacarajavanaabhiññāsesamahaggatādijavanānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1164_2: anurūpato. Kāmāvacarajavanānañhi hasituppādavajjānaṃ chabbidhampi tikālikaṃ, kālavimuttañca
tika-abh07t:1164_3: ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Hasituppādassa tikālikameva. Tathā hissa ekantaparittārammaṇataṃ
tika-abh07t:1164_4: vakkhati. Dibbacakkhādivasappavattassa pana abhiññājavanassa yathārahaṃ chabbidhampi
tika-abh07t:1164_5: tikālikaṃ, kālavimuttañca ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Vibhāgo panettha navamaparicchede āvi bhavissati.
tika-abh07t:1164_6: Sesānaṃ pana kālavimuttaṃ, atītañca yathārahamārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t:1165_0: 53. Dvāra…pe… saṅkhātānaṃ chabbidhampi ārammaṇaṃ hotīti sambandho, taṃ pana nesaṃ
tika-abh07t:1165_1: ārammaṇaṃ na āvajjanassa viya kenaci aggahitameva gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati, na ca pañcadvārikajavanānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1165_2: viya ekantapaccuppannaṃ, nāpi manodvārikajavanānaṃ viya tikālikameva, avisesena kālavimuttaṃ
tika-abh07t:1165_3: vā, nāpi maraṇāsannato purimabhāgajavanānaṃ viya kammakammanimittādivasena āgamasiddhivohāravinimuttanti
tika-abh07t:1165_6: tāva rūpādipañcārammaṇaṃ chadvāraggahitaṃ yathārahaṃ paccuppannamatītañca kammanimittasammatamārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:1165_7: hoti, tathā cuticittassa atītameva. Dhammārammaṇaṃ pana tesaṃ tiṇṇannampi manodvāraggahitameva
tika-abh07t:1165_8: atītaṃ kammakammanimittasammataṃ, tathā rūpārammaṇaṃ ekameva manodvāraggahitaṃ ekantapaccuppannaṃ
tika-abh07t:1167_0: Yebhuyyena bhavantare chadvāraggahitanti bāhullena atītānantarabhave maraṇāsannappavattachadvārikajavanehi
tika-abh07t:1167_1: gahitaṃ. Asaññībhavato cutānañhi paṭisandhivisayassa anantarātītabhave na kenaci
tika-abh07t:1167_2: dvārena gahaṇaṃ atthīti tadevettha yebhuyyaggahaṇena byabhicāritaṃ. Kevalañhi kammabaleneva
tika-abh07t:1167_3: tesaṃ paṭisandhiyā kammanimittādikamārammaṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti. Tathā hi saccasaṅkhepe asaññībhavato
tika-abh07t:1170_0: Kevalaṃ kammabaleneva paṭisandhigocarassa upaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Itarathā hi javanaggahitassapi
tika-abh07t:1170_2: āpajjeyyāti. Nanu ca tesampi paṭisandhigocaro kammabhave kenaci dvārena javanaggahito
tika-abh07t:1170_3: sambhavatīti? Saccaṃ sambhavati kammakammanimittasammato, gatinimittasammato pana
tika-abh07t:1170_4: sabbesampi maraṇakāleyeva upaṭṭhātīti kuto tassa kammabhave gahaṇasambhavo. Apicettha
tika-abh07t:1170_6: katvā ācariyena imasmiṃyeva adhikāre paramatthavinicchaye vuttaṃ –
tika-abh07t:1173_0: “Paccuppanna”ntyādinā anāgatassa paṭisandhigocarabhāvaṃ nivāreti. Na hi taṃ atītakammakammanimittāni
tika-abh07t:1173_1: viya anubhūtaṃ, nāpi paccuppannakammanimittagatinimittāni viya āpāthagatañca hotīti,
tika-abh07t:1174: 54. Tesūti rūpādipaccuppannādikammādiārammaṇesu viññāṇesu. Rūpādīsu ekekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etesanti rūpādiekekārammaṇāni.
tika-abh07t:1176_3: santīraṇādivasena rūpādipañcārammaṇe, paṭisandhādivasena chaḷārammaṇasaṅkhāte kāmāvacarārammaṇeyeva pavattanti.
tika-abh07t:1177_0: Hasanacittampi padhānasāruppaṭṭhānaṃ disvā tussantassa rūpārammaṇe, bhaṇḍabhājanaṭṭhāne
tika-abh07t:1177_1: mahāsaddaṃ sutvā “evarūpā loluppataṇhā me pahīnā”ti tussantassa saddārammaṇe, gandhādīhi
tika-abh07t:1177_2: cetiyapūjanakāle tussantassa gandhārammaṇe, rasasampannaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ sabrahmacārīhi
tika-abh07t:1177_5: tussantassa dhammārammaṇeti evaṃ parittadhammapariyāpannesveva chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati.
tika-abh07t:1178_1: lokuttaradhamme ārabbha pavattituṃ na sakkontīti navavidhalokuttaradhamme vajjetvā
tika-abh07t:1178_2: tebhūmakāni, paññattiñca ārabbha pavattantīti āha “akusalāni cevā”tyādi. Imesu hi
tika-abh07t:1178_3: akusalato cattāro diṭṭhigatasampayuttacittuppādā parittadhamme ārabbha parāmasanaassādanābhinandanakāle
tika-abh07t:1178_4: kāmāvacarārammaṇā, tenevākārena sattavīsati mahaggatadhamme ārabbha pavattiyaṃ mahaggatārammaṇā,
tika-abh07t:1178_5: sammutidhamme ārabbha pavattiyaṃ paññattārammaṇā. Diṭṭhivippayuttacittuppādāpi teyeva
tika-abh07t:1178_6: dhamme ārabbha kevalaṃ assādanābhinandanavasena pavattiyaṃ, paṭighasampayuttā ca
tika-abh07t:1178_9: kusalato cattāro, kiriyato cattāroti aṭṭha ñāṇavippayuttacittuppādā sekkhaputhujjanakhīṇāsavānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1179_1: Sekkhāpi hi ṭhapetvā lokiyacittaṃ arahato maggaphalasaṅkhātaṃ pāṭipuggalikacittaṃ
tika-abh07t:1179_2: jānituṃ na sakkonti anadhigatattā, tathā puthujjanādayopi sotāpannādīnaṃ, sekkhānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1179_3: pana attano attano maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇesu parasantānagatamaggaphalārammaṇāya abhiññāya
tika-abh07t:1179_4: parikammakāle, abhiññācitteneva maggaphalānaṃ paricchindanakāle ca attano attano
tika-abh07t:1179_5: samānānaṃ, heṭṭhimānañca maggaphaladhamme ārabbha kusalajavanānaṃ pavatti atthīti
tika-abh07t:1180_1: sabbārammaṇāni, na pana akusalādayo viya sappadesasabbārammaṇānītyattho. Kiriyajavanānañhi
tika-abh07t:1180_3: na ca kiñci agocaraṃ nāma atthi.
tika-abh07t:1182: 61. Sesāni…pe… paññattārammaṇānīti pannarasa rūpāvacarāni, paṭhamatatiyāruppāni cāti ekavīsati kasiṇādipaññattīsu pavattanato paññattārammaṇāni.
tika-abh07t:1183_1: kāmāvacarārammaṇe yeva bhavanti. Kāmāvacarañhi mahaggatādayo upādāya mandānubhāvatāya
tika-abh07t:1183_2: parisamantato attaṃ khaṇḍitaṃ viyāti parittaṃ. “Cha cittāni mahaggateyevā”tyādinā
tika-abh07t:1186: 64. Vatthuvibhāgato, tabbatthukacittaparicchedavasena ca saṅgaho vatthusaṅgaho. Vasanti etesu cittacetasikā tannissayattāti vatthūni.
tika-abh07t:1187: 65. Tāni kāmaloke sabbānipi labbhanti paripuṇṇindriyassa tattheva upalabbhanato. Pi-saddena pana andhabadhirādivasena kesañci asambhavaṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh07t:1188_2: pana cakkhusotesu avirattabhāvato cakkhādidvayaṃ tattha upalabbhati.
tika-abh07t:1189: 67. Arūpaloke sabbānipi cha vatthūni na saṃvijjanti arūpīnaṃ rūpavirāgabhāvanābalena tattha sabbena sabbaṃ rūpappavattiyā abhāvato.
tika-abh07t:1192_0: 70. Manoyeva visiṭṭhavijānanakiccayogato viññāṇaṃ nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena dhātu cāti
tika-abh07t:1192_1: manoviññāṇadhātu. Manaso viññāṇadhātūti vā manoviññāṇadhātu. Sā hi manatoyeva anantarapaccayato
tika-abh07t:1192_2: sambhūyamanasoyeva anantarapaccayabhūtāti manaso sambandhinī hoti. Santīraṇattayassa,
tika-abh07t:1192_4: vasena pavattā yathāvuttamanodhātupañcaviññāṇadhātūhi avasesā manoviññāṇadhātu saṅkhātā
tika-abh07t:1192_5: ca tiṃsa dhammā na kevalaṃ manodhātuyeva, tathā hadayaṃ nissāyeva pavattantīti sambandho.
tika-abh07t:1193_0: Santīraṇamahāvipākāni hi ekādasa dvārābhāvato, kiccābhāvato ca āruppe na uppajjanti.
tika-abh07t:1193_1: Paṭighassa anīvaraṇāvatthassa abhāvato taṃsahagataṃ cittadvayaṃ rūpalokepi natthi,
tika-abh07t:1193_2: pageva āruppe. Paṭhamamaggopi paratoghosapaccayābhāve sāvakānaṃ anuppajjanato, buddhapaccekabuddhānañca
tika-abh07t:1193_3: manussalokato aññattha anibbattanato, hasanacittañca kāyābhāvato, rūpāvacarāni arūpīnaṃ
tika-abh07t:1193_4: rūpavirāgabhāvanāvasena tadārammaṇesu jhānesupi virattabhāvato arūpabhave na uppajjantīti
tika-abh07t:1193_5: sabbānipi etāni tettiṃsa cittāni hadayaṃ nissāyeva pavattanti.
tika-abh07t:1194_0: 71. Pañcarūpāvacarakusalato avasesāni dvādasa lokiyakusalāni, paṭighadvayato avasesāni
tika-abh07t:1194_1: dasa akusalāni, pañcadvārāvajjanahasanarūpāvacarakiriyehi avasesāni terasa kiriyacittāni,
tika-abh07t:1194_2: paṭhamamaggato avasesāni satta anuttarāni cāti imesaṃ vasena dvecattālīsavidhā manoviññāṇadhātusaṅkhātā
tika-abh07t:1194_3: dhammā pañcavokārabhavavasena hadayaṃ nissāya vā, catuvokārabhavavasena anissāyavā pavattanti.
tika-abh07t:1195_0: 73. Kāme bhave chavatthuṃ nissitā satta viññāṇadhātuyo, rūpe bhave tivatthuṃ nissitā
tika-abh07t:1195_1: ghānaviññāṇādittayavajjitā catubbidhā viññāṇadhātuyo, āruppe bhave anissitā ekā manoviññāṇadhātu matāti yojanā.
tika-abh07t:1196_1: pannarasa rūpāvacarāni, paṭhamamaggoti tecattālīsa nissāyeva jāyare, tatoyeva avasesā
tika-abh07t:1196_2: āruppavipākavajjitā dvecattālīsa nissāya ca anissāya ca jāyare, pākāruppā cattāro
tika-abh07t:1201_0: 1. Iccevaṃ yathāvuttanayena cittuppādānaṃ catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ uttaraṃ vedanāsaṅgahādivibhāgato
tika-abh07t:1201_1: uttamaṃ pabhedasaṅgahaṃ katvā puna kāmāvacarādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhūmīnaṃ, dvihetukādipuggalānañca
tika-abh07t:1201_2: bhedena lakkhitaṃ “idaṃ ettakehi paraṃ, imassa anantaraṃ ettakāni cittānī”ti evaṃ
tika-abh07t:1201_3: pubbāparacittehi niyāmitaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsu cittuppādānaṃ pavattisaṅgahaṃ nāma
tika-abh07t:1201_4: tannāmakaṃ saṅgahaṃ yathāsambhavato samāsena pavakkhāmīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t:1202: 2. Vatthudvārārammaṇasaṅgahā heṭṭhā kathitāpi paripuṇṇaṃ katvā pavattisaṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ puna nikkhittā.
tika-abh07t:1203: 3. Visayānaṃ dvāresu, visayesu ca cittānaṃ pavatti visayappavatti.
tika-abh07t:1206_2: cakkhuviññāṇavīthī”tyādinā viññāṇavasena vā vīthīnaṃ nāma yojanā kātabbāti dassetuṃ
tika-abh07t:1209_1: atimahantaṃ nāma. Dviticittakkhaṇātītaṃ hutvā pannarasacuddasacittakkhaṇāyukaṃ mahantaṃ
tika-abh07t:1209_2: nāma. Catucittakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva navacittakkhaṇātītaṃ hutvā terasacittakkhaṇato
tika-abh07t:1209_3: paṭṭhāya yāva aṭṭhacittakkhaṇāyutaṃ parittaṃ nāma. Dasacittakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva
tika-abh07t:1209_4: pannarasacittakkhaṇātītaṃ hutvā sattacittakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva dvicittakkhaṇāyukaṃ
tika-abh07t:1209_5: atiparittaṃ nāma. Evañca katvā vakkhati “ekacittakkhaṇātītānī”tyādi. Vibhūtaṃ pākaṭaṃ. Avibhūtaṃ apākaṭaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1212_0: 8. Kathanti kena pakārena atimahantādivasena visayavavatthānanti pucchitvā cittakkhaṇavasena
tika-abh07t:1212_1: taṃ pakāsetuṃ “uppādaṭhitī”tyādi āraddhaṃ. Uppajjanaṃ uppādo, attapaṭilābho. Bhañjanaṃ
tika-abh07t:1212_2: bhaṅgo, sarūpavināso. Ubhinnaṃ vemajjhe bhaṅgābhimukhappavatti ṭhiti nāma. Keci pana
tika-abh07t:1212_3: cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇaṃ paṭisedhenti. Ayañhi nesaṃ adhippāyo – cittayamake “uppannaṃ
tika-abh07t:1212_4: uppajjamāna”nti evamādipadānaṃ vibhaṅge “bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannaṃ, no ca uppajjamānaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1212_5: uppādakkhaṇe uppannañceva uppajjamānañcā”tyādinā bhaṅguppādāva kathitā, na ṭhitikkhaṇo.
tika-abh07t:1212_6: Yadi ca cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇopi atthi, “ṭhitikkhaṇe bhaṅgakkhaṇe cā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh07t:1212_7: Atha mataṃ “uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatīti suttantapāṭhato
tika-abh07t:1212_8: ṭhitikkhaṇo atthī”ti, tatthapi ekasmiṃ dhamme aññathattassa anuppajjanato, paññāṇavacanato
tika-abh07t:1212_9: ca pabandhaṭhitiyeva adhippetā, na ca khaṇaṭhiti, na ca abhidhamme labbhamānassa
tika-abh07t:1212_10: avacane kāraṇaṃ atthi, tasmā yathādhammasāsane avacanampi abhāvameva dīpetīti. Tattha
tika-abh07t:1212_11: vuccate yatheva hi ekadhammādhārabhāvepi uppādabhaṅgānaṃ añño uppādakkhaṇo, añño
tika-abh07t:1212_12: bhaṅgakkhaṇoti uppādāvatthāya bhinnā bhaṅgāvatthā icchitā. Itarathā hi “aññoyeva
tika-abh07t:1212_13: dhammo uppajjati, añño nirujjhatī”ti āpajjeyya, evameva uppādabhaṅgāvatthāhi bhinnā
tika-abh07t:1212_14: bhaṅgābhimukhāvatthāpi icchitabbā, sā ṭhiti nāma. Pāḷiyaṃ pana veneyyajjhāsayānurodhato
tika-abh07t:1212_15: nayadassanavasena sā na vuttā. Abhidhammadesanāpi hi kadāci veneyyajjhāsayānurodhena
tika-abh07t:1212_16: pavattati, yathā rūpassa uppādo upacayo santatīti dvidhā bhinditvā desito, sutte
tika-abh07t:1212_17: ca “tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, saṅkhatassa saṅkhatalakkhaṇāni. Katamāni tīṇi? Uppādo paññāyati,
tika-abh07t:1212_18: vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī”ti evaṃ saṅkhatadhammasseva lakkhaṇadassanatthaṃ
tika-abh07t:1212_19: uppādādīnaṃ vuttattā na sakkā pabandhassa paññattisabhāvassa asaṅkhatassa ṭhiti tattha
tika-abh07t:1212_20: vuttāti viññātuṃ. Upasaggassa ca dhātvattheyeva pavattanato “paññāyatī”ti etassa
tika-abh07t:1212_21: viññāyatīti attho. Tasmā na ettāvatā cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇo paṭibāhituṃ yuttoti suvuttametaṃ
tika-abh07t:1212_22: “uppādaṭhitibhaṅgavasenā”ti. Evañca katvā vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyampi “ekekassa uppādaṭhitibhaṅgavasena tayo tayo khaṇā”ti.
tika-abh07t:1213_0: 9. Arūpaṃ lahupariṇāmaṃ, rūpaṃ garupariṇāmaṃ gāhakagāhetabbabhāvassa taṃtaṃkhaṇavasena
tika-abh07t:1213_1: uppajjanatoti āha “tānī”tyādi. Tānīti tādisāni. Sattarasannaṃ cittānaṃ khaṇāni viya
tika-abh07t:1213_2: khaṇāni sattarasacittakkhaṇāni, tāni cittakkhaṇāni sattarasāti vā sambandho. Visuṃ
tika-abh07t:1213_3: visuṃ pana ekapaññāsa cittakkhaṇāni honti. Rūpadhammānanti viññattilakkhaṇarūpavajjānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1213_4: rūpadhammānaṃ. Viññattidvayañhi ekacittakkhaṇāyukaṃ. Tathā hi taṃ cittānuparivattidhammesu
tika-abh07t:1213_5: vuttaṃ. Lakkhaṇarūpesu ca jāti ceva aniccatā ca cittassa uppādabhaṅgakkhaṇehi samānāyukā,
tika-abh07t:1213_6: jaratā pana ekūnapaññāsacittakkhaṇāyukā. Evañca katvā vadanti –
tika-abh07t:1215_0: Keci pana “paṭiccasamuppādaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘ettāvatā ekādasa cittakkhaṇā atītā honti,
tika-abh07t:1215_2: Uppajjamānameva hi rūpaṃ bhavaṅgacalanassa paccayo hotī”ti vadanti, tayidamasāraṃ
tika-abh07t:1215_3: “paṭisandhicittena sahuppannaṃ kammajarūpaṃ tato paṭṭhāya sattarasamena saddhiṃ nirujjhati,
tika-abh07t:1215_4: paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe uppannaṃ aṭṭhārasamassa uppādakkhaṇe nirujjhatī”tyādinā
tika-abh07t:1215_5: aṭṭhakathāyameva sattarasacittakkhaṇassa āgatattā. Yattha pana soḷasacittakkhaṇāneva
tika-abh07t:1215_6: paññāyanti, tattha cittappavattiyā paccayabhāvayogyakkhaṇavasena nayo nīto. Heṭṭhimakoṭiyā
tika-abh07t:1215_7: hi ekacittakkhaṇampi atikkantasseva rūpassa āpāthāgamanasāmatthiyanti alamativitthārena.
tika-abh07t:1216_0: 10. Ekacittassa khaṇaṃ viya khaṇaṃ ekacittakkhaṇaṃ, taṃ atītaṃ etesaṃ, etāni vā taṃ
tika-abh07t:1216_2: ṭhatvāva gocarabhāvaṃ gacchantīti ābhogānurūpaṃ anekakalāpagatāni āpāthaṃ āgacchanti,
tika-abh07t:1216_3: sesāni pana ghānādinissayesu allīnāneva viññāṇuppattikāraṇānīti ekekakalāpagatānipi.
tika-abh07t:1216_4: Ekekakalāpagatāpi hi pasādā viññāṇassa ādhārabhāvaṃ gacchanti, te pana bhavaṅgacalanassa
tika-abh07t:1216_5: anantarapaccayabhūtena bhavaṅgena saddhiṃ uppannā. “Āvajjanena saddhiṃ uppannā”ti apare.
tika-abh07t:1217_1: purimaggahitārammaṇasmiṃyeva dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅge pavatte. Pañcasu hi pasādesu yogyadesāvatthānavasena
tika-abh07t:1217_2: ārammaṇe ghaṭṭite pasādaghaṭṭanānubhāvena bhavaṅgasantati vocchijjamānā sahasā anocchijjitvā
tika-abh07t:1217_3: yathā vegena dhāvanto ṭhātukāmopi puriso ekadvipadavāre atikkamitvāva tiṭṭhati, evaṃ
tika-abh07t:1217_4: dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvāva occhijjati. Tattha paṭhamacittaṃ bhavaṅgasantatiṃ cālentaṃ
tika-abh07t:1217_5: viya uppajjatīti bhavaṅgacalanaṃ, dutiyaṃ tassa occhijjanākārena uppajjanato bhavaṅgupacchedoti
tika-abh07t:1217_6: voharanti. Idha pana avisesena vuttaṃ “dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅge calite”ti.
tika-abh07t:1218_0: Nanu ca rūpādinā pasāde ghaṭṭite tannissitasseva calanaṃ yuttaṃ, kathaṃ pana hadayavatthunissitassa
tika-abh07t:1218_1: bhavaṅgassāti? Santativasena ekābaddhattā. Yathā hi bheriyā ekasmiṃ tale ṭhitasakkharāya
tika-abh07t:1218_2: makkhikāya nisinnāya aparasmiṃ tale daṇḍādinā pahaṭe anukkamena bhericammavarattādīnaṃ
tika-abh07t:1218_3: calanena sakkharāya calitāya makkhikāya uppatitvā gamanaṃ hoti, evameva rūpādinā
tika-abh07t:1218_4: pasāde ghaṭṭite tannissayesu mahābhūtesu calitesu anukkamena taṃsambandhānaṃ sesarūpānampi
tika-abh07t:1218_5: calanena hadayavatthumhi calite tannissitassa bhavaṅgassa calanākārena pavatti hoti. Vuttañca –
tika-abh07t:1221_0: Bhavaṅgasotanti bhavaṅgappavāhaṃ. Āvajjantanti “kiṃ nāmeta”nti vadantaṃ viya ābhogaṃ
tika-abh07t:1221_1: kurumānaṃ. Passantanti paccakkhato pekkhantaṃ. Nanu ca “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”ti vacanato
tika-abh07t:1221_2: cakkhundriyameva dassanakiccaṃ sādeti, na viññāṇanti? Nayidamevaṃ, rūpassa andhabhāvena
tika-abh07t:1221_3: rūpadassane asamatthabhāvato. Yadi ca taṃ rūpaṃ passati, tathā sati aññaviññāṇasamaṅginopi
tika-abh07t:1221_4: rūpadassanappasaṅgo siyā. Yadi evaṃ viññāṇassa taṃ kiccaṃ sādheti, viññāṇassa appaṭibandhattā
tika-abh07t:1221_5: antaritarūpassapi dassanaṃ siyā. Hotu antaritassapi dassanaṃ, yassa phalikāditirohitassa
tika-abh07t:1221_6: ālokapaṭibandho natthi, yassa pana kuṭṭādiantaritassa alokapaṭibandho atthi. Tattha
tika-abh07t:1221_7: paccayābhāvato viññāṇaṃ nuppajjatīti na tassa cakkhuviññāṇena gahaṇaṃ hoti. “Cakkhunā”ti
tika-abh07t:1221_8: panettha tena dvārena karaṇabhūtenāti adhippāyo. Atha vā nissitakiriyā nissayappaṭibaddhā
tika-abh07t:1222_0: Sampaṭicchantanti tameva rūpaṃ paṭiggaṇhantaṃ viya. Santīrayamānanti tameva rūpaṃ
tika-abh07t:1222_1: vīmaṃsantaṃ viya. Vavatthapentanti tameva rūpaṃ suṭṭhu sallakkhentaṃ viya. Yonisomanasikārādivasena
tika-abh07t:1222_2: laddho paccayo etenāti laddhapaccayaṃ. Yaṃ kiñci javananti sambandho. Mucchāmaraṇāsannakālesu
tika-abh07t:1222_3: ca chappañcapi javanāni pavattantīti āha “yebhuyyenā”ti. Javanānubandhānīti paṭisotagāmināvaṃ
tika-abh07t:1222_4: nadīsoto viya kiñci kālaṃ javanaṃ anugatāni. Tassa javanassa ārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇametesanti
tika-abh07t:1222_5: tadārammaṇāni “brahmassaro”tyādīsu viya majjhepadalopavasena, tadārammaṇāni ca tāni
tika-abh07t:1222_6: pākāni cāti tadārammaṇapākāni. Yathārahanti ārammaṇajavanasattānurūpaṃ. Tathā pavattiṃ
tika-abh07t:1222_7: pana sayameva pakāsayissati, bhavaṅgapātoti vīthicittavasena appavattitvā cittassa
tika-abh07t:1222_8: bhavaṅgapāto viya, bhavaṅgavasena uppattīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ettha ca vīthicittappavattiyā
tika-abh07t:1222_9: sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ ambopamādikaṃ āharanti, tatridaṃ ambopamāmattaṃ – eko kira puriso
tika-abh07t:1222_10: phalitambarukkhamūle sasīsaṃ pārupitvā niddāyanto āsanne patitassa ekassa ambaphalassa
tika-abh07t:1222_11: saddena pabujjhitvā sīsato vatthaṃ apanetvā cakkhuṃ ummīletvā disvā ca taṃ gahetvā
tika-abh07t:1222_12: madditvā upasiṅghitvā pakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā paribhuñjitvā mukhagataṃ saha semhena ajjhoharitvā
tika-abh07t:1222_13: puna tattheva niddāyati. Tattha purisassa niddāyanakālo viya bhavaṅgakālo, phalassa
tika-abh07t:1222_14: patitakālo viya ārammaṇassa pasādaghaṭṭanakālo, tassa saddena pabuddhakālo viya āvajjanakālo,
tika-abh07t:1222_15: ummīletvā olokitakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇappavattikālo, gahitakālo viya sampaṭicchanakālo,
tika-abh07t:1222_16: maddanakālo viya santīraṇakālo, upasiṅghanakālo viya voṭṭhabbanakālo, paribhogakālo
tika-abh07t:1222_17: viya javanakālo, mukhagataṃ saha semhena ajjhoharaṇakālo viya tadārammaṇakālo, puna
tika-abh07t:1223_0: Imāya ca upamāya kiṃ dīpitaṃ hoti? Ārammaṇassa pasādaghaṭṭanameva kiccaṃ, āvajjanassa
tika-abh07t:1223_2: javanasseva pana ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ, tadārammaṇassa ca tena anubhūtasseva anubhavananti
tika-abh07t:1223_3: evaṃ kiccavasena dhammānaṃ aññamaññaṃ asaṃkiṇṇatā dīpitā hoti. Evaṃ pavattamānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1223_4: pana cittaṃ “āvajjanaṃ nāma hutvā bhavaṅgānantaraṃ hoti, tvaṃ dassanādīsu aññataraṃ
tika-abh07t:1223_5: hutvā āvajjanānantara”ntyādinā niyuñjake kārake asatipi utubījaniyāmādi viya cittaniyāmavaseneva
tika-abh07t:1225_0: 12. Appahontātītakanti appahontaṃ hutvā atītaṃ. Natthi tadārammaṇuppādoti cuddasacittakkhaṇāyuke
tika-abh07t:1225_1: tāva ārammaṇassa niruddhattāva tadārammaṇaṃ nuppajjati. Na hi ekavīthiyaṃ kesuci
tika-abh07t:1225_2: paccuppannārammaṇesu kānici atītārammaṇāni honti. Pannarasacittakkhaṇāyukesupi javanuppattito
tika-abh07t:1225_3: paraṃ ekameva cittakkhaṇaṃ avasiṭṭhanti dvikkhattuṃ tadārammaṇuppattiyā appahonakabhāvato
tika-abh07t:1225_4: natthi dutiyatadārammaṇassa uppattīti paṭhamampi nuppajjati. Dvikkhattumeva hi tadārammaṇuppatti
tika-abh07t:1225_5: pāḷiyaṃ niyamitā cittappavattigaṇanāyaṃ sabbavāresu “tadārammaṇāni dve”ti dvinnameva
tika-abh07t:1225_6: cittavārānaṃ āgatattā. Yaṃ pana paramatthavinicchaye vuttaṃ –
tika-abh07t:1226_0: “Sakiṃ dve vā tadālambaṃ, sakimāvajjanādayo”ti, taṃ majjhimabhāṇakamatānusārena vuttanti
tika-abh07t:1226_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yasmā pana majjhimabhāṇakānaṃ vādo heṭṭhā vuttapāḷiyā asaṃsandanato sammohavinodanīyaṃ
tika-abh07t:1226_2: paṭikkhittova, tasmā ācariyenapi attanā anadhippetattāyeva idha ceva nāmarūpaparicchede
tika-abh07t:1227_1: paridubbalattā javanuppattiyā paccayo na hoti. Javanañhi uppajjamānaṃ niyamena sattacittakkhaṇāyukeyeva
tika-abh07t:1227_2: uppajjatīti adhippāyenāha “javanampi anuppajjitvā”ti. Hetumhi cāyaṃ tvāpaccayo, javanassapi
tika-abh07t:1227_3: anuppattiyāti attho. Itarathā hi aparakālakiriyāya samānakattukatā na labbhatīti.
tika-abh07t:1227_4: Dvattikkhattunti dvikkhattuṃ vā tikkhattuṃ vā. Keci pana “tikkhattu’nti idaṃ vacanasiliṭṭhatāmattappayojana”nti
tika-abh07t:1227_5: vadanti, taṃ pana tesaṃ abhinivesamattaṃ. Na hi “dvikkhattuṃ voṭṭhabbanameva parivattatī”ti
tika-abh07t:1227_6: vuttepi vacanassa asiliṭṭhabhāvo atthi, na ca tikkhattuṃ pavattiyā bādhakaṃ kiñci
tika-abh07t:1227_7: vacanaṃ aṭṭhakathādīsu atthi. Evañca katvā tattha tattha sīhaḷasaṃvaṇṇanākārāpi “dvikkhattuṃ
tika-abh07t:1227_8: vā tikkhattuṃ vā”icceva vaṇṇenti. Voṭṭhabbanameva parivattatīti voṭṭhabbanameva punappunaṃ
tika-abh07t:1227_9: uppajjati. Taṃ pana appatvā antarā cakkhuviññāṇādīsu ṭhatvā cittappavattiyā nivattanaṃ natthi.
tika-abh07t:1228_0: Ānandācariyo panettha “āvajjanā kusalākusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti
tika-abh07t:1228_3: ekantato anantarapaccayabhāveneva pavatteyya, no aññathāti mucchākālādīsu mandībhūtavegatāya
tika-abh07t:1228_4: javanapāripūriyā parittārammaṇaṃ niyamitabbaṃ, na voṭṭhabbanassa dvattikkhattuṃ pavattiyāti
tika-abh07t:1228_5: dīpeti. Kiñcāpi evaṃ dīpeti, tihetukavipākāni pana anantarapaccayabhāvena vuttāneva.
tika-abh07t:1228_6: Khīṇāsavānaṃ cutivasena pavattāni na kassaci anantarapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchantīti tāni
tika-abh07t:1228_7: viya voṭṭhabbanampi paccayavekallato kusalākusalādīnaṃ anantarapaccayo na hotīti
tika-abh07t:1228_8: na na sakkā vattuṃ, tasmā aṭṭhakathāsu āgatanayenevettha parittārammaṇaṃ niyamitanti.
tika-abh07t:1229_1: voṭṭhabbanuppattiyā appahonakabhāvato vīthicittānaṃ uppādo natthi, bhavaṅgapātova
tika-abh07t:1229_2: hotīti adhippāyo. Bhavaṅgacalanamevāti avadhāraṇaphalaṃ dassetuṃ “natthi vīthicittuppādo”ti
tika-abh07t:1229_3: vuttaṃ. Apare pana “natthi bhavaṅgupacchedo”ti avadhāraṇaphalaṃ dassenti, taṃ pana
tika-abh07t:1229_4: vīthicittuppādābhāvavacaneneva siddhaṃ. Sati hi vīthicittuppāde bhavaṅgaṃ upacchijjati.
tika-abh07t:1229_5: Bhavaṅgupacchedanāmena pana heṭṭhāpi visuṃ avuttattā idha avisesena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1230_0: 15. Sabbaso vīthicittuppattiyā abhāvato pacchimavārovidhamoghavāravasena vutto, aññattha
tika-abh07t:1230_1: pana dutiyatatiyavārāpi tadārammaṇajavanehi suññattā “moghavārā”ti vuttā. Ārammaṇabhūtāti
tika-abh07t:1230_2: visayabhūtā, paccayabhūtā ca. Paccayopi hi “ārammaṇa”nti vuccati “na lacchati māro
tika-abh07t:1230_3: otāraṃ, na lacchati māro ārammaṇa”ntyādīsu viya. Tenevettha moghavārassapi ārammaṇabhūtā
tika-abh07t:1230_4: visayappavattīti siddhaṃ. Atiparittārammaṇañhi moghavārapaññāpanassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh07t:1230_5: Itarathā hi bhavaṅgacalanassa sakasakagocareyeva pavattanato pacchimavārassa atiparittārammaṇe
tika-abh07t:1230_6: pavatti natthīti “catunnaṃ vārānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā”ti vacanaṃ durupapādanaṃ siyāti.
tika-abh07t:1231_2: avisesato satteva honti. Cittuppādā cittānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ uppattivasena uppajjamānacittāniyeva
tika-abh07t:1236_0: 17. Manodvārikacittānaṃ atītānāgatampi ārammaṇaṃ hotīti tesaṃ atimahantādivasena
tika-abh07t:1236_1: visayavavatthānaṃ kātuṃ na sakkāti vibhūtāvibhūtavasenevetaṃ niyametuṃ “yadi vibhūtamārammaṇa”ntyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1237: 19. Etthāti manodvāre. Ekacattālīsa pañcadvārāveṇikānaṃ dvipañcaviññāṇamanodhātuttayavasena terasacittānaṃ tattha appavattanato.
tika-abh07t:1241_0: 21. Tattha hi chabbīsatimahaggatalokuttarajavanesu yaṃ kiñci javanaṃ appanāvīthimotaratīti
tika-abh07t:1241_1: sambandho. Parikammopacārānulomagotrabhunāmena yathākkamaṃ uppajjitvā niruddeti yojanā.
tika-abh07t:1241_2: Paṭhamacittañhi appanāya parikammattā paṭisaṅkhārakabhūtattā parikammaṃ. Dutiyaṃ
tika-abh07t:1241_3: samīpacārittā upacāraṃ. Nāccāsannopi hi nātidūrappavatti samīpacārī nāma hoti, appanaṃ
tika-abh07t:1241_4: upecca caratīti vā upacāraṃ. Tatiyaṃ pubbabhāge parikammānaṃ, upariappanāya ca anukūlattā
tika-abh07t:1241_5: anulomaṃ. Catutthaṃ parittagottassa, puthujjanagottassa ca abhibhavanato, mahaggatagottassa,
tika-abh07t:1241_6: lokuttaragottassa ca bhāvanato vaḍḍhanato gotrabhu, imāni cattāri nāmāni catukkhattuṃ
tika-abh07t:1241_7: pavattiyaṃ anavasesato labbhanti, tikkhattuṃ pavattiyaṃ pana upacārānulomagotrabhunāmeneva
tika-abh07t:1241_8: labbhanti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ, dvinnaṃ vā avisesenapi parikammādināmaṃ
tika-abh07t:1241_9: vuttaṃ, catukkhattuṃ, tikkhattumeva vā pañcamaṃ, catutthaṃ vā uppajjitabbaappanānurūpatoti
tika-abh07t:1241_11: ādito vuttaṃ, gaṇanapaṭipāṭivasena pana “pañcamaṃ vā”ti osāne vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1242_0: Yathārahanti khippābhiññadandhābhiññānurūpaṃ. Khippābhiññassa hi tikkhattuṃ pavattakāmāvacarajavanānantaraṃ
tika-abh07t:1242_2: pañcamaṃ appanā uppajjati, yasmā pana aladdhāsevanaṃ anulomaṃ gotrabhuṃ uppādetuṃ
tika-abh07t:1242_3: na sakkoti, laddhāsevanampi ca chaṭṭhaṃ sattamaṃ bhavaṅgassa āsannabhāvena papātāsannapuriso
tika-abh07t:1242_4: viya appanāvasena patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti, tasmā catutthato oraṃ, pañcamato paraṃ
tika-abh07t:1242_5: vā appanā na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathābhinīhāravasenāti rūpārūpalokuttaramaggaphalānurūpasamathavipassanābhāvanācittābhinīharaṇānurūpato,
tika-abh07t:1242_6: appanāya vīthi appanāvīthi. “Tato paraṃ bhavaṅgapātova hotī”ti ettakeyeva vutte catutthaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1242_7: pañcamaṃ vā otiṇṇaappanāto paraṃ bhavaṅgapātova hoti, na maggānantaraṃ phalacittaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1242_9: vuttaṃ. Nikāyantariyā kira lokiyappanāsu paṭhamakappanāto paraṃ sattamajavanapūraṇatthaṃ
tika-abh07t:1242_10: dvattikkhattuṃ kāmāvacarajavanānampi pavattiṃ vaṇṇentīti tesaṃ matinisedhanatthaṃ
tika-abh07t:1243_0: 22. Tatthāti tesu aṭṭhañāṇasampayuttakāmāvacarajavanesu, tesu ca chabbīsatimahaggatalokuttarajavanesu.
tika-abh07t:1243_1: Tatthāti vā tasmiṃ appanāvāre. Somanassasahagatajavanānantaranti somanassasahagatānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1243_3: sukkhavipassakādīnaṃ maggaphalassa ca vasena somanassasahagatāva, na pana upekkhāsahagatā
tika-abh07t:1243_5: pasaṃsitabbā, icchitabbāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tatthāpīti tasmiṃ ekavedanajavanavārepi.
tika-abh07t:1243_7: na kiriyajavanaṃ bhinnasantāne nibbattanato. Heṭṭhimañca phalattayamappeti samāpattivīthiyantyadhippāyo.
tika-abh07t:1244_1: dvattiṃsa, upekkhakā tihetukakusaladvayato paraṃ tatheva pañcamajjhānāni dvādasa,
tika-abh07t:1244_3: ca vasena aṭṭha, upekkhakā tihetukadvayato paraṃ upekkhāsahagatarūpārūpakiriyapañcakassa,
tika-abh07t:1244_4: aggaphalassa ca vasena cha appanā sambhonti.
tika-abh07t:1251_0: 26. Iṭṭheti iṭṭhamajjhatte. Atiiṭṭhārammaṇañhi visuṃ vakkhati. Kusalavipākāni pañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchanasantīraṇatadārammaṇānīti
tika-abh07t:1251_2: pana somanassasahagatānevā”ti. Vipākassa hi kammānubhāvato pavattamānassa ādāse mukhanimittaṃ
tika-abh07t:1251_3: viya nibbikappatāya pakappetvā gahaṇābhāvato yathārammaṇameva vedanāyogo hoti, kusalākusalānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1251_4: pana appahīnavipallāsesu santānesu pavattiyā atiiṭṭhepi iṭṭhamajjhattaaniṭṭhākārato,
tika-abh07t:1251_5: aniṭṭhepi iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattākārato gahaṇaṃ hoti. Tathā hi assaddhādīnaṃ buddhādīsu
tika-abh07t:1251_6: atiiṭṭhārammaṇesupi upekkhājavanaṃ hoti, titthiyādīnañca domanassajavanaṃ, gambhīrapakatikādīnañca
tika-abh07t:1251_7: paṭikkūlārammaṇe upekkhājavanaṃ, sunakhādīnañca tattha somanassajavanaṃ, purimapacchābhāgappavattāni
tika-abh07t:1251_8: pana vipākāni yathāvatthukāneva. Apica asucidassane sumanāyamānānaṃ sunakhādīnanti.
tika-abh07t:1251_9: Cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ pana atiiṭṭhāniṭṭhesu pavattamānānampi upekkhāsahagatabhāve kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā kathitameva.
tika-abh07t:1252_3: niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī’ti kusalākusalānamevānantaraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:1252_4: vuttanti natthi kiriyajavanānantaraṃ tadārammaṇuppādo”ti vadanti. Tattha vuccate
tika-abh07t:1252_5: – yadi abyākatānantarampi tadārammaṇaṃ vucceyya. Parittārammaṇe voṭṭhabbanānantarampi
tika-abh07t:1252_6: tassa pavattiṃ maññeyyunti kiriyajavanānantaraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ na vuttaṃ, na pana alabbhanato.
tika-abh07t:1252_7: Labbhamānassapi hi kenaci adhippāyena katthaci avacanaṃ dissati, yathā taṃ dhammasaṅgahe
tika-abh07t:1253_0: 28. Domanassa…pe… upekkhāsahagatāneva bhavanti, na somanassasahagatāni aññamaññaṃ
tika-abh07t:1253_1: viruddhasabhāvattā. Teneva hi paṭṭhāne domanassānantaraṃ somanassaṃ, tadanantarañca
tika-abh07t:1253_2: domanassaṃ anuddhaṭaṃ. Tathā hi “sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo sukhāya vedanāya
tika-abh07t:1253_3: sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”tyādinā sukhadukkhavedanāya sampayuttā
tika-abh07t:1253_4: dhammā attano attano samānavedanāsampayuttānaṃ adukkhamasukhavedanāya sampayuttakānañca
tika-abh07t:1253_5: anantarapaccayabhāvena dvīsu dvīsu vāresu vuttā, adukkhamasukhavedanāya sampayuttakā
tika-abh07t:1253_7: tīsu vāresūti evaṃ vedanāttike satteva anantarapaccayavārā vuttā. Yadi ca domanassānantaraṃ
tika-abh07t:1253_8: somanassaṃ, somanassānantaraṃ vā domanassaṃ uppajjeyya, sukhadukkhavedanāsampayuttānampi
tika-abh07t:1253_9: aññamaññaṃ anantarapaccayavasena dve vāre vaḍḍhetvā nava vārā vattabbā siyuṃ, na
tika-abh07t:1253_10: panevaṃ vuttā. Tasmā na tesaṃ tadanantaraṃ uppatti atthi. Ettha ca “somanassasahagatakiriyajavanāvasāne”tyādinā
tika-abh07t:1258_1: pana anekantiko. Yebhuyyena hi akusalajavanesu paricitassa kadāci kusalajavanesu
tika-abh07t:1258_2: javitesu, kusalajavanesu vā paricitassa kadāci akusalajavanesu javitesu akusalānantaraṃ
tika-abh07t:1258_3: pavattaparicayena tihetukajavanatopi paraṃ ahetukatadārammaṇaṃ hoti, tathā kusalānantaraṃ
tika-abh07t:1258_5: pana aññakammena tadārammaṇappavattiyaṃ vattabbameva natthi. Tathā ca vuttaṃ paṭṭhāne
tika-abh07t:1258_6: “ahetuke khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, kusalākusale niruddhe ahetuko
tika-abh07t:1258_7: vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati, kusalākusale niruddhe sahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī”ti.
tika-abh07t:1259_0: Tasmāti yasmā domanassajavanāvasāne upekkhāsahagatāneva honti. Tasmā domanassasahagatajavanāvasāne
tika-abh07t:1259_2: bhavaṅgapātābhāvo dīpitova hoti domanassānantaraṃ somanassābhāvatoti taṃ avatvā tadārammaṇābhāvameva
tika-abh07t:1259_3: parikappento āha “yadi tadārammaṇasambhavo natthī”ti. Somanassapaṭisandhikassa titthiyādino
tika-abh07t:1259_4: buddhādiatiiṭṭhārammaṇe pi paṭihatacittassa domanassajavane javite vuttanayena somanassatadārammaṇassa
tika-abh07t:1259_5: atiiṭṭhārammaṇe ca upekkhāsahagatatadārammaṇassa anuppajjanato, kenaci vā asappāyena
tika-abh07t:1259_6: parihīnalokiyajjhānaṃ ārabbha “paṇītadhammo me naṭṭho”ti vippaṭisāraṃ janentassa
tika-abh07t:1259_7: domanassajavane sati akāmāvacarārammaṇe tadārammaṇābhāvato yadi tadārammaṇassa uppattisambhavo natthīti adhippāyo.
