tika-abh07t:1260_0: Paricitapubbanti pubbe paricitaṃ, tasmiṃ bhave yebhuyyena gahitapubbaṃ. Upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:1260_1: uppajjati nirāvajjanampi. Yathā taṃ nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa phalacittantyadhippāyo. Yathāhu –
tika-abh07t:1263_0: Kena pana kiccena idaṃ cittaṃ pavattatīti? Tadārammaṇakiccena tāva na pavattati javanārammaṇassa
tika-abh07t:1263_1: aggahaṇato, nāpi santīraṇakiccena yathāsampaṭicchitassa santīraṇavasena appavattanato,
tika-abh07t:1263_2: paṭisandhicutīsu vattabbameva natthi, pārisesato pana bhavassa aṅgabhāvato bhavaṅgakiccenāti
tika-abh07t:1263_3: yuttaṃ siyā. Ācariyadhammapālattherenapi hi ayamattho dassitova. Yaṃ pana paṭisandhibhavaṅgānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1263_4: dhammato, ārammaṇato ca samānataṃ vakkhati, taṃ yebhuyyatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi idamekaṃ
tika-abh07t:1263_5: ṭhānaṃ vajjetvā paṭisandhibhavaṅgānaṃ visadisatā atthi. Tamanantaritvāti taṃ attano
tika-abh07t:1264_0: 29. Kāmāvacara…pe… icchantīti ettha kāmāvacarajavanāvasāneyeva tadārammaṇaṃ icchanti
tika-abh07t:1264_1: kāmataṇhānidānakammanibbattattā. Na hi taṃ kāmataṇhāhetukena kammunā janitaṃ ataṃsabhāvassa
tika-abh07t:1264_2: rūpārūpāvacaralokuttarajavanassa anantaraṃ uppajjati. Kiṃkāraṇā? Ajanakattā, janakasamānattābhāvato
tika-abh07t:1264_3: ca. Yathā hi gehato bahi nikkhamitukāmo bālako janakaṃ, taṃsadisaṃ vā aṅguliyaṃ gahetvā
tika-abh07t:1264_4: nikkhamati, nāññaṃ rājapurisādiṃ, evaṃ bhavaṅgavisayato aññattha pavattamānaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:1264_5: janakaṃ kāmāvacarakusalākusalaṃ, taṃsadisaṃ vā kāmāvacarakiriyajavanaṃ anubandhati,
tika-abh07t:1264_6: na pana tassa visadisāni mahaggatalokuttarajavanāni. Tathā kāmāvacarasattānameva
tika-abh07t:1264_7: tadārammaṇaṃ icchanti, na brahmānaṃ tadārammaṇūpanissayassa kāmāvacarapaṭisandhibījassābhāvato.
tika-abh07t:1264_8: Tathā kāmāvacaradhammesveva ārammaṇabhūtesu icchanti. Na itaresu aparicitattā. Yathā
tika-abh07t:1264_9: hi so bālako janakaṃ, taṃsadisaṃ vā anugacchantopi araññādiaparicitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantaṃ
tika-abh07t:1264_10: ananubandhitvā pamukhaṅgaṇādimhi paricitaṭṭhāneyeva anubandhati, evamidampi rūpāvacarādiaparicitārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:1264_11: ārabbha pavattantaṃ nānubandhati. Apica kāmataṇhāyattakammajanitattāpi etaṃ kāmataṇhārammaṇesu
tika-abh07t:1271: Nanu ca “kāmāvacarapaṭisandhibījābhāvato”ti vuttaṃ, tathā ca cakkhuviññāṇādīnampi abhāvo āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati indriyappavattiānubhāvato, dvāravīthibhede cittaniyamato ca.
tika-abh07t:1274: 32. Mandappavattiyanti maraṇāsannakāle vatthudubbalatāya mandībhūtavegattā mandaṃ hutvā pavattiyaṃ. Maraṇakālādīsūti ādi-saddena mucchākālaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh07t:1275_1: visuṃ visuṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya jhānadhamme visuṃ visuṃ āvajjentassa
tika-abh07t:1275_2: āvajjanavasitāya matthakappattiyā āvajjanatapparova cittābhinīhāro hotīti yathāvajjitajhānaṅgārammaṇāni
tika-abh07t:1275_3: cattāri, pañcavā paccavekkhaṇajavanacittāni pavattantīti vadanti aṭṭhakathācariyā.
tika-abh07t:1275_4: “Bhagavato”ti ca idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ aññesampi dhammasenāpatiādīnaṃ evarūpe accāyikakāle
tika-abh07t:1275_5: aparipuṇṇajavanānaṃ pavattanato. Tathā ca vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ayañca matthakappattā
tika-abh07t:1275_6: vasitā bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriyakāle aññesaṃ vā evarūpe kāle”ti. “Cattāri pañca
tika-abh07t:1275_7: vā”ti ca panetaṃ tikkhindriyamudindriyavasena gahetabbanti ācariyadhammapālattherena
tika-abh07t:1275_8: vuttaṃ, tasmā bhagavato cattāri, aññesaṃ pañcapīti yuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-abh07t:1276_0: 34. Ādikammikassāti ādito katayogakammassa. Paṭhamaṃ nibbattā appanā paṭhamakappanā.
tika-abh07t:1277_0: 35. Maggāyeva uppajjanato magguppādā. Yathārahanti pañcamaṃ vā catutthaṃ vā uppannamaggānurūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1277_1: Sattajavanaparamattā hi ekāvajjanavīthiyā catutthaṃ uppannamaggato paraṃ tīti phalacittāni,
tika-abh07t:1277_2: pañcamaṃ uppannamaggato paraṃ dve vā honti.
tika-abh07t:1278_2: na sotāpannasakadāminoti vuttaṃ “anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arahattaphalaṃ vā”ti. Vibhattivipallāso
tika-abh07t:1278_3: cettha daṭṭhabbo “anāgāmiphale vā arahattaphale vā”ti. Tenāha “niruddhe”ti. Yathārahanti
tika-abh07t:1280_0: 39. Parittāni javanāni sattakkhattuṃ matāni ukkaṃsakoṭiyā. Maggābhiññā pana sakiṃ
tika-abh07t:1280_1: ekavārameva matā. Avasesāni abhiññāmaggavajjitāni mahaggatalokuttarajavanāni bahūnipi
tika-abh07t:1280_2: labbhanti samāpattivīthiyaṃ ahorattampi pavattanato. Api-saddena lokiyajjhānāni paṭhamakappanāyaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1280_3: antimaphaladvayañca nirodhānantaraṃ ekavāraṃ, phalacittāni maggānantaraṃ dvattikkhattumpīti sampiṇḍeti.
tika-abh07t:1283_3: Paṭisandhiviññāṇasahagatālobhādosavasena dve hetū imesanti dvihetukā. Tādisānaṃ hetūnaṃ
tika-abh07t:1283_4: abhāvato ahetukā. Ma-kāro padasandhikaro. Appanājavanāni na labbhanti vipākāvaraṇasabbhāvato.
tika-abh07t:1284_0: 41. “Sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti pāṭhato
tika-abh07t:1284_1: ahetukānampi nānākammena dvihetukatadārammaṇaṃ sambhavati, dvihetukānaṃ vattabbameva
tika-abh07t:1284_2: natthi. Mūlasandhiyā pana jaḷabhāvato ubhinnampi natthi tihetukatadārammaṇanti āha
tika-abh07t:1284_4: avisesena vuttattā ahetukānampi tihetukatadārammaṇaṃ vatvā idha ñāṇasampayuttavipākābhāvavacanassa
tika-abh07t:1284_5: parihāsavasena “so eva pucchitabbo, yo tassa kattā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ pana parihāsavasena
tika-abh07t:1284_6: vuttampi ācariyaṃ pucchitvāva vijānanatthaṃ vuttavacanaṃ viya ṭhitaṃ. Tathā hi ācariyenevettha
tika-abh07t:1286_0: Apare pana “yathā ahetukānaṃ sahetukatadārammaṇaṃ hoti, evaṃ dvihetukānaṃ tihetukatadārammaṇampī”ti
tika-abh07t:1286_1: vaṇṇenti, tesaṃ matānurodhena ca idhāpi ñāṇasampayuttavipākapaṭikkhepo ahetukeyeva
tika-abh07t:1286_2: sandhāyāti vadanti. Tattha pana pamāṇapāṭhābhāvato ācariyena ubhinnampi sādhāraṇavasena
tika-abh07t:1286_3: ñāṇasampayuttavipākābhāve kāraṇaṃ vatvā samakameva cittaparicchedassa dassitattā
tika-abh07t:1286_4: tesaṃ vacanaṃ vīmaṃsitvā sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Ahetukāpekkhāya cettha “sugatiya”nti
tika-abh07t:1286_5: vacanaṃ, taṃ pana atthato anuññātadvihetukavipākānaṃ tattheva sambhavadassanaparaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1288_2: pahīnattā taṃsahagatajavanāni ceva ca-saddena ākaḍḍhitāni khīṇāsavāveṇikāni kiriyajavanāni ca na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t:1290_0: 47. Lokuttara…pe… samuppajjantīti catunnaṃ maggānaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikabhāvena puggalantaresu
tika-abh07t:1290_2: asamugghāṭitakammakilesanirodhena puthujjanehi viya sotāpannānaṃ sotāpannādīhi puggalantarabhāvūpagamanena
tika-abh07t:1290_3: paṭippassaddhattā ca aṭṭhapi lokuttarajavanāni yathāsakaṃ maggaphalaṭṭhānaṃ ariyānameva samuppajjanti.
tika-abh07t:1291_0: 48. Idāni tesaṃ tesaṃ puggalānaṃ yathāpaṭikkhittajavanāni vajjetvā pārisesato labbhamānajavanāni
tika-abh07t:1291_4: catucattālīsa vīthicittāni sambhavā yathālābhaṃ kāmabhave ṭhitānaṃ vasena uddise.
tika-abh07t:1292_2: chappaññāsa vīthicittāni yathāsambhavaṃ uddise avisesato. Visesato pana sotāpannasakadāgāmīnaṃ
tika-abh07t:1292_3: ekapaññāsa, anāgāmīnaṃ ekūnapaññāsa, avasesānaṃ catunnaṃ puthujjanānaṃ aṭṭhārasakiriyajavanasabbalokuttaramahaggatavipākavasena
tika-abh07t:1292_5: catupaññāsa vīthicittāni yathāsambhavato uddise avisesato. Visesato pana tihetukānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1292_7: ekacattālīsa, āpāyikānaṃ tāneva dvihetukavipākavajjitāni sattatiṃsa vīthicittānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1296: 49. Sabbānipi vīthicittāni upalabbhanti channaṃ dvārānaṃ, sabbesañca puggalānaṃ tattha sambhavato. Yathārahanti taṃtaṃbhavānurūpaṃ, taṃtaṃpuggalānurūpañca.
tika-abh07t:1297: 52. Tyādinā ghānaviññāṇādīnampi paṭikkhepo hessatīti rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ paṭighajavanatadārammaṇāneva paṭikkhittāni. Sabbatthāpīti kāmabhave, rūpabhave, arūpabhave ca.
tika-abh07t:1298_0: 54. Kāmabhave yathārahaṃ vīthimuttavajjāni asīti vīthicittāni, rūpabhave paṭighadvayaaṭṭhatadārammaṇaghānādiviññāṇachakkavīthimuttakavasena
tika-abh07t:1299_0: Keci pana “rūpabhave aniṭṭhārammaṇābhāvato idhāgatānaṃyeva brahmānaṃ akusalavipākasambhavoti
tika-abh07t:1299_1: tāni parihāpetvā pañcaparittavipākehi saddhiṃ rūpabhave saṭṭhiyeva vīthicittānī”ti
tika-abh07t:1299_2: vadanti. Idha pana tattha ṭhatvāpi imaṃ lokaṃ passantānaṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇassa asambhavo
tika-abh07t:1299_3: na sakkā vattunti tehi saddhiṃyeva tattha catusaṭṭhi vuttāni. Evañca katvā vuttaṃ
tika-abh07t:1299_4: dhammānusāraṇiyaṃ “yadā brahmāno kāmāvacaraṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ ālambanti, tadā taṃ
tika-abh07t:1302_0: 55. Yathāsambhavanti taṃtaṃdvāresu, taṃtaṃbhavesu vā sambhavānurūpato. Yāvatāyukanti
tika-abh07t:1302_1: paṭisandhito paraṃ bhavanikantivasena pavattamanodvārikacittavīthito paṭṭhāya cuticittāvasānaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1302_2: tato pubbe pavattabhavaṅgāvasānaṃ vā abbocchinnā asati nirodhasamāpattiyanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh07t:1306_0: 1. Ettāvatā vīthisaṅgahaṃ dassetvā idāni vīthimuttasaṅgahaṃ dassetumārabhanto āha
tika-abh07t:1306_2: aparabhāge cutipariyosānaṃ pavattisaṅgaho nāma saṅgaho udīrito, idāni tadanantaraṃ
tika-abh07t:1306_3: sandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikāle, tadāsannatāya taṃgahaṇeneva gahitacutikāle ca pavattisaṅgaho vuccatīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t:1308_0: 3. Puññasammatā ayā yebhuyyena apagatoti apāyo, soyeva bhūmi bhavanti ettha sattāti
tika-abh07t:1308_1: apāyabhūmi. Anekavidhasampattiadhiṭṭhānatāya sobhanā gantabbato upapajjitabbato gatīti
tika-abh07t:1308_2: sugati, kāmataṇhāsahacaritā sugati kāmasugati, sāyeva bhūmīti kāmasugatibhūmi. Evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-abh07t:1309_0: 4. Ayato sukhato niggatoti nirayo. Tiro añcitāti tiracchānā, tesaṃ yoni tiracchānayoni.
tika-abh07t:1309_1: Yavanti tāya sattā amissitāpi samānajātitāya missitā viya hontīti yoni. Sā pana atthato
tika-abh07t:1309_2: khandhānaṃ pavattiviseso. Pakaṭṭhena sukhato itā gatāti petā, nijjhāmataṇhikādibhedānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1309_3: petānaṃ visayo pettivisayo. Ettha pana tiracchānayonipettivisayaggahaṇena khandhānaṃyeva
tika-abh07t:1309_4: gahaṇaṃ tesaṃ tādisassa paricchinnokāsassa abhāvato. Yattha vā te araññapabbatapādādike
tika-abh07t:1309_5: nibaddhavāsaṃ vasanti, tādisassa ṭhānassa vasena okāsopi gahetabbo. Na suranti issariyakīḷādīhi
tika-abh07t:1309_6: na dibbantīti asurā, petāsurā. Itare pana na surā surappaṭipakkhāti asurā, idha ca
tika-abh07t:1309_7: petāsurānameva gahaṇaṃ itaresaṃ tāvatiṃsesu gahaṇassa icchitattā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ācariyena –
tika-abh07t:1311_1: manussā. Tathā hi paramasatinepakkādippattā buddhādayopi manussabhūtāyeva. Jambudīpavāsino
tika-abh07t:1311_2: cettha nippariyāyato manussā. Tehi pana samānarūpāditāya saddhiṃ parittadīpavāsīhi
tika-abh07t:1311_3: itaramahādīpavāsinopi “manussā”ti vuccanti. Lokiyā pana “manuno ādikhattiyassa apaccaṃ
tika-abh07t:1311_4: puttāti manussā”ti vadanti. Manussānaṃ nivāsabhūtā bhūmi idha manussā. Evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-abh07t:1312_0: Catūsu mahārājesu bhatti etesaṃ, catunnaṃ vā mahārājānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānabhūte cātumahārāje
tika-abh07t:1312_1: bhavāti cātumahārājikā. Māghena māṇavena saddhiṃ tettiṃsa sahapuññakārino ettha nibbattāti
tika-abh07t:1312_2: taṃsahacaritaṭṭhānaṃ tettiṃsaṃ, tadeva tāvatiṃsaṃ, taṃnivāso etesanti tāvatiṃsāti
tika-abh07t:1312_3: vadanti. Yasmā pana “sahassaṃ cātumahārājikānaṃ sahassaṃ tāvatiṃsāna”nti vacanato
tika-abh07t:1312_4: sesacakkavāḷesupi chakāmāvacaradevalokā atthi, tasmā nāmamattameva etaṃ tassa devalokassāti
tika-abh07t:1312_5: gahetabbaṃ. Dukkhato yātā apayātāti yāmā. Attano sirisampattiyā tusaṃ pītiṃ itā gatāti
tika-abh07t:1312_6: tusitā. Nimmāne rati etesanti nimmānaratino. Paranimmitesu bhogesu attano vasaṃ vattentīti
tika-abh07t:1313_0: 7. Mahābrahmānaṃ paricārikattā tesaṃ parisati bhavāti brahmapārisajjā. Tesaṃ purohitaṭṭhāne
tika-abh07t:1313_1: ṭhitattā brahmapurohitā. Tehi tehi jhānādīhi guṇavisesehi brūhitā parivuddhāti brahmāno,
tika-abh07t:1313_2: vaṇṇavantatāya ceva dīghāyukatādīhi ca brahmapārisajjādīhi mahantā brahmānoti mahābrahmāno.
tika-abh07t:1314_0: 8. Uparimehi parittā ābhā etesanti parittābhā. Appamāṇā ābhā etesanti appamāṇābhā.
tika-abh07t:1314_1: Valāhakato vijju viya ito cito ca ābhā sarati nissarati etesaṃ sappītikajjhānanibbattakkhandhasantānattāti
tika-abh07t:1314_2: ābhassarā. Daṇḍadīpikāya vā acci viya etesaṃ sarīrato ābhā chijjitvā chijjitvā patantī
tika-abh07t:1314_3: viya sarati nissaratīti ābhassarā. Yathāvuttāya vā pabhāya ābhāsanasīlāti ābhassarā.
tika-abh07t:1315_0: 9. Subhāti ekagghanā acalā sarīrābhā vuccati, sā uparibrahmehi parittā etesanti parittasubhā.
tika-abh07t:1315_1: Appamāṇā subhā etesanti appamāṇasubhā. Pabhāsamudayasaṅkhātehi subhehi kiṇṇā ākiṇṇāti
tika-abh07t:1315_2: subhakiṇhā. “Subhākiṇṇā”ti ca vattabbe ā-saddassa rassattaṃ, antimaṇa-kārassa ca
tika-abh07t:1316_1: natthi saññā, taṃmukhena vuttāvasesā arūpakkhandhā ca etesanti asaññā. Teyeva sattāti
tika-abh07t:1316_3: āvāsāti suddhāvāsā. Anunayapaṭighābhāvato vā suddho āvāso etesanti suddhāvāsā, tesaṃ
tika-abh07t:1317_0: 11. Imesu pana paṭhamatalavāsino appakena kālena attano ṭhānaṃ na vijahantīti avihā.
tika-abh07t:1317_1: Dutiyatalavāsino na kenaci tappantīti atappā. Tatiyatalavāsino paramasundararūpattā
tika-abh07t:1317_2: sukhena dissantīti sudassā. Catutthatalavāsino suparisuddhadassanattā sukhena passantīti
tika-abh07t:1317_3: sudassino. Pañcamatalavāsino pana ukkaṭṭhasampattikattā natthi etesaṃ kaniṭṭhabhāvoti akaniṭṭhā.
tika-abh07t:1318: 12. Ākāsānañcāyatane pavattā paṭhamāruppavipākabhūtacatukkhandhā eva, tehi paricchinnaokāso vā ākāsānañcāyatanabhūmi. Evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-abh07t:1319: 13. Puthujjanā, sotāpannā ca sakadāgāmino cāpi puggalā suddhāvāsesu sabbathā na labbhantīti sambandho. Puthujjanādīnañca paṭikkhepena anāgāmiarahantānameva tattha lābho vutto hoti.
tika-abh07t:1320: 14. Sesaṭṭhānesūti suddhāvāsaapāyaasaññivajjitesu sesaṭṭhānesu ariyā, anariyāpi ca labbhanti.
tika-abh07t:1324_0: 17. Jātiyā andho jaccandho. Kiñcāpi jātikkhaṇe aṇḍajajalābujā sabbepi acakkhukāva.
tika-abh07t:1324_2: dinnapaṭisandhinā, itarenapi vā kammena anuppādetabbacakkhuko satto jaccandho nāma.
tika-abh07t:1324_3: Apare pana “jaccandhoti pasūtiyaṃyeva andho, mātukucchiyaṃ andho hutvā nikkhantoti
tika-abh07t:1324_4: attho, tena duhetukatihetukānaṃ mātukucchiyaṃ cakkhussa avipajjanaṃ siddha”nti vadanti.
tika-abh07t:1324_6: saṅgaho. Apare pana “ekacce ahetukapaṭisandhikā avikalindriyā hutvā thokaṃ vicāraṇapakatikā
tika-abh07t:1324_7: honti, tādisānampi ādisaddena saṅgaho”ti vadanti. Bhummadeve sitā nissitā taggatikattāti
tika-abh07t:1326: 21. Tesūti yathāvuttapaṭisandhiyuttesu puggalesu, apāyādīsu vā. Āyuppamāṇagaṇanāya niyamo natthi kesañci cirāyukattā, kesañci ciratarāyukattā ca. Tathācāhu –
tika-abh07t:1331_0: Apāyesu hi kammameva pamāṇaṃ, tattha nibbattānaṃ yāva kammaṃ nakhīyati. Tāva cavanābhāvato,
tika-abh07t:1331_1: tathā bhummadevānaṃ. Tesupi hi nibbattā keci sattāhādikālaṃ tiṭṭhanti, keci kappamattampi,
tika-abh07t:1331_2: tathā manussānampi kadāci tesampi asaṅkhyeyyāyukattā kadāci dasavassāyukattā. “Yo
tika-abh07t:1331_3: ciraṃ jīvati, so vassasataṃ jīvati, appaṃ vā bhiyyo, dutiyaṃ vassasataṃ na pāpuṇātī”ti
tika-abh07t:1332: 22. Dibbāni pañcavassasatānīti manussānaṃ paññāsa vassāni ekadinaṃ, tadanurūpato māsasaṃvacchare paricchinditvā dibbappamāṇāni pañcavassasatāni āyuppamāṇaṃ hoti. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
tika-abh07t:1336_0: Manussagaṇanāyāti manussānaṃ saṃvaccharagaṇanāya. Tato catugguṇanti cātumahārājikānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1336_1: paññāsamānussakavassaparimitaṃ divasaṃ, dibbāni ca pañcavassasatāni diguṇaṃ katvā
tika-abh07t:1336_3: catugguṇaṃ, taṃ pana dibbagaṇanāya vassasahassaṃ, manussagaṇanāya saṭṭhivassasatasahassādhikatikoṭippamāṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:1336_4: hoti. Tato catugguṇaṃ yāmānanti tāvatiṃsānamāyuppamāṇato vuttanayena catugguṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1336_6: vassakoṭiyo honti. Tato catugguṇaṃ tusitānanti dibbāni cattāri vassasahassāni, manussagaṇanāya
tika-abh07t:1336_7: saṭṭhivassasatasahassādhikā sattapaññāsa vassakoṭiyo. Tato catugguṇaṃ nimmānaratīnanti
tika-abh07t:1336_8: dibbāni aṭṭhavassasahassāni, manussagaṇanāya dve vassakoṭisatāni cattālīsavassasatasahassādhikā
tika-abh07t:1336_9: tiṃsa vassakoṭiyo ca. Tato catugguṇaṃ paranimmitavasavattīnanti dibbāni soḷasa vassasahassāni.
tika-abh07t:1337_0: 23. Manussagaṇanaṃ pana sayameva dassento āha “navasatañcā”tyādi. Vassānaṃ sambandhi
tika-abh07t:1337_1: navasataṃ ekavīsa koṭiyo, tathā saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassāni vasavattīsu āyuppamāṇanti sambandho.
tika-abh07t:1338: 25. Dutiyajjhānabhūmiyanti catukkanayavasena vuttaṃ. Tato paraṃ pavattiyaṃ, cavanakāle ca tathārūpameva bhavaṅgacutivasena pavattitvā nirujjhatīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t:1339_0: 29. Tesūti tāhi gahitapaṭisandhikesu brahmesu. Kappassāti asaṅkhyeyyakappassa. Na
tika-abh07t:1339_1: hi brahmapārisajjādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ mahākappavasena āyuparicchedo sambhavati ekakappepi
tika-abh07t:1339_2: tesaṃ avināsābhāvena paripuṇṇakappe asambhavato. Tathā hesa loko sattavāresu agginā
tika-abh07t:1339_3: vinassati, aṭṭhame vāre udakena, puna sattavāresu agginā, aṭṭhame vāre udakenāti
tika-abh07t:1339_4: evaṃ aṭṭhasu aṭṭhakesu paripuṇṇesu pacchime vāre vātena vinassati. Tattha paṭhamajjhānatalaṃ
tika-abh07t:1339_5: upādāya agginā, dutiyatatiyajjhānatalaṃ upādāya udakena, catutthajjhānatalaṃ upādāya
tika-abh07t:1341: Catusaṭṭhi yadā puṇṇā, eko vāyuvaro siyā.
tika-abh07t:1344_0: Tasmā tiṇṇampi paṭhamajjhānatalānaṃ ekakappepi avināsābhāvato sakalakappe tesaṃ sambhavo
tika-abh07t:1344_1: natthīti asaṅkhyeyyakappavasena tesaṃ āyuparicchedo daṭṭhabbo. Dutiyajjhānāditalato
tika-abh07t:1344_2: paṭṭhāya pana paripuṇṇassa mahākappassa vasena, na asaṅkhyeyyakappavasena. Asaṅkhyeyyakappoti
tika-abh07t:1344_3: ca yojanāyāmavitthārato setasāsaparāsito vassasatavassasataccayena ekekabījassa haraṇena
tika-abh07t:1344_4: sāsaparāsino parikkhayepi akkhayasabhāvassa mahākappassa catutthabhāgo. So pana sattharogadubbhikkhānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1344_6: dasavassato paṭṭhāya anukkamena asaṅkhyeyyāyukappamāṇesu sattesu puna asaddhammasamādānavasena
tika-abh07t:1344_7: kamena parihāyitvā dasavassāyukesu jātesu rogādīnaṃ aññatarasaṃvaṭṭena sattānaṃ vināsappattiyāva
tika-abh07t:1344_8: “ayameko antarakappo”ti evaṃ paricchinnassa antarakappassa vasena catusaṭṭhiantarakappappamāṇo
tika-abh07t:1346: 49. Ekamevāti bhūmito, jātito, sampayuttadhammato, saṅkhārato ca samānameva. Ekajātiyanti ekasmiṃ bhave.
tika-abh07t:1349_0: 50. Idāni kammacatukkaṃ catūhākārehi dassetuṃ “janaka”ntyādi āraddhaṃ, janayatīti
tika-abh07t:1349_1: janakaṃ. Upatthambhetīti upatthambhakaṃ. Upagantvā pīḷetīti upapīḷakaṃ. Upagantvā
tika-abh07t:1350_0: Tattha paṭisandhipavattīsu vipākakaṭattārūpānaṃ nibbattakā kusalākusalacetanā janakaṃ
tika-abh07t:1350_1: nāma. Sayaṃ vipākaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkontampi kammantarassa cirataravipākanibbattane
tika-abh07t:1350_2: paccayabhūtaṃ, vipākasseva vā sukhadukkhabhūtassa vicchedapaccayānuppattiyā, upabrūhanapaccayuppattiyā
tika-abh07t:1350_5: yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ upapīḷakaṃ nāma. Dubbalassa pana kammassa janakasāmatthiyaṃ upahacca
tika-abh07t:1350_6: vicchedakapaccayuppādanena tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā sayaṃ vipākanibbattakakammaṃ upaghātakaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t:1351_0: Janakopaghātakānañhi ayaṃ viseso – janakaṃ kammantarassa vipākaṃ anupacchinditvāva
tika-abh07t:1351_1: vipākaṃ janeti, upaghātakaṃ upacchedanapubbakanti idaṃ tāva aṭṭhakathāsu sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1351_3: vipākaṃ antarantarā vibādhati. Upaghātakaṃ pana taṃ sabbaso upacchinditvā aññassa
tika-abh07t:1351_4: okāsaṃ deti, na pana sayaṃ vipākanibbattakaṃ. Evañhi janakato imassa viseso supākaṭo”ti
tika-abh07t:1352_0: 51. Garukanti mahāsāvajjaṃ, mahānubhāvañca aññena kammena paṭibāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyakammaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1352_1: Āsannanti maraṇakāle anussaritaṃ, tadā katañca. Āciṇṇanti abhiṇhaso kataṃ, ekavāraṃ
tika-abh07t:1352_2: katvāpi vā abhiṇhaso samāsevitaṃ. Kaṭattākammanti garukādibhāvaṃ asampattaṃ katamattatoyeva
tika-abh07t:1353_0: Tattha kusalaṃ vā hotu akusalaṃ vā, garukāgarukesu yaṃ garukaṃ akusalapakkhe mātughātakādikammaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1353_1: kusalapakkhe mahaggatakammaṃ vā, tadeva paṭhamaṃ vipaccati satipi āsannādikamme parittaṃ
tika-abh07t:1353_2: udakaṃ ottharitvā gacchanto mahogho viya. Tathā hi taṃ “garuka”nti vuccati. Tasmiṃ
tika-abh07t:1353_3: asati dūrāsannesu yaṃ āsannaṃ maraṇakāle anussaritaṃ, tadeva paṭhamaṃ vipaccati,
tika-abh07t:1353_4: āsannakāle kate vattabbameva natthi. Tasmimpi asati āciṇṇānāciṇṇesu ca yaṃ āciṇṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:1353_5: susīlyaṃ vā, dussīlyaṃ vā, tadeva paṭhamaṃ vipaccati. Kaṭattākammaṃ pana laddhāsevanaṃ
tika-abh07t:1353_6: purimānaṃ abhāvena paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhatīti garukaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ vipaccati. Garuke
tika-abh07t:1353_7: asati āsannaṃ, tasmimpi asati āciṇṇaṃ, tasmimpi asati kaṭattākammaṃ. Tenāha “pākadānapariyāyenā”ti,
tika-abh07t:1353_8: vipākadānānukkamenātyattho. Abhidhammāvatārādīsu pana āsannato āciṇṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ vipaccantaṃ
tika-abh07t:1353_9: katvā vuttaṃ. Yathā pana gogaṇaparipuṇṇassa vajassa dvāre vivaṭe aparabhāge dammagavabalavagavesu
tika-abh07t:1353_10: santesupi yo vajadvārassa āsanno hoti, antamaso dubbalajaraggavopi, soyeva paṭhamataraṃ
tika-abh07t:1353_11: nikkhamati, evaṃ garukato aññesu kusalākusalesu santesupi maraṇakālassa āsannattā
tika-abh07t:1353_12: āsannameva paṭhamaṃ vipākaṃ detīti idha taṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1354_0: 52. Diṭṭhadhammo paccakkhabhūto paccuppanno attabhāvo, tattha veditabbaṃ vipākānubhavanavasenāti
tika-abh07t:1354_1: diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ. Diṭṭhadhammato anantaraṃ upapajjitvā veditabbaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1354_2: Apare apare diṭṭhadhammato aññasmiṃ yattha katthaci attabhāve veditabbaṃ kammaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1354_3: Ahosi eva kammaṃ, na tassa vipāko ahosi, atthi, bhavissati cāti evaṃ vattabbakammaṃ ahosikammaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1355_0: Tattha paṭipakkhehi anabhibhūtatāya, paccayavisesena paṭiladdhavisesatāya ca balavabhāvappattā
tika-abh07t:1355_1: tādisassa pubbābhisaṅkhārassa vasena sātisayā hutvā tasmiṃyeva attabhāve phaladāyinī
tika-abh07t:1355_2: paṭhamajavanacetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ nāma. Sā hi vuttappakārena balavajanasantāne
tika-abh07t:1355_4: itaradvayaṃ viya pavattasantānuparamāpekkhaṃ, okāsalābhāpekkhañca kammaṃ na hotīti
tika-abh07t:1355_5: idheva pupphamattaṃ viya pavattivipākamattaṃ ahetukaphalaṃ deti. Atthasādhikā pana
tika-abh07t:1355_7: vipākadāyinī upapajjavedanīyaṃ nāma. Sā ca paṭisandhiṃ datvāva pavattivipākaṃ deti.
tika-abh07t:1355_8: Paṭisandhiyā pana adinnāya pavattivipākaṃ detīti natthi. Cuti anantarañhi upapajjavedanīyassa
tika-abh07t:1355_9: okāso. Paṭisandhiyā pana dinnāya jātisatepi pavattivipākaṃ detīti ācariyā. Yathāvuttakaāraṇavirahato
tika-abh07t:1355_10: diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādibhāvaṃ asampattā ādipariyosānacetanānaṃ majjhe pavattā pañca
tika-abh07t:1355_11: cetanā vipākadānasabhāvassa anupacchinnattā yadā kadāci okāsalābhe sati paṭisandhipavattīsu
tika-abh07t:1355_12: vipākaṃ abhinipphādentī aparāpariyavedaniyaṃ nāma. Sakasakakālātītaṃ pana purimakammadvayaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1355_13: tatiyampi ca saṃsārappavattiyā vocchinnāya ahosikammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t:1356_0: Pākakālavasenāti paccuppanne, tadanantare, yadā kadācīti evaṃ purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ yathāparicchinnakālavasena,
tika-abh07t:1356_1: itarassa taṃkālābhāvavasena ca. Ahosikammassa hi kālātikkamatova taṃ vohāro.
tika-abh07t:1358_0: 54. Idāni akusalādikammānaṃ kāyakammadvārādivasena pavattiṃ, taṃniddesamukhena ca
tika-abh07t:1358_1: tesaṃ pāṇātipātādivasena dasavidhādibhedañca dassetuṃ “tattha akusala”ntyādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1358_2: Kāyadvāre pavattaṃ kammaṃ kāyakammaṃ. Evaṃ vacīkammādīni.
tika-abh07t:1359: 55. Pāṇassa saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā atīva pātanaṃ pāṇātipāto. Kāyavācāhi adinnassa ādānaṃ adinnādānaṃ. Methunavītikkamasaṅkhātesu kāmesu micchā caraṇaṃ kāmesu micchācāro.
tika-abh07t:1360_0: Tattha pāṇoti vohārato satto, paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ. Tasmiṃ pāṇe pāṇasaññino
tika-abh07t:1360_3: agantabbaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā kāmesumicchācāro nāma. Surāpānampi ettheva saṅgayhatīti
tika-abh07t:1360_4: vadanti rasasaṅkhātesu kāmesu micchācārabhāvato. Kāyaviññattisaṅkhāte kāyadvāreti
tika-abh07t:1360_5: kāyena adhippāyaviññāpanato, sayañca kāyena viññeyyattā kāyaviññattisaṅkhāte abhikkamādijanakacittajavāyodhātvādhikakalāpassa
tika-abh07t:1360_6: vikārabhūte santhambhanādīnaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhūte copanakāyabhāvato, kammānaṃ pavattimukhabhāvato
tika-abh07t:1361_0: Kiñcāpi hi taṃtaṃkammasahagatacittuppādeneva sā viññatti janīyati. Tathāpi tassā
tika-abh07t:1361_1: tathā pavattamānāya taṃsamuṭṭhāpakakammassa kāyakammādivohāro hotīti sā tasseva pavattimukhabhāvena
tika-abh07t:1361_2: vattuṃ labbhati. “Kāyadvāre vuttito”ti ettakeyeva vutte “yadi evaṃ kammadvāravavatthānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1361_3: na siyā. Kāyadvāre hi pavattaṃ ‘kāyakamma’nti vuccati, kāyakammassa ca pavattimukhabhūtaṃ
tika-abh07t:1361_4: ‘kāyadvāra’nti. Pāṇātipātādikaṃ pana vācāya āṇāpentassa kāyakammaṃ vacīdvārepi pavattatīti
tika-abh07t:1361_5: dvārena kammavavatthānaṃ na siyā, tathā musāvādādiṃ kāyavikārena karontassa vacīkammaṃ
tika-abh07t:1361_6: kāyadvārepi pavattatīti kammena dvāravavatthānampi na siyā”ti ayaṃ codanā paccupaṭṭheyyāti
tika-abh07t:1361_7: bāhullavuttiyā vavatthānaṃ dassetuṃ “bāhullavuttito”ti vuttaṃ. Kāyakammañhi kāyadvāreyeva
tika-abh07t:1361_8: bahulaṃ pavattati, appaṃ vacīdvāre, tasmā kāyadvāreyeva bahulaṃ pavattanato kāyakammabhāvo
tika-abh07t:1361_9: siddho vanacarakādīnaṃ vanacarakādibhāvo viya. Tathā kāyakammameva yebhuyyena kāyadvāre
tika-abh07t:1361_10: pavattati, na itarāni, tasmā kāyakammassa yebhuyyena ettheva pavattanato kāyakammadvārabhāvo
tika-abh07t:1361_11: siddho brāhmaṇagāmādīnaṃ brāhmaṇagāmādibhāvo viyāti natthi kammadvāravavatthāne koci
tika-abh07t:1362_0: 56. Musāti abhūtaṃ vatthu, taṃ tacchato vadanti etenāti musāvādo. Pisati sāmaggiṃ
tika-abh07t:1362_1: sañcuṇṇeti vikkhipati, piyabhāvaṃ suññaṃ karotīti vā pisuṇā. Attānampi parampi pharusaṃ
tika-abh07t:1362_2: karoti, kakaco viya kharasamphassāti vā pharusā. Saṃ sukhaṃ, hitañca phalati visarati
tika-abh07t:1362_3: vināsetīti samphaṃ, attano, paresañca anupakāraṃ yaṃ kiñci, taṃ palapati etenāti samphappalāpo.
tika-abh07t:1363_0: Tattha abhūtaṃ vatthuṃ bhūtato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathā viññāpanappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā
tika-abh07t:1363_1: cetanā musāvādo. So parassa atthabhedakarova kammapatho hoti, itaro kammameva. Paresaṃ
tika-abh07t:1363_3: pisuṇavācā, sāpi dvīsu bhinnesuyeva kammapatho. Parassa mammacchedakaravacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā
tika-abh07t:1363_4: ekantapharusacetanā pharusavācā. Na hi cittasaṇhatāya sati pharusavācā nāma hoti.
tika-abh07t:1363_6: so pana parehi tasmiṃ anatthe gahiteyeva kammapatho. Vacīviññattisaṅkhāte vacīdvāreti
tika-abh07t:1363_7: vācāya adhippāyaṃ viññāpeti, sayañca vācāya viññāyatīti vacīviññattisaṅkhāte vacībhedakarappayogasamuṭṭhāpakacittasamuṭṭhānapathavīdhātvādhikakalāpassa
tika-abh07t:1363_8: vikārabhūte copanavācābhāvato, kammānaṃ pavattimukhabhāvato ca vacīdvārasaṅkhāte
tika-abh07t:1364: 57. Parasampattiṃ abhimukhaṃ jhāyati lobhavasena cintetīti abhijjhā. Byāpajjati hitasukhaṃ etenāti byāpādo. Micchā viparītato passatīti micchādiṭṭhi.
tika-abh07t:1365_0: Tattha “aho vata idaṃ mama siyā”ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanaṃ abhijjhā, sā parabhaṇḍassa
tika-abh07t:1365_1: attano nāmaneneva kammapatho hoti. “Aho vatāyaṃ satto vinasseyyā”ti evaṃ manopadoso
tika-abh07t:1365_2: byāpādo. “Natthi dinna”ntyādinā nayena viparītadassanaṃ micchādiṭṭhi. Ettha pana
tika-abh07t:1365_4: papañco tattha tattha āgatanayena daṭṭhabbo. Aññatrāpi viññattiyāti kāyavacīviññattiṃ
tika-abh07t:1365_5: vināpi, taṃ asamuṭṭhāpetvāpītyattho. Viññattisamuṭṭhāpakacittasampayuttā cettha abhijjhādayo
tika-abh07t:1366_1: vā jāyanti, na lobhamūlādīhi. Hasamānāpi hi rājāno dosacitteneva pāṇavadhaṃ āṇāpenti,
tika-abh07t:1366_2: tathā pharusavācābyāpādesupi yathārahaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Micchādassanassa abhinivisitabbavatthūsu
tika-abh07t:1366_3: lobhapubbaṅgamameva abhinivisanato āha “micchādiṭṭhi ca lobhamūlenā”ti. Sesāni cattāripi
tika-abh07t:1366_4: dvīhi mūlehi sambhavantīti yo tāva abhimataṃ vatthuṃ, anabhimataṃ vā attabandhuparittāṇādippayojanaṃ
tika-abh07t:1366_5: sandhāya harati, tassa adinnādānaṃ lobhamūlena hoti. Veraniyyātanatthaṃ harantassa
tika-abh07t:1366_6: dosamūlena. Nītipāṭhakappamāṇato duṭṭhaniggahaṇatthaṃ parasantakaṃ harantānaṃ rājūnaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1366_7: brāhmaṇānañca “sabbamidaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ rājūhi dinnaṃ, tesaṃ pana sabbadubbalabhāvena
tika-abh07t:1366_8: aññe paribhuñjanti, attasantakameva brāhmaṇā paribhuñjantī”tyādīni vatvā sakasaññāya
tika-abh07t:1366_9: evaṃ yaṃ kiñci harantānaṃ, kammaphalasambandhāpavādīnañca mohamūlena. Evaṃ musāvādādīsupi
tika-abh07t:1367_0: 63. Chasu ārammaṇesu tividhakammavasena uppajjamānampetaṃ tividhaniyamena uppajjatīti
tika-abh07t:1367_1: āha “tathā dānasīlabhāvanāvasenā”ti. Dasadhā niddisiyamānānaṃ hi dvinnaṃ, puna dvinnaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1367_2: tiṇṇañca yathākkamaṃ dānādīsu tīsveva saṅgaho. Kāraṇaṃ panettha parato vakkhāma.
tika-abh07t:1367_3: Chaḷārammaṇesu pana tividhakammadvāresu ca nesaṃ pavattiyojanā aṭṭhakathādīsu āgatanayena gahetabbā.
tika-abh07t:1368_0: 65. Dīyati etenāti dānaṃ, pariccāgacetanā. Evaṃ sesesupi. Sīlatīti sīlaṃ, kāyavacīkammāni
tika-abh07t:1368_1: samādahati, sammā ṭhapetītyattho, sīlayati vā upadhāretīti sīlaṃ, upadhāraṇaṃ panettha
tika-abh07t:1368_2: kusalānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvo. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “sīle patiṭṭhāyā”tyādi. Bhāveti kusale
tika-abh07t:1368_3: dhamme āsevati vaḍḍheti etāyāti bhāvanā. Apacāyati pūjāvasena sāmīciṃ karoti etenāti
tika-abh07t:1368_4: apacāyanaṃ. Taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇe byāvaṭassa bhāvo veyyāvaccaṃ. Attano santāne nibbattā
tika-abh07t:1368_5: patti dīyati etenāti pattidānaṃ. Pattiṃ anumodati etāyāti pattānumodanā. Dhammaṃ
tika-abh07t:1368_6: suṇanti etenāti dhammassavanaṃ. Dhammaṃ desenti etāyāti dhammadesanā. Diṭṭhiyā ujukaraṇaṃ diṭṭhijukammaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1369_1: dānaṃ nāma, dānavatthupariyesanavasena, dinnassa somanassacittena anussaraṇavasena
tika-abh07t:1369_2: ca pavattā pubbapacchābhāgacetanā ettheva samodhānaṃ gacchanti. Evaṃ sesesupi yathārahaṃ
tika-abh07t:1369_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Niccasīlādivasena pañca, aṭṭha, dasa vā sīlāni samādiyantassa, paripūrentassa,
tika-abh07t:1369_5: saṃvaraṃ samādiyantassa, catupārisuddhisīlaṃ paripūrentassa ca pavattacetanā sīlaṃ
tika-abh07t:1369_6: nāma. Cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu, khandhādīsu ca bhūmīsu parikammasammasanavasappavattā
tika-abh07t:1369_7: appanaṃ appattā gotrabhupariyosānacetanā bhāvanā nāma, niravajjavijjādipariyāpuṇanacetanāpi
tika-abh07t:1370_0: Vayasā, guṇehi ca jeṭṭhānaṃ cīvarādīsu paccāsārahitena asaṃkiliṭṭhajjhāsayena paccuṭṭhānaāsanābhinīhārādividhinā
tika-abh07t:1370_1: bahumānakaraṇacetanā apacāyanaṃ nāma. Tesameva, gilānānañca yathāvuttajjhāsayena
tika-abh07t:1370_2: taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇacetanā veyyāvaccaṃ nāma. Attano santāne nibbattassa puññassa parehi
tika-abh07t:1370_3: sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ paccāsīsanacetanā pattidānaṃ nāma. Parehi dinnassa, adinnassapi vā
tika-abh07t:1370_4: puññassa maccheramalavinissaṭena cittena abbhānumodanacetanā pattānumodanā nāma.
tika-abh07t:1370_5: Evamimaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tattha vuttanayena paṭipajjanto “lokiyalokuttaraguṇavisesassa
tika-abh07t:1370_6: bhāgī bhavissāmi, bahussuto vā hutvā paresaṃ dhammadesanādīhi anuggaṇhissāmī”ti evaṃ
tika-abh07t:1370_7: attano, paresaṃ vā hitapharaṇavasappavattena asaṃkiliṭṭhajjhāsayena hitūpadesasavanacetanā
tika-abh07t:1370_8: dhammassavanaṃ nāma, niravajjavijjādisavanacetanāpi ettheva saṅgayhati. Lābhasakkārādinirapekkhatāya
tika-abh07t:1370_9: yoniso manasi karoto hitūpadesacetanā dhammadesanā nāma, niravajjavijjādiupadisanacetanāpi
tika-abh07t:1371_0: Yadi evaṃ ñāṇavippayuttacittuppādassa diṭṭhijukammapuññakiriyabhāvo na labbhatīti?
tika-abh07t:1371_1: No na labbhati purimapacchimacetanānampi taṃtaṃpuññakiriyāsveva saṅgaṇhanato. Kiñcāpi
tika-abh07t:1371_2: hi ujukaraṇavelāyaṃ ñāṇasampayuttameva cittaṃ hoti, purimapacchābhāge pana ñāṇavippayuttampi
tika-abh07t:1372_0: Imesu pana dasasu pattidānānumodanā dāne saṅgahaṃ gacchanti taṃsabhāvattā. Dānampi
tika-abh07t:1372_1: hi issāmaccherānaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ, etepi. Tasmā samānappaṭipakkhatāya ekalakkhaṇattā
tika-abh07t:1372_4: saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ. Apare pana “desento, suṇanto
tika-abh07t:1372_5: ca desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjha paṭivijjha deseti, suṇāti ca,
tika-abh07t:1372_6: tāni ca desanāsavanāni paṭivedhamevāharantīti desanāsavanābhāvanāmaye saṅgahaṃ gacchantī”ti
tika-abh07t:1372_7: vadanti. Dhammadānasabhāvato desanā dānamaye saṅgahaṃ gacchatītipi sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh07t:1372_8: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “sabbadānaṃ dhammadānaṃ jinātī”ti. Tathā diṭṭhijukammaṃ sabbatthāpi
tika-abh07t:1372_9: sabbesaṃ niyamanalakkhaṇattā. Dānādīsu hi yaṃ kiñci “atthi dinna”ntyādinayappavattāya
tika-abh07t:1372_10: sammādiṭṭhiyā visodhitaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ, evañca katvā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh07t:1372_11: “diṭṭhijukammaṃ sabbesaṃ niyamalakkhaṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ dānasīlabhāvanāvasena tīsu
tika-abh07t:1372_12: itaresaṃ saṅgaṇhanato saṅkhepato tividhameva puññakiriyavatthu hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1373_1: rūpāvacarakusalaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ dānādivasena appavattanato. Appanāppattaṃ pubbabhāgappavattānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1374: 68. Ārammaṇabhedenāti kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ, ākāsavisayaṃ mano, tadabhāvo, tadālambaṃ viññāṇanti catubbidhanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ bhedena.
tika-abh07t:1375_0: 69. Etthāti imesu pākaṭṭhānavasena catubbidhesu kammesu. Uddhaccarahitanti uddhaccasahagatacetanārahitaṃ
tika-abh07t:1375_1: ekādasavidhaṃ akusalakammaṃ. Kiṃ panettha kāraṇaṃ adhimokkhavirahena sabbadubbalampi
tika-abh07t:1375_2: vicikicchāsahagataṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati, adhimokkhasampayogena tato balavantampi
tika-abh07t:1375_4: dubbalaṃ nākaḍḍhatīti hi ayaṃ vicāraṇā paṭisandhidānasabhāvesuyeva. Yassa pana paṭisandhidānasabhāvoyeva
tika-abh07t:1375_5: natthi, na tassa balavabhāvo paṭisandhiākaḍḍhane kāraṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1376_0: Kathaṃ panetaṃ viññātabbaṃ uddhaccasahagatassa paṭisandhidānasabhāvo natthīti? Dassanenapahātabbesu
tika-abh07t:1376_1: anāgatattā. Tividhā hi akusalā dassanena pahātabbā, bhāvanāya pahātabbā, siyā dassanena
tika-abh07t:1376_3: dassanena pahātabbā nāma paṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanavasena “dassana”nti laddhanāmena
tika-abh07t:1376_4: sotāpattimaggena pahātabbattā. Uddhaccasahagatacittuppādo bhāvanāya pahātabbo nāma
tika-abh07t:1376_5: aggamaggena pahātabbattā. Uparimaggattayañhi paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhanibbāne bhāvanāvasena
tika-abh07t:1376_7: siyā dassanena pahātabbā, siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbā tesaṃ apāyanibbattakāvatthāya
tika-abh07t:1376_8: paṭhamamaggena, sesabahalābahalāvatthāya uparimaggehi pahīyamānattā. Tattha siyā
tika-abh07t:1376_9: dassanena pahātabbampi dassanena pahātabbasāmaññena idha “dassanena pahātabba”nti voharanti.
tika-abh07t:1377_0: Yadi ca uddhaccasahagataṃ paṭisandhiṃ dadeyya, tadā akusalapaṭisandhiyā sugatiyaṃ
tika-abh07t:1377_1: asambhavato apāyesveva dadeyya. Apāyagamanīyañca avassaṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh07t:1377_2: Itarathā apāyagamanīyassa appahīnattā sekkhānaṃ apāyuppatti āpajjati, na ca panetaṃ
tika-abh07t:1377_3: yuttaṃ “catūhapāyehi ca vippamutto, avinipātadhammo”ti ādivacanehi saha virujjhanato.
tika-abh07t:1377_4: Sati ca panetassa dassanena pahātabbabhāve “siyā dassanena pahātabbā”ti imassa vibhaṅge
tika-abh07t:1377_5: vattabbaṃ siyā, na ca panetaṃ vuttanti. Atha siyā “apāyagāminiyo rāgo doso moho tadekaṭṭhā
tika-abh07t:1377_6: ca kilesā”ti evaṃ dassanena pahātabbesu vuttattā uddhaccasahagatacetanāya tattha
tika-abh07t:1377_7: saṅgaho sakkā vattunti. Taṃ na, tassa ekantato bhāvanāya pahātabbabhāvena vuttattā.
tika-abh07t:1377_8: Vuttañhetaṃ – “katame dhammā bhāvanāya pahātabbā? Uddhaccasahagato cittuppādo”ti,
tika-abh07t:1377_9: tasmā dassanena pahātabbesu avacanaṃ imassa paṭisandhidānābhāvaṃ sādheti. Nanu ca
tika-abh07t:1378_0: “Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ uddhaccasampayuttaṃ
tika-abh07t:1378_1: rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe… dhammārammaṇaṃ vā, yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha tasmiṃ samaye phasso
tika-abh07t:1378_2: hoti…pe… avikkhepo hoti, ime dhammā akusalā. Imesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā,
tika-abh07t:1379_0: Evaṃ uddhaccasahagatacittuppādaṃ uddharitvā tassa vipākopi uddhaṭoti kathamassa paṭisandhidānābhāvo
tika-abh07t:1379_1: sampaṭicchitabboti? Nāyaṃ paṭisandhidānaṃ sandhāya uddhaṭo. Atha kho pavattivipākaṃ
tika-abh07t:1380_0: “Sahajātā dassanena pahātabbā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh07t:1380_1: nānākkhaṇikā dassanena pahātabbā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ, kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1381_1: “sahajātā bhāvanāya pahātabbā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti
tika-abh07t:1381_2: bhāvanāya pahātabbacetanāya sahajātakammapaccayabhāvova uddhaṭo, na pana nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo,
tika-abh07t:1381_3: na ca nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayaṃ vinā paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanaṃ atthi, tasmā natthi tassa
tika-abh07t:1381_4: sabbathāpi paṭisandhidānanti. Yaṃ paneke vadanti “uddhaccacetanā ubhayavipākampi
tika-abh07t:1381_5: na deti paṭṭhāne nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvassa anuddhaṭattā”ti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ
tika-abh07t:1381_8: Yadi hi pavattivipākaṃ sandhāya nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo vucceyya, tadā paṭisandhivipākampissa
tika-abh07t:1381_10: na vutto, tasmā na sakkā tassa pavattivipākaṃ nivāretuṃ. Tenāha “pavattiyaṃ panā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t:1381_11: Ācariyabuddhamittādayo pana atthi uddhaccasahagataṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbampi. Atthi
tika-abh07t:1381_12: na bhāvanāya pahātabbampi, tesu bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ sekkhasantānappavattaṃ, itaraṃ
tika-abh07t:1381_14: evaṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ dvidhā vibhajitvā ekassa ubhayavipākadānaṃ, ekassa sabbathāpi
tika-abh07t:1381_15: vipākābhāvaṃ vaṇṇenti. Yo panettha tesaṃ vinicchayo, yañca tassa nirākaraṇaṃ, yañca
tika-abh07t:1381_16: sabbathāpi vipākābhāvavādīnaṃ matapaṭikkhepanaṃ idha avuttaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ paramatthamañjūsādīsu,
tika-abh07t:1381_17: visesato ca abhidhammatthavikāsiniyā nāma abhidhammāvatārasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1382_0: Sabbatthāpi kāmaloketi sugatiduggativasena sabbasmimpi kāmaloke. Yathārahanti dvārārammaṇānurūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1382_1: Apāyesupi yaṃ nāgasupaṇṇādīnaṃ mahāsampattivisayaṃ vipākaviññāṇaṃ, yañca nirayavāsīnaṃ
tika-abh07t:1382_2: mahāmoggallānattheradassanādīsu uppajjati vipākaviññāṇaṃ, taṃ kusalakammasseva phalaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1382_3: Na hi akusalassa iṭṭhavipāko sambhavati. Vuttañhetaṃ “aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso,
tika-abh07t:1382_4: yaṃ akusalassa kammassa iṭṭho kanto vipāko saṃvijjatī”ti, tasmā kusalakammaṃ apāyesupi
tika-abh07t:1382_5: ahetukavipākāni janeti. Aññabhūmikassa ca kammassa aññabhūmikavipākābhāvato kāmavirāgabhāvanāya
tika-abh07t:1382_7: rūpāvacarakammena ahetukavipākuppattiyā abhāvato rūpalokepi yathārahaṃ rūpādivisayāni
tika-abh07t:1383_0: 71. Evaṃ pana vipaccantaṃ kammaṃ soḷasakadvādasakaaṭṭhakavasena tidhā vipaccatīti
tika-abh07t:1383_1: dassetuṃ “tatthāpi”tyādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāpīti evaṃ vipaccamānepi kusalakamme. Ukkaṭṭhanti

tika-abh07t:1383_4: samudāciṇṇaṃ. Taṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ. Yaṃ pana karaṇakāle akusalakammehi parivāritaṃ, pacchā
tika-abh07t:1383_5: vā “dukkaṭametaṃ mayā”ti vippaṭisāruppādanena paribhāvitaṃ, taṃ omakanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1384_0: Paṭisandhinti ekameva paṭisandhiṃ. Na hi ekena kammena anekāsu jātīsu paṭisandhi
tika-abh07t:1384_1: hoti, pavattivipāko pana jātisatepi jātisahassepi hoti. Yathāha “tiracchānagate dānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1384_2: datvā sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā”ti. Yasmā panettha ñāṇaṃ jaccandhādivipattinimittassa
tika-abh07t:1384_3: mohassa, sabbākusalasseva vā paṭipakkhaṃ, tasmā taṃsampayuttaṃ kammaṃ jaccandhādivipattipaccayaṃ
tika-abh07t:1384_4: na hotīti tihetukaṃ atidubbalampi samānaṃ duhetukapaṭisandhimeva ākaḍḍhati, nāhetukaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1384_5: Duhetukañca kammaṃ ñāṇasampayogābhāvato ñāṇaphaluppādane asamatthaṃ, yathā taṃ alobhasampayogābhāvato
tika-abh07t:1384_6: alobhaphaluppādane asamatthaṃ akusalakammanti taṃ atiukkaṭṭhampi samānaṃ duhetukameva
tika-abh07t:1384_7: paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati, na tihetukanti vuttaṃ “tihetukamomakaṃ duhetukamukkaṭṭhañcā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t:1385_0: Ettha siyā – yathā paṭisambhidāmagge “gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ
tika-abh07t:1385_1: paccayā upapatti hotī”ti kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe tiṇṇaṃ, nikantikkhaṇe dvinnaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1385_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe tiṇṇañca hetūnaṃ vasena aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā ñāṇasampayuttūpapatti,
tika-abh07t:1385_3: tathā “gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte channaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hotī”ti javanakkhaṇe
tika-abh07t:1385_4: dvinnaṃ, nikantikkhaṇe dvinnaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvinnañca hetūnaṃ vasena channaṃ
tika-abh07t:1385_5: hetūnaṃ paccayā ñāṇavippayuttūpapatti vuttā, evaṃ “gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte
tika-abh07t:1385_6: sattannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hotī”ti tihetukakammena duhetukapaṭisandhiyā avuttattā
tika-abh07t:1385_9: dātabbattā, kammasarikkhakavipākadassatthaṃ pana mahātherena sāvaseso pāṭho kato.
tika-abh07t:1385_10: Itarathā “catunnaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā”ti vacanābhāvato duhetukakammena ahetukūpapattiyāpiabhāvo
tika-abh07t:1385_11: āpajjati, tasmā yathā sugatiyaṃ jaccandhabadhirādivipattiyā ahetukūpapattiṃ vajjetvā
tika-abh07t:1385_12: gatisampattiyā sahetukūpapattidassanatthaṃ duhetukūpapatti eva uddhaṭā, na ahetukūpapatti,
tika-abh07t:1385_13: evaṃ kammasarikkhakavipākadassanatthaṃ tihetukakammena tihetukūpapatti eva uddhaṭā,
tika-abh07t:1385_14: na duhetukūpapatti, na pana alabbhanatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1386_0: 74. Evaṃ ekāya cetanāya soḷasa vipākāni ettheva dvādasakamaggo ahetukaṭṭhakampīti
tika-abh07t:1386_1: pavattassa tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheravādassa vasena vipākappavattiṃ dassetvā idāni ekāya
tika-abh07t:1386_2: cetanāya dvādasa vipākāni ettheva dasakamaggo ahetukaṭṭhakampīti āgatassa moravāpīvāsīmahādhammarakkhitattheravādassapi
tika-abh07t:1386_3: vasena dassetuṃ asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhāravipākānī”tyādi vuttaṃ. Yathā mukhe calite ādāsatale
tika-abh07t:1386_4: mukhanimittaṃ calati, evaṃ asaṅkhārakusalassa asaṅkhāravipākova hoti, na sasaṅkhāroti

tika-abh07t:1387_0: Tesanti tesaṃ evaṃvādīnaṃ. Yathākkamanti tihetukukkaṭṭhādīnaṃ anukkamena. Dvādasa
tika-abh07t:1387_2: asaṅkhārikacatukkavajjitāni ca dvādasa vipākāni, tathā tihetukomakassa, duhetukukkaṭṭhassa

tika-abh07t:1388_0: 75. Parito attaṃ khaṇḍitaṃ viya appānubhāvanti parittaṃ. Pakaṭṭhabhāvaṃ nītanti paṇītaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1388_1: ubhinnaṃ majjhe bhavaṃ majjhimaṃ. Tattha “paṭiladdhamattaṃ anāsevitaṃ paritta”nti
tika-abh07t:1388_2: avisesatova aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, tathā “nātisubhāvitaṃ aparipuṇṇavasībhāvaṃ majjhimaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1388_3: Ativiya subhāvitaṃ pana sabbaso paripuṇṇavasībhāvaṃ paṇīta”nti. Ācariyena panettha
tika-abh07t:1388_4: parittampi īsakaṃ laddhāsevanamevādhippetanti dissati. Tathā hānena nāmarūpaparicchede –
tika-abh07t:1390: Aladdhā tādisaṃ hetuṃ, abhiññā na vipaccatī”ti. ;
tika-abh07t:1391_0: Samānabhūmikatova āsevanalābhena balavabhāvato mahaggatadhammānaṃ vipākadānaṃ vatvā
tika-abh07t:1391_1: tadabhāvato abhiññāya avipaccanaṃ vuttaṃ. Hīnehi chandacittavīriyavīmaṃsāhi nibbattitaṃ
tika-abh07t:1391_2: vā parittaṃ. Majjhimehi chandādīhi majjhimaṃ. Paṇītehi paṇītanti alamatippapañcena.
tika-abh07t:1392_0: 84. Pañcamajjhānaṃ bhāvetvāti abhiññābhāvaṃ asampattaṃ pañcamajjhānaṃ tividhampi
tika-abh07t:1392_1: bhāvetvā. Abhiññābhāvappattassa pana avipākabhāvo “aladdhā tādisa”ntyādinā ācariyena
tika-abh07t:1392_2: sādhito. Mūlaṭīkākārādayo pana aññathāpi taṃ sādhenti. Taṃ pana saṅkhepato, tattha
tika-abh07t:1392_3: tattha vitthārato ca abhidhammatthavikāsiniyaṃ vuttanayena daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saññāvirāgaṃ
tika-abh07t:1392_4: bhāvetvāti “saññā rogo, saññā gaṇḍo”tyādinā, “dhī cittaṃ dhibbataṃ citta”ntyādinā
tika-abh07t:1392_5: vā nayena arūpappavattiyā ādīnavadassanena tadabhāve ca paṇītabhāvasanniṭṭhānena

tika-abh07t:1392_7: arūpassa anibbattisabhāvāpādanavasena arūpavirāgabhāvanaṃ bhāvetvā aññasattesu uppajjanti
tika-abh07t:1392_8: kammakiriyavādino titthiyā evātyadhippāyo. Te pana yena iriyāpathena idha maranti.
tika-abh07t:1393_0: 86. Anāgāmino pana suddhāvāsesu uppajjantīti anāgāminoyeva ariyā puthujjanādikāle,
tika-abh07t:1393_1: pacchāpi vā pañcamajjhānaṃ tividhampi bhāvetvā saddhādiindriyavemattatānukkamena
tika-abh07t:1394_0: 87. Yathākkamaṃ bhāvetvā yathākkamaṃ āruppesu uppajjantīti yojanā yathākkamanti ca
tika-abh07t:1394_1: paṭhamāruppādianukkamena. Sabbampi cetaṃ tassa tasseva jhānassa āveṇikabhūmivasena
tika-abh07t:1394_2: vuttaṃ. Nikantiyā pana sati puthujjanādayo yathāladdhajjhānassa bhūmibhūtesu suddhāvāsavajjitesu
tika-abh07t:1394_3: yattha katthaci nibbattanti, tathā kāmabhavepi kāmāvacarakammabalena. ‘Ijjhati, bhikkhave,

tika-abh07t:1394_5: pahīnattā kāmabhavesu nikantiṃ na uppādentīti kāmalokavajjite yathāladdhajjhānabhūmibhūte
tika-abh07t:1394_6: yattha katthaci nibbattanti. Suddhāvāsesu hi anāgāminoyeva nibbattantīti niyamo atthi.
tika-abh07t:1394_7: Te pana aññattha na nibbattantīti niyamo natthi. Evañca katvā vuttaṃ ācariyena –
tika-abh07t:1397_0: Sukkhavipassakāpi panete maraṇakāle ekanteneva samāpattiṃ nibbattenti samādhimhi
tika-abh07t:1397_1: paripūrakārībhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Itthiyopi pana ariyā vā anariyā vā aṭṭhasamāpattilābhiniyo
tika-abh07t:1397_2: brahmapārisajjesuyeva nibbattantī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Apicettha vehapphalaakaniṭṭhacatutthāruppabhavānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1397_3: seṭṭhabhavabhāvato tattha nibbattā ariyā aññattha nuppajjanti, tathā avasesesu uparūpari
tika-abh07t:1403_1: parikkhayena maraṇaṃ āyukkhayamaraṇaṃ. Satipi tattha tattha paricchinnāyusese gatikālādipaccayasāmaggiyañca
tika-abh07t:1403_2: taṃtaṃbhavasādhakassa kammuno pariniṭṭhitavipākattā maraṇaṃ kammakkhayamaraṇaṃ. Āyukammānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1403_3: samakameva parikkhīṇattā maraṇaṃ ubhayakkhayamaraṇaṃ. Satipi tasmiṃ duvime purimabhavasiddhassa

tika-abh07t:1403_7: taṅkhaṇeyeva ṭhānācāvanavasena pavattamaraṇaṃ upacchedakamaraṇaṃ nāma. Idaṃ pana
tika-abh07t:1403_8: nerayikānaṃ uttarakuruvāsīnaṃ kesañci devānañca na hoti. Tenāhu –
tika-abh07t:1406_1: katthaci pana anuppajjamānassa khīṇāsavassa yathopaṭṭhitaṃ nāmarūpadhammādikameva
tika-abh07t:1406_2: cutipariyosānānaṃ gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati, na kammakammanimittādayo. Upaladdhapubbanti
tika-abh07t:1406_3: cetiyadassanādivasena pubbe upaladdhaṃ. Upakaraṇabhūtanti pupphādivasena upakaraṇabhūtaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1407_0: Kammabalenāti paṭisandhinibbattakassa kusalākusalakammassa ānubhāvena. Channaṃ dvārānanti
tika-abh07t:1407_1: vakkhamānanayena yathāsambhavaṃ channaṃ upapattidvārānaṃ, yadi kusalakammaṃ vipaccati,
tika-abh07t:1407_2: tadā parisuddhaṃ kusalacittaṃ pavattati, atha akusalakammaṃ, tadā upakkiliṭṭhaṃ akusalacittanti
tika-abh07t:1407_3: āha “vipaccamānaka…pe… kiliṭṭhaṃ vā”ti. Tenāha bhagavā “nimittassādagadhitaṃ vā,
tika-abh07t:1407_4: bhikkhave, viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhamānaṃ tiṭṭhati, anubyañjanassādagadhitaṃ vā, tasmiṃ ce
tika-abh07t:1407_5: samaye kālaṃ karoti, ṭhānametaṃ vijjati, yaṃ dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ gatiṃ upapajjeyya
tika-abh07t:1407_6: nirayaṃ vā tiracchānayoniṃ vā”ti. Tatthoṇataṃ vāti tasmiṃ upapajjitabbabhave oṇataṃ
tika-abh07t:1407_7: viya, tatthoṇataṃ evāti vā padacchedo. “Bāhullenā”ti ettha adhippāyo “yebhuyyena
tika-abh07t:1407_8: bhavantare”ti ettha vuttanayena daṭṭhabbo. Atha vā “yathāraha”nti imināva so sakkā
tika-abh07t:1407_9: saṅgahetunti “bāhullenā”ti iminā sahasā occhijjamānajīvitānaṃ saṇikaṃ marantānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1407_10: viya na abhikkhaṇamevāti dīpitanti viññāyati. Abhinavakaraṇavasenāti taṅkhaṇe kariyamānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1408_0: 91. Paccāsannamaraṇassāti ekavīthippamāṇāyukavasena, tato vā kiñci adhikāyukavasena
tika-abh07t:1408_2: vā vīthicittānaṃ avasāne. Tattha “kāmabhavato cavitvā tattheva uppajjamānānaṃ tadārammaṇapariyosānāni,
tika-abh07t:1408_3: sesānaṃ javanapariyosānānī”ti dhammānusāraṇiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Bhavaṅgakkhayevāti yadi ekajavanavīthito
tika-abh07t:1408_4: adhikatarāyuseso siyā, tadā bhavaṅgāvasāne vā uppajjitvā nirujjhati. Atha ekacittakkhaṇāyuseso
tika-abh07t:1408_5: siyā, tadā vīthicittāvasāne, tañca atītakammādivisayameva. “Tassānantaramevā”ti iminā
tika-abh07t:1409_0: Yathārahanti kammakaraṇakālassa, vipākadānakālassa ca anurūpavasena. Atha vā vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṃ
tika-abh07t:1409_1: anusayavasena, javanasahajātavasena vā pavattianurūpatotyattho. Nanu ca “avijjānusayaparikkhittenā”tyādi
tika-abh07t:1409_2: vuttaṃ. Javanasahajātānañca kathaṃ anusayabhāvoti? Nāyaṃ doso anusayasadisatāya tāsampi
tika-abh07t:1409_3: anusayavohārabhāvato. Itarathā akusalakammasahajātānaṃ bhavataṇhāsahajātānaṃ vā cutiāsannajavanasahajātānañca
tika-abh07t:1409_4: saṅgaho na siyā. Avijjāva appahīnaṭṭhena anusayanato pavattanato anusayo, tena parikkhittena
tika-abh07t:1409_5: parivāritena. Taṇhānusayova mūlaṃ padhānaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhūtaṃ imassāti taṇhānusayamūlako.
tika-abh07t:1409_7: vā, tena janiyamānaṃ. Avijjāya hi paṭicchannādīnavavisaye taṇhā nāmeti, khipanakasaṅkhārasammatā
tika-abh07t:1414_0: Sampayuttehi pariggayhamānanti attanā sampayuttehi phassādīhi dhammehi sampayuttapaccayādinā
tika-abh07t:1414_1: parivāretvā gayhamānaṃ, sahajātānamadhiṭṭhānabhāvena pubbaṅgamabhūtanti attanā sahajātānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1414_2: patiṭṭhānabhāvena padhānabhūtaṃ. “Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Bhavantarapaṭisandhānavasenāti
tika-abh07t:1414_3: purimabhavantarassa, pacchimabhavantarassa ca aññamaññaṃ ekābaddhaṃ viya paṭisandahanavasena
tika-abh07t:1414_4: uppajjamānameva patiṭṭhāti, na ito gantvātyadhippāyo. Na hi purimabhavapariyāpanno
tika-abh07t:1414_5: koci dhammo bhavantaraṃ saṅkamati, nāpi purimabhavapariyāpannahetūhi vinā uppajjati
tika-abh07t:1415_0: 92. Mandaṃ hutvā pavattāni mandappavattāni. Paccuppannārammaṇesu āpāthagatesu manodvāre
tika-abh07t:1415_2: paccuppannārammaṇatā labbhatīti manodvāre tāva paṭisandhiyā catunnaṃ bhavaṅgānañca,
tika-abh07t:1415_3: pañcadvāre pana paṭisandhiyāva paccuppannārammaṇabhāvo labbhati. Tathā hi kassaci
tika-abh07t:1415_4: manodvāre āpāthamāgataṃ paccuppannaṃ gatinimittaṃ ārabbha uppannāya tadārammaṇapariyosānāya
tika-abh07t:1415_5: cittavīthiyā anantaraṃ cuticitte uppanne tadanantaraṃ pañcacittakkhaṇāyuke ārammaṇe
tika-abh07t:1415_6: pavattāya paṭisandhiyā catunnaṃ bhavaṅgānaṃ, pañcadvāre ca ñātakādīhi upaṭṭhāpitesu
tika-abh07t:1415_7: deyyadhammesu vaṇṇādike ārabbha yathārahaṃ pavattāya cittavīthiyā cuticittassa ca
tika-abh07t:1415_8: anantaraṃ ekacittakkhaṇāyuke ārammaṇe pavattāya paṭisandhiyā paccuppannārammaṇe pavatti
tika-abh07t:1415_9: upalabbhatīti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimagge vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh07t:1415_12: yojetabbaṃ. Apare pana avisesato vaṇṇenti. Saccasaṅkhepepi tenevādhippāyena idaṃ vuttaṃ –
tika-abh07t:1417_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “gatinimittaṃ manodvāre āpāthamāgacchatī”ti vuttattā, tadārammaṇāya
tika-abh07t:1417_1: ca pañcadvārikapaṭisandhiyā adassitattā, mūlaṭīkādīsu ca “kammabalena upaṭṭhāpitaṃ
tika-abh07t:1417_2: vaṇṇāyatanaṃ supinaṃ passantassa viya dibbacakkhussa viya ca manodvāreyeva gocarabhāvaṃ
tika-abh07t:1417_3: gacchatī”ti niyametvā vuttattā tesaṃ vacanaṃ na sampaṭicchanti ācariyā. “Paccuppannañcā”ti
tika-abh07t:1417_4: ettha gatinimittaṃ tāva paccuppannārammaṇaṃ yujjati, kammanimittaṃ pana paṭisandhijanakakammasseva
tika-abh07t:1417_5: nimittabhūtaṃ adhippetanti kathaṃ tassa cutiāsannajavanehi gahitassa paccuppannabhāvo
tika-abh07t:1417_6: sambhavati. Na hi tadeva ārammaṇupaṭṭhāpakaṃ, tadeva paṭisandhijanakaṃ bhaveyya upacitabhāvābhāvato
tika-abh07t:1417_7: anassāditattā ca. “Katattā upacitattā”ti hi vacanato punappunaṃ laddhāsevanameva
tika-abh07t:1417_8: kammaṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati. Paṭisambhidāmagge ca nikantikkhaṇe dvinnaṃ hetūnaṃ
tika-abh07t:1417_9: paccayāpi sahetukapaṭisandhiyā vuttattākatūpacitampi kammaṃ taṇhāya assāditameva
tika-abh07t:1417_10: vipākaṃ abhinipphādeti, tadā ca paṭisandhiyā samānavīthiyaṃ viya pavattamānāni cutiāsannajavanāni
tika-abh07t:1417_11: kathaṃ punappunaṃ laddhāsevanāni siyuṃ, kathañca tāni tadā kaṇhāya parāmaṭṭhāni.
tika-abh07t:1417_12: Apica paccuppannaṃ kammanimittaṃ cutiāsannappavattānaṃ pañcadvārikajavanānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:1417_13: hoti. “Pañcadvārikakammañca paṭisandhinimittakaṃ na hoti paridubbalabhāvato”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh07t:1417_14: vuttanti saccametaṃ. Ñātakādīhi upaṭṭhāpitesu pana pupphādīsu sannihitesveva maraṇasambhavato
tika-abh07t:1417_15: tattha vaṇṇādikaṃ ārabbha cutiāsannavīthito purimabhāgappavattānaṃ paṭisandhijananasamatthānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1417_16: manodvārikajavanānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtena saha samānattā tadekasantatipatitaṃ cutiāsannajavanaggahitampi
tika-abh07t:1417_17: paccuppannaṃ vaṇṇādikaṃ kammanimittabhāvena vuttaṃ. Evañca katvā vuttaṃ ānandācariyena
tika-abh07t:1419_0: 98. Āruppacutiyā paraṃ heṭṭhimāruppavajjitā āruppapaṭisandhiyo honti uparūpariarūpīnaṃ
tika-abh07t:1419_1: heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimakammassa anāyūhanato, upacārajjhānassa pana balavabhāvato tassa vipākabhūtā
tika-abh07t:1419_2: kāmatihetukā paṭisandhiyo honti. Rūpāvacaracutiyā paraṃ ahetukarahitā upacārajjhānānubhāveneva
tika-abh07t:1419_3: duhetukatihetukapaṭisandhiyo siyuṃ, kāmatihetumhā cutito paraṃ sabbā eva kāmarūpārūpabhavapariyāpannā
tika-abh07t:1419_4: yathārahaṃ ahetukādipaṭisandhiyo siyuṃ. Itaro duhetukāhetukacutito paraṃ kāmesveva
tika-abh07t:1421_0: 99. Paṭisandhiyā nirodhassa anantarato paṭisandhinirodhānantarato. Tadeva cittanti
tika-abh07t:1421_1: taṃsadisatāya tabbohārappavattattā tadeva cittaṃ yathā “tāniyeva osadhānī”ti. Asati
tika-abh07t:1421_2: vīthicittuppādeti antarantarā vīthicittānaṃ uppāde asati, cuticittaṃ hutvā nirujjhati
tika-abh07t:1423_0: 102. Yathā iha bhavepaṭisandhi ceva bhavaṅgañca vīthiyo ca cuti ca, tathā puna bhavantare
tika-abh07t:1423_1: paṭisandhibhavaṅganti evamādikā ayaṃ cittasantati parivattatīti yojanā. Keci pana
tika-abh07t:1423_4: atthaṃ vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ pavattisaṅgahadassanāvasāne tattha saṅgahitānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1423_5: sabbesameva nigamanassa adhippetattā. Evañhi sati “paṭisaṅkhāya panetamaddhuva”nti
tika-abh07t:1423_6: ettha sabbesameva eta-saddena parāmasanaṃ suṭṭhu upapannaṃ hoti. Etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ
tika-abh07t:1423_7: vaṭṭapavattaṃ addhuvaṃ aniccaṃ palokadhammaṃ paṭisaṅkhāya paccavekkhitvā budhā paṇḍitā
tika-abh07t:1423_8: cirāya cirakālaṃ subbatā hutvā accutaṃ dhuvaṃ acavanadhammaṃ padaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigantvā
tika-abh07t:1423_9: maggaphalañāṇena sacchikatvā tatoyeva suṭṭhu samucchinnasinehabandhanā samaṃ nirupadhisesanibbānadhātuṃ
tika-abh07t:1427_0: 1. Evaṃ tāva cittacetasikavasena duvidhaṃ abhidhammatthaṃ dassetvā idāni rūpaṃ, tadanantarañca
tika-abh07t:1427_2: tīhi paricchedehi vuttappabhedavanto, pavattipaṭisandhivasena dvīhi paricchedehi
tika-abh07t:1427_3: vuttappavattivanto ca cittacetasikā dhammā ettāvatā pañcahi paricchedehi vibhattā
tika-abh07t:1427_4: hi yasmā, idāni yathānuppattaṃ rūpaṃ pavuccatīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t:1428_1: Saṅkhepato uddisanaṃ samuddeso. Ekavidhādivasena vibhajanaṃ vibhāgo, samuṭṭhāti etasmā
tika-abh07t:1428_2: phalanti samuṭṭhānaṃ, kammādayo rūpajanakapaccayā. Cakkhudasakādayo kalāpā. Pavattikkamato
tika-abh07t:1430_0: 3. Upādinnānupādinnasantānesu sasambhāradhātuvasena mahantā hutvā bhūtā pātubhūtāti
tika-abh07t:1430_1: mahābhūtā. Athavā anekavidhaabbhutavisesadassanena, anekābhūtadassanena vā mahantāni
tika-abh07t:1430_2: abbhutāni, abhūtāni vā etesūti mahābhūtā, māyākārādayo. Tehi samānā sayaṃ anīlādisabhāvāneva
tika-abh07t:1430_3: nīlādiupādāyarūpadassanāditoti mahābhūtā. Manāpavaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīhi vā sattānaṃ vañcikā
tika-abh07t:1430_4: yakkhiniādayo viya manāpaitthipurisarūpadassanādinā sattānaṃ vañcakattā mahantāni
tika-abh07t:1433_0: Atha vā mahantapātubhāvato mahantāni bhavanti etesu upādārūpāni, bhūtāni cāti mahābhūtāni.
tika-abh07t:1433_1: Mahābhūte upādāya pavattaṃ rūpaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ. Yadi evaṃ “ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca
tika-abh07t:1433_2: tato mahābhūtā”tyādivacanato ekekamahābhūtā sesamahābhūtānaṃ nissayā hontīti tesampi
tika-abh07t:1433_4: Yañhi mahābhūte upādiyati, sayañca aññehi upādīyati. Na taṃ upādāyarūpaṃ. Yaṃ pana
tika-abh07t:1433_5: upādīyateva, na kenaci upādīyati, tadeva upādāyarūpanti natthi bhūtānaṃ tabbohārappasaṅgo.
tika-abh07t:1433_6: Apica catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpanti upādāyarūpalakkhaṇanti natthi tayo upādāya
tika-abh07t:1434_0: 4. Pathanaṭṭhena pathavī, tarupabbatādīnaṃ pakatipathavī viya sahajātarūpānaṃ patiṭṭhānabhāvena
tika-abh07t:1434_1: pakkhāyati, upaṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ hoti, pathavī eva dhātu salakkhaṇadhāraṇādito nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena
tika-abh07t:1434_2: sarīraselāvayavadhātusadisattā cāti pathavīdhātu. Āpeti sahajātarūpāni pattharati,
tika-abh07t:1434_3: āpāyati vā brūheti vaḍḍhetīti āpo. Tejeti paripāceti, niseti vā tikkhabhāvena sesabhūtattayaṃ
tika-abh07t:1434_4: usmāpetīti tejo. Vāyati desantaruppattihetubhāvena bhūtasaṅghātaṃ pāpetīti vāyo.
tika-abh07t:1435_0: 5. Cakkhādīnaṃ vacanattho heṭṭhā kathitova. Pasādarūpaṃ nāma catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1435_2: Tattha cakkhu tāva majjhe kaṇhamaṇḍalassa ūkāsirappamāṇe abhimukhe ṭhitānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānuppattipadese
tika-abh07t:1435_5: catūhi dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ utucittāhārehi upatthambhiyamānaṃ āyunā paripāliyamānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1435_6: vaṇṇādīhi parivāritaṃ yathāyogaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sadhentaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh07t:1435_7: itaraṃ “sasambhāracakkhū”ti vuccati. Evaṃ sotādayopi yathākkamaṃ sotabilabbhantare
tika-abh07t:1435_9: uppaladalaggasaṇṭhānaṃ padesaṃ abhibyāpetvā pavattanti, itaraṃ pana ṭhapetvā kammajatejassa
tika-abh07t:1435_10: patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ kesaggalomagganakhaggasukkhacammāni ca avasesaṃ sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā
tika-abh07t:1435_11: pavattati. Evaṃ santepi itarehi tassa saṅkaro na hoti bhinnanissayalakkhaṇattā. Ekanissayānipi
tika-abh07t:1435_12: hi rūparasādīni lakkhaṇabhedato asaṃkiṇṇāti kiṃ pana bhinnanissayā pasādā.
tika-abh07t:1436_0: 6. Āpodhātuyā sukhumabhāvena phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā vuttaṃ “āpodhātu vivajjitaṃ
tika-abh07t:1436_1: bhūtattayasaṅkhāta”nti. Kiñcāpi hi sītatā phusitvā gayhati, sā pana tejoyeva. Mande
tika-abh07t:1436_2: hi uṇhatte sītabuddhi sītatāsaṅkhātassa kassaci guṇassa abhāvato. Tayidaṃ sītabuddhiyā
tika-abh07t:1436_3: anavaṭṭhitabhāvato viññāyati pārāpāre viya. Tathā hi ghammakāle ātape ṭhatvā chāyaṃ
tika-abh07t:1436_4: paviṭṭhānaṃ sītabuddhi hoti, tattheva cirakālaṃ ṭhitānaṃ uṇhabuddhi. Yadi ca āpodhātu
tika-abh07t:1436_5: sītatā siyā, uṇhabhāvena saha ekasmiṃ kalāpe upalabbheyya, na cevaṃ upalabbhati,
tika-abh07t:1436_6: tasmā viññāyati “na āpodhātu sītatā”ti. Ye pana “davatā āpodhātu, sā ca phusitvā
tika-abh07t:1436_7: gayhatī”ti vadanti, te vattabbā “davatā nāma phusitvā gayhatīti idaṃ āyasmantānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1441_0: Gocararūpaṃ nāma pañcaviññāṇavisayabhāvato. Gāvo indriyāni caranti etthāti gocaranti
tika-abh07t:1441_1: hi ārammaṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ pañcavidhampi yathākkamaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ
tika-abh07t:1442_0: 7. Itthiyā bhāvo itthattaṃ. Purisassa bhāvo purisattaṃ. Tattha itthiliṅganimittakuttākappahetubhāvalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:1442_1: itthattaṃ, purisaliṅgādihetubhāvalakkhaṇaṃ purisattaṃ. Tattha itthīnaṃ aṅgajātaṃ
tika-abh07t:1442_2: itthiliṅgaṃ. Sarādhippāyā itthinimittaṃ “itthī”ti sañjānanassa paccayabhāvato. Avisadaṭhānagamananisajjādi
tika-abh07t:1442_3: itthikuttaṃ. Itthisaṇṭhānaṃ itthākappo. Purisaliṅgādīnipi vuttanayena daṭṭhabbāni.
tika-abh07t:1442_4: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana aññathā itthiliṅgādīni vaṇṇitāni. Taṃ pana evaṃ saṅgahetvā vadanti –
tika-abh07t:1445: Bhāvarūpaṃ nāma bhavati etena itthādiabhidhānaṃ, buddhi cāti katvā. Taṃ panetaṃ kāyindriyaṃ viya sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh07t:1446_0: 8. Hadayameva manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayattā vatthu cāti hadayavatthu. Tathā
tika-abh07t:1446_1: hi taṃ dhātudvayanissayabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ, tañca hadayakosabbhantare aḍḍhapasatamattaṃ
tika-abh07t:1446_2: lohitaṃ nissāya pavattati. Rūpakaṇḍe avuttassapi panetassa āgamato, yuttito ca atthibhāvo
tika-abh07t:1446_3: daṭṭhabbo. Tattha, taṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti “yaṃ
tika-abh07t:1446_4: rūpaṃ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena
tika-abh07t:1446_5: paccayo”ti evamāgataṃ paṭṭhānavacanaṃ āgamo. Yutti panevaṃ daṭṭhabbā –
tika-abh07t:1452: Na ca bhāvadvayaṃ tasmiṃ, asantepi pavattito.
tika-abh07t:1456_0: 9. Jīvanti tenāti jīvitaṃ, tadeva kammajarūpaparipālane ādhipaccayogato indriyanti
tika-abh07t:1456_1: jīvitindriyaṃ. Tathā hetaṃ kammajarūpaparipālanalakkhaṇaṃ. Yathāsakaṃ khaṇamattaṭṭhāyīnampi
tika-abh07t:1456_2: hi sahajātānaṃ pavattihetubhāveneva anupālakaṃ. Na hi tesaṃ kammaṃyeva ṭhitikāraṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:1456_3: hoti āhārajādīnaṃ āhārādi viya kammassa taṅkhaṇābhāvato. Idaṃ pana saha pācanagginā
tika-abh07t:1457_0: 10. Kabaḷaṃ katvā ajjhoharīyatīti kabaḷīkāro āhāro, idañca savatthukaṃ katvā āhāraṃ
tika-abh07t:1457_1: dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Sendriyakāyopatthambhanahetubhūtā pana aṅgamaṅgānusārī rasaharasaṅkhātā
tika-abh07t:1457_2: ajjhoharitabbāhārasinehabhūtā ojā idha āhārarūpaṃ nāma. Tathā hetaṃ sendriyakāyopatthambhanahetubhāvalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1458_0: 11. Kakkhaḷattādinā attano attano sabhāvena upalabbhanato sabhāvarūpaṃ nāma. Uppādādīhi,
tika-abh07t:1458_1: aniccatādīhi vā lakkhaṇehi sahitanti salakkhaṇaṃ. Paricchedādibhāvaṃ vinā attano
tika-abh07t:1458_2: sabhāveneva kammādīhi paccayehi nipphannattā nippharūpaṃ nāma. Ruppanasabhāvo rūpaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1458_3: tena yuttampi rūpaṃ, yathā “arisaso, nīluppala”nti, svāyaṃ rūpa-saddo ruḷhiyā ataṃsabhāvepi
tika-abh07t:1458_4: pavattatīti aparena rūpa-saddena visesetvā “rūparūpa”nti vuttaṃ yathā “dukkhadukkha”nti.
tika-abh07t:1458_5: Paricchedādibhāvaṃ atikkamitvā sabhāveneva upalabbhanato lakkhaṇattayāropanena sammasituṃ
tika-abh07t:1459_0: 12. Na kassatīti akāso. Akāsoyeva ākāso, nijjīvaṭṭhena dhātu cāti ākāsadhātu. Cakkhudasakādiekekakalāpagatarūpānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1459_1: kalāpantarehi asaṃkiṇṇabhāvāpādanavasena paricchedakaṃ, tehi vā paricchijjamānaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1459_2: tesaṃ paricchedamattaṃ vā rūpaṃ paricchedarūpaṃ. Tañhi taṃ taṃ rūpakalāpaṃ paricchindantaṃ
tika-abh07t:1459_3: viya hoti. Vijjamānepi ca kalāpantarabhūtehi kalāpantarabhūtānaṃ samphuṭṭhabhāve
tika-abh07t:1459_4: taṃtaṃrūpavivittatā rūpapariyanto ākāso. Yesañca so paricchedo, tehi sayaṃ asamphuṭṭhoyeva.
tika-abh07t:1459_5: Aññathā paricchinnatā na siyā tesaṃ rūpānaṃ byāpībhāvāpattito. Abyāpitā hi asamphuṭṭhatā.
tika-abh07t:1460_0: 13. Calamānakāyena adhippāyaṃ viññāpeti, sayañca tena viññāyatīti kāyaviññatti. Saviññāṇakasaddasaṅkhātavācāya
tika-abh07t:1460_1: adhippāyaṃ viññāpeti, sayañca tāya viññāyatīti vacīviññatti. Tattha abhikkamādijanakacittasamuṭṭhānavāyodhātuyā
tika-abh07t:1460_3: mahantaṃ pāsāṇaṃ ukkhipantassa sabbathāmena gahaṇakāle ussāhanavikāro viya rūpakāyassa
tika-abh07t:1460_4: pariphandanapaccayabhāvena upalabbhamāno vikāro kāyaviññatti. Sā hi phandamānakāyena
tika-abh07t:1460_5: adhippāyaṃ viññāpeti. Na hi viññattivikārarahitesu rukkhacalanādīsu “idamesa kāretī”ti
tika-abh07t:1460_6: adhippāyaggahaṇaṃ diṭṭhanti. Hatthacalanādīsu ca phandamānakāyaggahaṇānantaraṃ aviññāyamānantarehi
tika-abh07t:1461_0: Kathaṃ pana viññattivasena hatthacalanādayo hontīti? Vuccate – ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ
tika-abh07t:1461_2: vāyodhātūhi laddhopatthambhā desantaruppattihetubhāvena calayati cittajaṃ, purimajavanādisambhūtā
tika-abh07t:1461_3: pana santhambhanasandhāraṇamattakarā tassa upakārāya hontīti. Yathā hi sattahi yugehi
tika-abh07t:1461_4: ākaḍḍhitabbasakaṭe sattamayugayuttāyeva goṇā heṭṭhā chasu yugesu yuttagoṇehi laddhūpatthambhā
tika-abh07t:1461_5: sakaṭaṃ cālenti, paṭhamayugādiyuttā pana upatthambhanasandhāraṇamattameva sādhentā
tika-abh07t:1462_0: Desantaruppattiyeva cettha calanaṃ uppannadesato kesaggamattampi dhammānaṃ saṅkamanābhāvato.
tika-abh07t:1462_1: Itarathā nesaṃ abyāpārakatā, khaṇikatā ca na siyā. Desantaruppattihetubhāvoti ca
tika-abh07t:1462_2: yathā attanā sahajarūpāni heṭṭhimajavanasamuṭṭhitarūpehi patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānato aññattha
tika-abh07t:1462_3: uppajjanti, evaṃ tehi saha tattha uppattiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, ettha pana cittaje calite
tika-abh07t:1462_4: taṃsambandhena itarampi calati nadīsote pakkhittasukkhagomayapiṇḍaṃ viya. Tathā calayituṃ
tika-abh07t:1462_8: akkharuppattiṭṭhānagataupādinnarūpehi saha ghaṭṭanapaccayabhūto eko vikāro vacīviññatti.
tika-abh07t:1462_9: Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ kāyaviññattiyaṃ vuttanayena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1463_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – yathā tattha “phandamānakāyaggahaṇānantara”nti vuttaṃ, evamidha
tika-abh07t:1463_1: “suyyamānasaddasavanānantara”nti yojetabbaṃ. Idha ca santhambhanādīnaṃ abhāvato sattamajavanasamuṭṭhitātyādinayo
tika-abh07t:1463_2: na labbhati. Ghaṭṭanena hi saddhiṃyeva saddo uppajjati. Ghaṭṭanañca paṭhamajavanādīsupi
tika-abh07t:1463_3: labbhateva. Ettha ca yathā ussāpetvā baddhagosīsatālapaṇṇādirūpāni disvā tadanantarappavattāya
tika-abh07t:1463_5: gahetvā udakaggahaṇaṃ hoti, evaṃ vipphandamānasamuccāriyamānakāyasadde gahetvā tadanantarappavattāya
tika-abh07t:1464_0: 14. Lahubhāvo lahutā. Mudubhāvo mudutā. Kammaññabhāvo kammaññatā. Yathākkamañcetā
tika-abh07t:1464_1: arogino viya rūpānaṃ agarutā suparimadditacammassa viya akathinatā sudhantasuvaṇṇassa
tika-abh07t:1464_2: viya sarīrakiriyānaṃ anukūlabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññamaññaṃ avijahantassapi hi lahutādittayassa
tika-abh07t:1465_1: paṭhamatthajotanato. Santāno santati, pabandhotyattho. Tattha paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya
tika-abh07t:1465_2: yāva cakkhādidasakānaṃ uppatti, etthantare rūpuppādo upacayo nāma. Tato paraṃ santati
tika-abh07t:1465_3: nāma. Yathāsakaṃ khaṇamattaṭṭhāyīnaṃ rūpānaṃ nirodhābhimukhabhāvavasena jīraṇaṃ jarā,
tika-abh07t:1465_4: sāyeva jaratā, niccadhuvabhāvena na iccaṃ anupagantabbanti aniccaṃ, tassa bhāvo aniccatā,
tika-abh07t:1465_5: rūpaparibhedo. Lakkhaṇarūpaṃ nāma dhammānaṃ taṃtaṃavatthāvasena lakkhaṇahetuttā.
tika-abh07t:1466_0: 16. Jātirūpamevāti paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya rūpānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe uppattibhāvato jātisaṅkhātaṃ

tika-abh07t:1548_1: gabbhaseyyakasattā. Ete aṇḍajajalābujā. Tīṇi dasakāni pātubhavanti, yāni “kalalarūpa”nti
tika-abh07t:1548_2: vuccanti, paripiṇḍitāni ca tāni jātiuṇṇāya ekassa aṃsuno pasannatilatele pakkhipitvā
tika-abh07t:1548_3: uddhaṭassa paggharitvā agge ṭhitabindumattāni acchāni vippasannāni. Kadāci na labbhati
tika-abh07t:1548_4: abhāvakasattānaṃ vasena. Tato paranti paṭisandhito paraṃ. Pavattikāleti sattame sattāhe,
tika-abh07t:1548_5: ṭīkākāramatena ekādasame sattāhe vā. Kamenāti cakkhudasakapātubhāvato sattāhātikkamena
tika-abh07t:1548_6: sotadasakaṃ, tato sattāhātikkamena ghānadasakaṃ, tato sattāhātikkamena jivhādasakanti
tika-abh07t:1548_7: evaṃ anukkamena. Aṭṭhakathāyampi hi ayamattho dassitova.
tika-abh07t:1549_0: 55. Ṭhitikālanti paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikālaṃ. Paṭisandhicittasahajātā hi utu ṭhānappattā
tika-abh07t:1549_1: tassa ṭhitikkhaṇe suddhaṭṭhakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, tadā uppannā bhaṅgakkhaṇetyādinā anukkamena
tika-abh07t:1549_2: utu rūpaṃ janeti. Ojāpharaṇamupādāyāti gabbhaseyyakassa mātu ajjhohaṭāhārato saṃsedajopapātikānañca
tika-abh07t:1549_3: mukhagatasemhādito ojāya rasaharaṇīanusārena sarīre pharaṇakālato paṭṭhāya.
tika-abh07t:1550: 56. Cuticittaṃ uparimaṃ etassāti cuticittopari. Kammajarūpāni na uppajjanti taduppattiyaṃ maraṇābhāvato. Kammajarūpavicchede hi “mato”ti vuccati. Yathāha –
tika-abh07t:1551: “Āyu usmā ca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahantimaṃ;
tika-abh07t:1553_0: Puretaranti sattarasamassa uppādakkhaṇe. Tatoparaṃ cittajāhārajarūpañca vocchijjatīti
tika-abh07t:1553_1: ajīvakasantāne tesaṃ uppattiyā abhāvato yathānibbattaṃ cittajaṃ, āhārajañca tato
tika-abh07t:1553_2: paraṃ kiñci kālaṃ pavattitvā nirujjhati. Apare pana ācariyā “cittajarūpaṃ cuticittato
tika-abh07t:1554_0: 58. Rūpaloke ghānajivhākāyānaṃ abhāve kāraṇaṃ vuttameva. Bhāvadvayaṃ pana bahalakāmarāgūpanissayattā
tika-abh07t:1554_1: brahmānañca tadabhāvato tattha na pavattati. Āhārajakalāpāni ca na labbhanti ajjhohaṭāhārābhāvena
tika-abh07t:1554_2: sarīragatassapi āhārassa rūpasamuṭṭhāpanābhāvato. Bāhirañhi utuṃ, āhārañca upanissayaṃ
tika-abh07t:1554_3: labhitvā utuāhārā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti. Jīvitanavakanti kāyābhāvato kāyadasakaṭṭhāniyaṃ jīvitanavakaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1555_0: 59. Atiricchati sesabrahmānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ, pavatte ca upalabhitabbarūpato avasiṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh07t:1555_1: hoti, maraṇakāle pana brahmānaṃ sarīranikkhepābhāvato sabbesampi tisamuṭṭhānāni,
tika-abh07t:1556_0: 61. Rūpesu tevīsati ghānajivhākāyabhāvadvayavasena pañcannaṃ abhāvato. Keci pana
tika-abh07t:1556_2: akāraṇaṃ. Na hi vūpasametabbāpekkhā tabbirodhidhammappavatti tathā sati sahetukakiriyacittesu
tika-abh07t:1556_3: lahutādīnaṃ abhāvappasaṅgato. “Saddo vikāro”tyādi sabbesampi sādhāraṇavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1559_0: 62. Ettāvatā cittacetasikarūpāni vibhāgato niddisitvā idāni nibbānaṃ niddisanto āha
tika-abh07t:1559_3: anumānasiddhataṃ. Saṅkhatadhammārammaṇañhi, paññattārammaṇaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchedapaṭippassambhane
tika-abh07t:1559_4: asamatthaṃ, atthi ca loke kilesasamucchedādi. Tasmā atthi saṅkhatasammutidhammaviparīto
tika-abh07t:1559_5: kilesānaṃ samucchedapaṭippassaddhikarānaṃ maggaphalānaṃ ārammaṇabhūto nibbānaṃ nāma
tika-abh07t:1559_6: eko dhammoti siddhaṃ. Paccakkhānumānasiddhatāsandassanena ca abhāvamattaṃ nibbānanti
tika-abh07t:1559_7: vippaṭipannānaṃ vādaṃ nisedhetīti alamatippapañcena. Khandhādibhede tebhūmakadhamme
tika-abh07t:1559_8: heṭṭhupariyavasena vinanato saṃsibbanato vānasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya nikkhantattā visayātikkamavasena atītattā.
tika-abh07t:1560_0: 63. Sabhāvatoti attano santilakkhaṇena. Upādīyati kāmupādādīhīti upādi, pañcakkhandhassetaṃ
tika-abh07t:1560_1: adhivacanaṃ, upādiyeva seso kilesehīti upādiseso, tena saha vattatīti saupādisesā,
tika-abh07t:1560_2: sā eva nibbānadhātūti saupādisesanibbānadhātu. Kāraṇapariyāyenāti saupādisesādivasena
tika-abh07t:1561_0: 64. Ārammaṇato, sampayogato ca rāgadosamohehi suññattā suññaṃ, suññameva suññataṃ,
tika-abh07t:1561_1: tathā rāgādinimittarahitattā animittaṃ. Rāgādipaṇidhirahitattā appaṇihitaṃ. Sabbasaṅkhārehi
tika-abh07t:1561_2: vā suññattā suññataṃ. Sabbasaṅkhāranimittābhāvato animittaṃ. Taṇhāpaṇidhiyā abhāvato appaṇihitaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1562_0: 65. Cavanābhāvato accutaṃ. Antassa pariyosānassa atikkantattā accantaṃ. Paccayehi
tika-abh07t:1562_1: asaṅkhatattā asaṅkhataṃ. Attano uttaritarassa abhāvato, sahadhammena vattabbassa
tika-abh07t:1562_2: uttarassa vā abhāvato anuttaraṃ. Vānato taṇhāto muttattā sabbaso apagatattā vānamuttā.
tika-abh07t:1562_3: Mahante sīlakkhandhādike esanti gavesantīti mahesayo. “Iti citta”ntyādi chahi paricchedehi
tika-abh07t:1567_1: vatthudhammā sabhāvadhammā vuttā, idāni tesaṃ yathāyogaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ ekekasamuccayavasena
tika-abh07t:1567_2: yogānurūpato akusalasaṅgahādibhedaṃ samuccayaṃ rāsiṃ pavakkhāmīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t:1568_0: 2. Akusalānameva sabhāgadhammavasena saṅgaho akusalasaṅgaho. Kusalādivasena missakānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1568_1: saṅgaho missakasaṅgaho, saccābhisambodhisaṅkhātassa ariyamaggassa pakkhe bhavānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1568_2: bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ satipaṭṭhānādibhedānaṃ sabhāgavatthuvasena saṅgaho bodhipakkhiyasaṅgaho.
tika-abh07t:1570_0: 3. Pubbakoṭiyā apaññāyanato cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena, vaṇato vā vissandamānayūsā viya
tika-abh07t:1570_1: cakkhādito visayesu vissandanato āsavā. Atha vā bhavato ābhavaggaṃ dhammato āgotrabhuṃ
tika-abh07t:1570_2: savanti pavattantīti āsavā. Avadhiattho cettha ā-kāro, avadhi ca mariyādābhividhivasena
tika-abh07t:1570_3: duvidho. Tattha “āpāṭaliputtaṃ vuṭṭho devo”tyādīsu viya kiriyaṃ bahi katvā pavatto
tika-abh07t:1570_4: mariyādo. “Ābhavaggaṃ saddo abbhuggato”tyādīsu viya kiriyaṃ byāpetvā pavatto abhividhi.
tika-abh07t:1570_5: Idha pana abhividhimhi daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hete nibbattiṭṭhānabhūte ca bhavagge, gotrabhumhi
tika-abh07t:1570_6: ca ārammaṇabhūte pavattanti. Vijjamānesu ca aññesu ābhavaggaṃ, āgotrabhuñca savantesu
tika-abh07t:1570_8: ca eteyeva āsavabhāvena niruḷhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kāmoyeva āsavo kāmāsavo, kāmarāgo.
tika-abh07t:1570_9: Rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo bhavāsavo. Jhānanikantisassatadiṭṭhisahagato ca rāgo ettheva
tika-abh07t:1570_10: saṅgayhati. Tattha paṭhamo upapattibhavesu rāgo, dutiyo kammabhave, tatiyo bhavadiṭṭhisahagato.
tika-abh07t:1570_11: Dvāsaṭṭhividhā diṭṭhi diṭṭhāsavo. Dukkhādīsu catūsu saccesu, pubbante, aparante,
tika-abh07t:1570_12: pubbāparante, paṭiccasamuppādesu cāti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇaṃ avijjāsavo.
tika-abh07t:1571_0: 4. Ottharitvā haraṇato, ohananato vā heṭṭhā katvā hananato osīdāpanato “ogho”ti vuccati
tika-abh07t:1571_1: jalappavāho, ete ca satte ottharitvā hanantā vaṭṭasmiṃ satte osīdāpentā viya hontīti
tika-abh07t:1571_2: oghasadisatāya oghā, āsavāyeva panettha yathāvuttaṭṭhena “oghā”ti ca vuccanti.
tika-abh07t:1572: 5. Vaṭṭasmiṃ, bhavayantake vā satte kammavipākena bhavantarādīhi, dukkhena vā satte yojentīti yogā, heṭṭhā vuttadhammāva.
tika-abh07t:1573_0: 6. Nāmakāyena rūpakāyaṃ, paccuppannakāyena vā anāgatakāyaṃ ganthenti duppamuñcaṃ
tika-abh07t:1573_1: veṭhentīti kāyaganthā. Gosīlādinā sīlena, vatena, tadubhayena ca suddhīti evaṃ parato
tika-abh07t:1573_2: asabhāvato āmasanaṃ parāmāso. “Idameva saccaṃ, moghamañña”nti abhinivisanaṃ daḷhaggāho
tika-abh07t:1574_0: 7. Maṇḍūkaṃ pannago viya bhusaṃ daḷhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ādiyantīti upādānāni. Kāmoyeva upādānaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1574_1: kāme upādiyatīti vā kāmupādānaṃ. “Iminā me sīlavatādinā saṃsārasuddhī”ti evaṃ sīlavatādīnaṃ
tika-abh07t:1574_2: gahaṇaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ. Vadanti etenāti vādo, khandhehi byatirittābyatirittavasena
tika-abh07t:1574_3: vīsati parikappitassa attano vādo attavādo. Soyeva upādānanti attavādupādānaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1575_0: 8. Jhānādivasena uppajjanakakusalacittaṃ nisedhenti tathā tassa uppajjituṃ na dentīti
tika-abh07t:1575_1: nīvaraṇāni, paññācakkhuno vā āvaraṇaṭṭhena nīvaraṇā. Pañcasu kāmaguṇesu adhimattarāgasaṅkhāto
tika-abh07t:1575_2: kāmoyeva chandanaṭṭhena chando cāti kāmacchando. Soyeva nīvaraṇanti kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1575_3: Byāpajjati vinassati etena cittanti byāpādo, “anatthaṃ me acarī”tyādinayappavattanavavidhaāghātavatthupadaṭṭhānatāya
tika-abh07t:1575_4: navavidho, aṭṭhānakopena saha dasavidho vā doso, soyeva nīvaraṇanti byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1575_6: Kasmā panete bhinnadhammā dve dve ekanīvaraṇabhāvena vuttāti? Kiccāhārapaṭipakkhānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1575_7: samānabhāvato. Thinamiddhānañhi cittuppādassa layāpādanakiccaṃ samānaṃ, uddhaccakukkuccānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1575_8: avūpasantabhāvakāraṇaṃ. Tathā purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ tandīvijambhitā āhāro, hetūtyattho,
tika-abh07t:1575_9: pacchimānaṃ ñātibyasanādivitakkanaṃ. Purimānañca dvinnaṃ vīriyaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1580_0: 9. Appahīnaṭṭhena anu anu santāne sentīti anusayā, anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantītyattho.
tika-abh07t:1580_1: Appahīnā hi kilesā kāraṇalābhe sati upajjanārahā santāne anu anu sayitā viya hontīti
tika-abh07t:1580_2: tadavatthā “anusayā”ti vuccanti. Te pana nippariyāyato anāgatā kilesā, atītapaccuppannāpi
tika-abh07t:1580_3: taṃsabhāvattā tathā vuccanti. Na hi kālabhedena dhammānaṃ sabhāvabhedo atthi, yadi
tika-abh07t:1580_4: appahīnaṭṭhena anusayā, nanu sabbepi kilesā appahīnā anusayā bhaveyyunti? Na mayaṃ
tika-abh07t:1580_5: appahīnatāmattena “anusayā”ti vadāma, atha kho appahīnaṭṭhena thāmagatā kilesā anusayāti.
tika-abh07t:1580_6: Thāmagamanañca anaññasādhāraṇo kāmarāgādīnameva āveṇiko sabhāvoti alaṃ vivādena.
tika-abh07t:1582: 12. Cittaṃ kilissati upatappati, bādhīyati vā etehīti kilesā.
tika-abh07t:1583: 13. Kāmabhavanāmenāti kāmabhavasaṅkhātānaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ nāmena. Tathāpavattanti sīlabbatādīnaṃ parato āmasanādivasena pavattaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1584_0: 14. Āsavā ca oghā ca yogā ca ganthā ca vatthuto dhammato vuttanayena tayo. Tathā
tika-abh07t:1584_1: upādānā duve vuttā taṇhādiṭṭhivasena. Nīvaraṇā aṭṭha siyuṃ thinamiddhauddhaccakukkuccānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1584_2: visuṃ gahaṇato. Anusayā chaḷeva honti kāmarāgabhavarāgānusayānaṃ taṇhāsabhāvena ekato
tika-abh07t:1584_3: gahitattā. Nava saṃyojanā matā ubhayattha vuttānaṃ taṇhāsabhāvānaṃ, diṭṭhisabhāvānañca
tika-abh07t:1584_4: ekekaṃ saṅgahitattā. Kilesā pana suttantavasena, abhidhammavasenapi dasa. Iti evaṃ
tika-abh07t:1584_5: pāpānaṃ akusalānaṃ saṅgaho navadhā vutto. Ettha ca –
tika-abh07t:1593_0: 16. Ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā cintanasaṅkhātena upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena yathārahaṃ paccanīkadhammajhāpanaṭṭhena
tika-abh07t:1593_1: ca jhānāni ca tāni aṅgāni ca samuditānaṃ avayavabhāvena aṅgīyanti ñāyantīti jhānaṅgāni.
tika-abh07t:1593_2: Avayavavinimuttassa ca samudāyassa abhāvepi senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya visuṃ visuṃ
tika-abh07t:1593_3: aṅgabhāvena vuccanti ekato hutvā jhānabhāvena. Domanassañcettha akusalajhānaṅgaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1594_0: 17. Sugatiduggatīnaṃ, nibbānassa ca abhimukhaṃ pāpanato maggā, tesaṃ pathabhūtāni
tika-abh07t:1594_1: aṅgāni, maggassa vā aṭṭhaṅgikassa aṅgāni maggaṅgāni. Sammā aviparītato passatīti
tika-abh07t:1594_2: sammādiṭṭhi. Sā pana “atthi dinna”ntyādivasena dasavidhā, pariññādikiccavasena catubbidhā
tika-abh07t:1594_3: vā. Sammā saṅkappenti etenāti sammāsaṅkappo. So nekkhammasaṅkappaabyāpādasaṅkappaavihiṃsāsaṅkappavasena
tika-abh07t:1594_4: tividho. Sammāvācādayo heṭṭhā vibhāvitāva. Sammā vāyamanti etenāti sammāvāyāmo. Sammā
tika-abh07t:1594_5: saranti etāyāti sammāsati. Imesaṃ pana bhedaṃ upari vakkhati. Sammā sāmañca ādhīyati
tika-abh07t:1594_6: etena cittanti sammāsamādhi, paṭhamajjhānādivasena pañcavidhā ekaggatā. Micchādiṭṭhiādayo
tika-abh07t:1595_1: jīvane jīvantehi kammajarūpasampayuttadhammehi, manane jānane sampayuttadhammehi,
tika-abh07t:1595_2: sukhitādibhāve sukhitādīhi sahajātehi, saddahanādīsu saddahanādivasappavattehi teheva,
tika-abh07t:1595_3: “anaññātaṃ ñassāmī”ti pavattiyaṃ tathāpavattehi sahajātehi, ājānane aññabhāvibhāve
tika-abh07t:1595_4: ca ājānanādivasappavattehi sahajātehi attānaṃ anuvattāpentā dhammā issaraṭṭhena indriyāni
tika-abh07t:1595_5: nāmāti āha “cakkhundriya”ntyādi. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana aparepi indaliṅgaṭṭhādayo indriyaṭṭhā
tika-abh07t:1595_6: vuttā. Jīvitindriyanti rūpārūpavasena duvidhaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ. “Anamatagge saṃsāre
tika-abh07t:1595_7: anaññātaṃ amataṃ padaṃ, catusaccadhammameva vā ñassāmī”ti evamajjhāsayena paṭipannassa
tika-abh07t:1595_8: indriyaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ. Ājānāti paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā
tika-abh07t:1595_9: jānāti indriyañcāti aññindriyaṃ. Aññātāvino cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitassa
tika-abh07t:1596_0: Ettha ca sattapaññattiyā visesanissayattā ajjhattikāyatanāni ādito vuttāni, manindriyaṃ
tika-abh07t:1596_1: pana ajjhattikāyatanabhāvasāmaññena ettheva vattabbampi arūpindriyehi saha ekato
tika-abh07t:1596_2: dassanatthaṃ jīvitindriyānantaraṃ vuttaṃ, sāyaṃ paññatti imesaṃ vasena “itthī puriso”ti
tika-abh07t:1596_3: vibhāgaṃ gacchatīti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ bhāvadvayaṃ, tayime upādinnadhammā
tika-abh07t:1596_4: imassa vasena tiṭṭhantīti dassanatthaṃ tato paraṃ jīvitindriyaṃ, sattasaññito dhammapuñjo
tika-abh07t:1596_5: pabandhavasena pavattamāno imāhi vedanāhi saṃkilissatīti dassanatthaṃ tato vedanāpañcakaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1596_6: tāhi pana visuddhikāmānaṃ vodānasambhāradassanatthaṃ tato saddhādipañcakaṃ, sambhūtavodānasambhārā
tika-abh07t:1596_7: ca imehi visujjhantīti visuddhippattā, niṭṭhitakiccā ca hontīti dassanatthaṃ ante
tika-abh07t:1596_8: tīṇi vuttāni. Ettāvatā adhippetatthasiddhīti aññesaṃ aggahaṇanti idametesaṃ anukkamena
tika-abh07t:1597_1: akampiyaṭṭhena, sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena ca saddhādīni satta balāni, ahirikānottappadvayaṃ
tika-abh07t:1598_0: 20. Attādhīnappavattīnaṃ patibhūtā dhammā adhipatī. “Chandavato kiṃnāma na sijjhatī”tyādikaṃ
tika-abh07t:1598_1: hi pubbābhisaṅkhārūpanissayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamāne citte chandādayo dhurabhūtā sayaṃ
tika-abh07t:1598_2: sampayuttadhamme sādhayamānā hutvā pavattanti, te ca tesaṃ vasena pavattanti, tena
tika-abh07t:1598_3: te attādhīnānaṃ patibhāvena pavattanti. Aññesaṃ adhipatidhammānaṃ adhipatibhāvanivāraṇavasena
tika-abh07t:1598_4: issariyaṃ adhipatitā. Santesupi indriyantaresu kevalaṃ dassanādīsu cakkhuviññāṇādīhi
tika-abh07t:1599_0: 21. Ojaṭṭhamakarūpādayo āharantīti āhārā. Kabaḷīkārāhāro hi ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ āharati,
tika-abh07t:1599_1: phassāhāro tisso vedanā, manosañcetanāhārasaṅkhātaṃ kusalākusalakammaṃ tīsu bhavesu
tika-abh07t:1599_3: sakasakapaccayuppanne āharantā aññepi atthi. Ajjhattikasantatiyā pana visesapaccayattā
tika-abh07t:1600_0: Kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānañhi sattānaṃ rūpakāyassa kabaḷīkārāhāro visesapaccayo kammādijanitassapi
tika-abh07t:1600_2: “dhāti viya kumārassa, upatthambhanakayantaṃ viya gehassā”ti vutto. Phassopi sukhādivatthubhūtaṃ
tika-abh07t:1600_3: ārammaṇaṃ phusantoyeva sukhādivedanāpavattanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā paccayo hoti. Manosañcetanā
tika-abh07t:1600_4: kusalākusalakammavasena āyūhamānāyeva bhavamūlanipphādanato sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā paccayo
tika-abh07t:1600_5: hoti. Viññāṇaṃ vijānantameva nāmarūpappavattanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā paccayo hotīti
tika-abh07t:1600_6: evameteyeva ajjhattasantānassa visesapaccayattā “āhārā”ti vuttā, phassādīnaṃ dutiyādibhāvo
tika-abh07t:1601_0: 26. Pañcaviññāṇānaṃ vitakkavirahena ārammaṇesu abhinipātamattattā tesu vijjamānānipi
